item.text: @#/ /rgyud 'bum pha bzhugs so/ /
@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya su bar+Na pra b+hA sot+ta ma sU tren+d+ra rA dza nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba
theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa
nyan thos thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bya rgod phung po chos kyi dbyings/ /zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul na/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa bzhugs nas ni/ /dag cing rdul rnams med pa yi/ /byang chub sems dpa' mchog rnams la/ /mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po ste/ /mnyan na shin tu zab pa dang / /yongs
su brtags na zab pa nyid/ /gser 'od dam pa 'di 'chad do/ /phyogs bzhir sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni/ /byin gyi rlabs kyis byin brlabs pa/ /mi 'khrugs pas ni shar phyogs

su/ /rin chen tog gis lho phyogs su/ /'od dpag med kyis nub phyogs su/ /rnga sgra yis ni byang phyogs su/ /sdig pa thams cad gzhig pa'i phyir/ /bshad pa dam pa bkra shis pa/ /sdig pa'i las rnams zad byed pa/ /

bde ba thams cad sbyin byed pa/ /sdug bsngal thams cad 'jig byed pa/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi gzhi/ /dpal kun gyis ni legs brgyan pa/ /byin gyis brlabs te brjod par bya/ /sems can gang dag dbang po nyams/ /tshe zad pa

dang tshe nyams dang / /phun sum tshogs min gang chags dang / /lha rnams rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang / /mdza' sdug skye bo sdang ba dang / /bran bza' la sogs gtses pa dang / /phan tshun mthun pa ma yin dang / /nor 'gribs pas ni gnod pa

dang / /mya ngan ngal dang gnod pa dang / /'jigs pa dang ni phongs pa dang / /gza' dang rgyu skar byad stems dang / /mi bzad gdon gyis nyen pa dang / /mya ngan ngal las byung ba yi/ /rmi lam sdig pa mthong na yang / /des ni rab bkrus gtsang ma yin/ /

mdo sde dam pa mnyan par bya/ /gang dag yid dge sems dang zhing / /gos gtsang rnams kyis rab brgyan te/ /zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul ba/ /mdo sde mnyan par byed na ni/ /mdo sde 'di yi gzi brjid kyis/ /srog chags kun gyi gnod pa

dag /shin tu mi bzad 'di 'dra ba/ /de dag rtag tu zhi bar 'gyur/ /'jig rten skyong ba bdag nyid dang / /blon po tshogs kyi dbang phyug bcas/ /gnod sbyin bye ba du ma yis/ /de dag la ni srung bar byed/ /lha mo chen mo dbyangs can dang / /nai rany+dza

nar gnas pa dang / /'byung po'i ma mo 'phrog ma dang / /sa yi lha mo brtan ma dang / /tshangs pa'i dbang dang lha dbang dang / /klu dbang mthu chen rnams dang ni/ /mi 'am ci dbang lha min dbang / /de bzhin nam mkha' lding dbang rnams/ /sde dang stobs dang bzhon pa

dang / /bcas te de dag der lhags nas/ /nyin dang mtshan mo mi g.yel bar/ /de dag la ni srung bar byed/ /zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul ba/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba ste/ /bskal pa bye bar rnyed dka' ba/ /mdo 'di rab tu bshad par bya/ /gang dag

mdo 'di nyan pa dang / /gang dag gzhan la thos byed dang / /gang su rjes su yi rang dang / /gang dag mchod pa byed pa rnams/ /de dag lha dang klu dag dang / /mi dang mi 'am ci dag dang / /lha min gnod sbyin du ma yis/ /bskal pa bye bar mchod par 'gyur/ /

srog chags bsod nams med pa rnams/ /de dag bsod nams phung po ni/ /mtha' yas grangs kyang med pa dang / /bsam gyis mi khyab skye bar 'gyur/ /phyogs bcu'i rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / /de bzhin zab mor spyod pa yis/ /byang chub sems dpa'

rnams kyis kyang / /rab tu gzung bar 'gyur ba yin/ /gtsang ma'i gos rnams rab bgos la/ /dri zhim pa yi gos 'chang zhing / /byams pa'i sems ni nyer bzhag nas/ /g.yel ba med par mchod par bya/ /rang gi sems ni dri med cing / /rgya che bar yang rab byed

la/ /sems kyang shin tu dang byed kyis/ /mdo sde dam pa mnyan par gyis/ /gang dag mdo 'di nyan pa ni/ /de dag mi nang legs par 'ongs/ /mi yi srid pa legs par thob/ /'tsho ba bde bas 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /gang gi rna ba'i bu gar yang / /bshad pa 'di

ni grag 'gyur ba/ /de dag dge rtsa sbyangs pa ste/ /sangs rgyas mang pos rab tu bsngags/ /gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ba ste dang po'o// //yang de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na/

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mdzes pa'i tog ces bya ba/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po la rim gro byas pa zhig gnas pa de 'di snyam du sems te/ rgyu

gang dang rkyen gang gis/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'di lta ste/ lo brgyad cu zhig thub ste/ 'di ltar sku tshe thung snyam nas/ de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di skad du/ rgyu gnyis dang rkyen gnyis kyis tshe ring bar 'gyur te/ gnyis gang zhe na

'di lta ste/ srog gcod pa spangs pa dang / kha zas rab tu sbyin pa'o zhes gsungs te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas ni/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa mang po nas/ srog gcod pa spangs par gyur pa nas/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam

gyi bar du yang dag par blangs par gyur/ zas dang phyi nang gi dngos po rnams sems can dag la yongs su btang ste/ tha na rang gi lus kyi sha dang khrag dang rus pa dang rkang gis kyang sems can ltogs pa rnams tshim par mdzad na/ zas gzhan gyis lta ci smos snyam mo/ /

de nas skyes bu dam pa de sangs rgyas la song ba'i yid la byed pa dag las/ 'di lta bu'i tshul gyis bsam pa 'di dag sems pa na/ de'i khyim yangs shing rgya che la baiDUr+ya sngon po las grub pa/ lha'i rin po che du mas spras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas kha dog bsgyur ba/

lha'i las 'das pa'i spos kyis khyab par gyur to/ /khyim de'i phyogs bzhi nas lha'i rin po che'i khri bzhi byung bar gyur te/ khri de dag las kyang lha'i ras bcos bu'i rin po che'i phrugs rnams bting ba dag byung bar gyur to/ /khri de dag las kyang lha'i me tog pad+ma rin po che du mas

spras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas kha dog bsgyur ba dag byung ngo / /pad+ma de dag las kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhi byung bar gyur te/ shar phyogs nas ni de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa byung / lho phyogs nas ni de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog byung / nub

phyogs nas ni de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med byung / byang phyogs nas ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnga sgra byung ste/ seng ge'i khri de dag las sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag byung ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur

to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar dang / phyogs bcu kun tu 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar dang / phyogs bcu kun tu 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bar dag snang bas khyab par gyur/ lha'i me tog dag gi char yang

bab/ lha'i sil snyan gyi sgra yang byung ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir sems can thams cad kyang lha'i bde ba dang ldan par gyur te/ sems can dbang po ma tshang ba rnams ni dbang po thams cad dang ldan par gyur/

sems can dmus long da ga ni mig gis gzugs rnams mthong / sems can 'on pa dag ni rna bas sgra rnams thos/ sems can smyos pa dag ni dran pa so sor rnyed/ sems can sems g.yeng ba dag ni sems mi g.yeng bar gyur/ sems can sgren mo dag ni gos

bgos par gyur/ sems can bkres pa dag ni lto 'grangs par gyur/ sems can skom pa dag ni skom ngoms par gyur/ sems can nad kyis btab pa dag ni nad dang bral bar gyur/ lus kyi dbang po nyams pa dag ni dbang po rnams tshang bar gyur te/ 'jig rten du ngo mtshar

rmad du byung ba'i chos rnams rgya cher byung bar gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mthong nas ngo mtshar rmad du gyur te/ de tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ sangs

rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag rnams rjes su dran la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i yon tan rjes su dran zhing / bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad la the tshom za bar gyur te/

bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'di ltar lo brgyad cu zhig thub ste sku tshe thung ba 'di ji lta bu/ 'di ci zhig snyam du bsam pa de sems shing 'dug par gyur to/ /de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis dgongs shing mkhyen bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa'

mdzes pa'i tog de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu khyod 'di snyam du/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'di ltar sku tshe thung ngo snyam du ma sems shig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs

rgyas rnams ma gtogs par/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i nang na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya

thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad kyi mtha'/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bar du yang rtogs par nus pa nged kyis su yang ma mthong ngo / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bshad pa brjod ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus lha'i bu 'dod pa na

spyod pa rnams dang / gzugs na spyod pa rnams dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i bar dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma 'dus nas/ byang chub

sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gi khyim der lhags so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bshad pa tshigs su bcad de mdor bka' stsal pa/ rgya mtsho'i chu rnams thams cad kyi/ /

thigs pa dag ni bgrang bar nus/ /shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad/ /sus kyang bgrang bar mi nus so/ /ri rab rnams ni thams cad kyang / /phra rab rdul du bgrang bar nus/ /shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad/ /sus kyang bgrang bar mi nus so/ /sa la gang dag yod pa yi/ /

rab tu phra rdul ji snyed pa/ /thams cad bgrang bar nus srid kyi/ /rgyal ba'i sku tshe'i tshad mi nus/ /gal te la las nam mkha' la/ /sna 'ga' zhig gis dpag 'dod kyang / /shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad/ /sus kyang bgrang bar mi nus so/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas

'di srid bzhugs/ /bskal pa dag ni 'di snyed cig /bskal pa bye ba brgya dag ces/ /grangs ni rnyed par mi rung ngo / /gang phyir de yi rgyu dang ni/ /rkyen yang rnam pa gnyis yin te/ /sdig pa'i 'tshe ba spangs pa dang / /kha zas mang po byin pa ste/ /de phyir bdag nyid

chen po de'i/ /sku tshe'i tshad grangs mi rnyed do/ /bskal pa 'di snyed cig ce 'am/ /grangs med pa yang de bzhin te/ /de bas the tshom med par 'gyur/ /the tshom cung zad ma za shig /rgyal ba'i sku tshe tha ma yi/ /grangs ni gang du mi dmigs so/ /de nas de'i tshe 'khor

der slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze kauN+Di n+ya zhes bya ba dang / bram ze stong phrag du mas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i sgra thos nas 'phral la 'dus te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas/

bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ gal te bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba/ thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ phan par bzhed pa/ sems can thams cad la pha ma lta bu/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam par gyur pa/ zla ba lta bur snang bar mdzad pa/ shes rab

dang ye shes chen po'i nyi ma shar ba lta bu lags shing / gal te khyod sems can thams cad la sgra gcan zin bzhin du gzigs na/ bdag la dam pa zhig stsal du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor der lits+tsha bI gzhon nu

'jig rten thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba zhes bya ba de spobs pa skyes nas/ slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze kauN+Di n+ya la 'di skad ces smras so/ /ci bram ze chen po khyod/ bcom ldan 'das la dam pa cig gsol lam/ bdag gis khyod la dam pa zhig sbyin no/ /bram zes smras pa/

lits+tsha bI gzhon nu bdag ni bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dang ring bsrel gyi phye ma bgos pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam la bsten par 'dod do/ /ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam de mngon par mchod na/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams

kyi bdag po 'ba' zhig thob ces grags so/ /kye lits+tsha bI gzhon nu gser 'od dam pa'i mdo nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis shes par dka' ba/ khong du chud par dka' ba de lta bu'i mtshan nyid dang yon tan dang ldan pa gser 'od dam pa'i mdo 'chad ces grag gis

nyon cig /kye lits+tsha bI gzhon nu gser 'od dam pa'i mdo ni/ de ltar shes par dka' zhing rtogs par dka' bas na/ kho bo cag mtha' 'khob kyi gling gi bram ze rnams ni/ gang bcangs pa na sems can rnams myur du sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i bdag po 'thob par 'gyur ba'i ring

bsrel yungs 'bru tsam za ma tog gi nang du bcug la bcangs kyang rung ngo / /kye lits+tsha bI gzhon nu khyod ci de bzhin gshegs pa las ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam gsol nas/ ring bsrel za ma tog tu bcug ste bcangs pas sems can rnams sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i bdag po

thob par mi 'dod dam/ kye lits+tsha bI gzhon nu kho bos ni dam pa de lta bu gsol to/ /de nas lits+tsha bI gzhon nu 'jig rten thams cad kyis mthong na dga' bas/ slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze kauN+Di n+ya la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis slar smras pa/ nam zhig gang gA'i chu rgyun

la/ /me tog rnams ni skye ba dang / /bya rog dmar por 'gyur ba dang / /khu byug dung mdog 'drar 'gyur dang / /'dzam bur ta la'i 'bru chags dang / /'bra gor a mra'i dogs pa chags/ /de yi tshe na yungs 'bru tsam/ /ring bsrel du ni gsal bar 'gyur/ /nam

zhig rus sbal spu rnams las/ /gos su legs par btags gyur te/ /dgun gyi grang ba sel byed pa/ /de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur/ /nam zhig sbrang bu'i rkang lag las/ /yang thog legs par byas gyur te/ /brtan zhing rab tu mi g.yo ba/ /de tshe ring bsrel

yod par 'gyur/ /nam zhig srin bu pad+ma kun/ /so ni dkar por skyes gyur te/ /rno zhing chen por gyur pa na/ /de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur/ /mtho ris su ni 'dzeg pa'i phyir/ /nam zhig ri bong rwa rnams las/ /skas ni legs par byas gyur pa/ /de

tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur/ /nam zhig skas ni der 'dzegs te/ /byi bas zla ba bza' ba dang / /sgra gcan la yang gnod byed pa/ /de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur/ /grong na rgyu ba'i sbrang bu yis/ /nam zhig rdza ma'i chang 'thungs te/ /khyim na gnas par byed 'gyur

ba/ /de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur/ /nam zhig bong bu bde 'gyur la/ /mchu dmar bim pa 'drar gyur cing / /glu gar rnams la mkhas gyur pa/ /de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur/ /nam zhig 'ug pa bya rog rnams/ /dben par dong nas rtse ba dang / /phan tshun

mthun par gyur pa na/ /de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur/ /pa la sha yi lo ma rnams/ /rin chen sna gsum gdugs gyur te/ /char 'bab skyabs su nam gyur pa/ /de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur/ /nam zhig rgya mtsho'i gru bo che/ /'khrul 'khor dang ni g.yor mor bcas/ /

thang la byung ste 'gro ba na/ /de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur/ /nam zhig bya ni 'ug pa yis/ /ri bo spos kyi ngad ldang ba/ /mchu la thogs te 'gro 'gyur ba/ /de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur/ /slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze kauN+Di n+yas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag thos nas/

lits+tsha bI gzhon nu 'jig rten thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis slar smras pa/ legs so legs so gzhon nu mchog /rgyal ba'i sras po tshig po che/ /dpa' zhing thabs la mkhas ldan pa/ /lung bstan pa ni dam pa thob/ /'jig rten mgon

po skyob pa po/ /de bzhin gshegs pa che ba nyid/ /bsam gyis mi khyab bzhin/ /gzhon nu bdag las mnyan par gyis/ /sangs rgyas yul ni bsam mi khyab/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams mtshungs pa med/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rtag tu zhi/ /sangs rgyas thams

cad yang dag byung / /sangs rgyas thams cad kha dog mtshungs/ /'di ni sangs rgyas chos nyid yin/ /bcom ldan 'das ni bcos ma min/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ma skyes te/ /rdo rje lta bur sra ba'i sku/ /sprul pa'i sku ni ston par mdzad/ /drang srong chen po'i

ring bsrel ni/ /yungs 'bru tsam zhes bya ba med/ /sku la rus pa khrag med na/ /ring bsrel yod par ga la 'gyur/ /sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /thabs kyis ring bsrel bzhag par mdzad/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi sku/ /de bzhin gshegs pa

chos kyi dbyings/ /chos ston mdzad pa ci 'dra ba/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi sku de 'dra/ /bdag gis 'di thos shes nas ni/ /bdag gis dam pa gsol bar byas/ /de nyid kho na lung bstan phyir/ /gtam gleng ba ni bdag gis byas/ /de nas lha'i bu sum khri nyis stong

gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bstan pa zab mo de lta bu de dag thos nas/ thams cad kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ de dag yid kyis kun tu rtog pa rab tu dga' nas sgra dbyangs gcig tu tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras

so/ /sangs rgyas mya ngan yong mi 'da'/ /chos kyang nub par mi 'gyur te/ /sems can yongs su smin mdzad phyir/ /yongs su mya ngan 'da' ba ston/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan bsam mi khyab/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa'i sku/ /sems can rnams la phan

pa'i phyir/ /bkod pa rnam pa sna tshogs ston/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang skyes bu dam pa de gnyis las bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bstan pa thos nas/ tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs

shing rab tu dga' ste dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas dga' ba dang mgu ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bstan pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes

so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang mi snang bar gyur to/ /gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gnyid kyis

log pa'i rmi lam na/ gser gyi rnga kun tu snang ba 'di lta ste/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba zhig mthong ngo / /phyogs thams cad na yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med dpag tu med pa dag rin po che'i shing drung na/ rin po che bai DUr+ya'i khri rnams la bzhugs shing 'khor

brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor te/ mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston pa mthong ngo / /de nas yang skyes bu bram ze'i gzugs lta bu zhig rnga de rdung ba mthong ste/ rnga'i sgra de las bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di lta bu dag byung ba thos so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'

mdzes pa'i tog gnyid sad ma thag tu/ bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa de dag rjes su dran no/ /rjes su dran nas kyang de'i mtshan mo zad pa dang / rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung ste/ srog chags stong phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu bya rgod phung po'i ri ga la ba dang /

bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gis/ bcom

ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ rmi lam na gang rnga'i sgra las bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa thos pa de dag gsol to/ /gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ rmi lam mthong ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste gsum pa'o// //nub

gcig g.yel ba med par yang / /bdag gis rmi lam rmis pa ni/ /mdzes pa'i rnga chen mthong ba ste/ /thams cad du ni gser gyi 'od/ /nyi ma ji lta bzhin du 'bar/ /kun tu rnam par lhang nge ste/ /phyogs bcu rnams su snang bar gyur/ /kun tu rin chen shing drung na/ /

rin chen bai DUr+ya dag gi/ /khri la sangs rgyas rnams bzhugs te/ /brgya stong phrag ni du ma yi/ /'khor dbus mdun gyis bltas pa mthong / /bram ze'i gzugs ni 'dra ba zhig /rnga chen rab tu brdung ba mthong / /de yis de la brdungs pa dang / /tshigs

su bcad pa 'di dag byung / /gser 'od dam pa'i rnga chen sgra yis ni/ /stong gsum 'jig rten 'jig rten gsum 'di na/ /ngan song sdug bsngal gshin rje'i sdug bsngal dang / /dbul ba'i sdug bsngal ma lus zhi bar shog /rnga bo che yi sgra skad 'di yis ni/ /'jig

rten rmongs pa thams cad zhi gyur cig /ji ltar thub dbang 'jigs med 'jigs zhi ltar/ /sems can 'jigs med 'jigs dang bral bar shog /ji ltar 'khor bar kun mkhyen thub dbang po/ /'phags pa'i yon tan kun dang ldan pa ltar/ /skye dgu ting 'dzin byang chub

yan lag gi/ /yon tan ldan zhing yon tan rgya mtshor gyur/ /rnga bo che yi sgra skad 'di yis ni/ /sems can thams cad tshangs pa'i dbyangs ldan gyur/ /sangs rgyas byang chub dam pa mchog reg shog /chos kyi 'khor lo dge ba bskor gyur cig /bskal pa

bsam gyis mi khyab bzhugs par shog /'gro la phan phyir chos kyang ston gyur cig /nyon mongs 'joms gyur sdug bsngal sel bar shog /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug zhi gyur cig /sems can gang dag ngan song sar gnas te/ /rus pa'i lus la me lce rab

'bar ba/ /de dag rnga chen bsgrags pa thos gyur cig /sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig thos shog /sems can kun gyis tshe rabs brgya dag dang / /skye ba stong phrag bye bar skye dran shog /thub pa'i dbang po rtag tu dran gyur cing / /de dag gi ni rgya chen gsung thos

shog /rnga bo che yi sgra skad 'di yis ni/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang rtag tu 'grogs rnyed gyur/ /sdig pa'i las rnams rnam par spong bar shog /bya ba dge ba rnams ni spyod gyur cig /mi dang lha dang srog chags thams cad kyis/ /de dag bsam dang smon lam gang yin pa/ /

rnga bo che yi sgra skad 'di yis ni/ /de dag rnams kyi de kun rdzogs gyur cig /sems can gang dag sems dmyal mi bzad skyes/ /lus la me lce kun tu rab tu 'bar/ /skyabs med mya ngan bcas shing yongs 'khyam pa/ /me rnams de dag rab tu zhi bar shog /

sems dmyal mi yi 'jig rten na/ /sems can sdug bsngal mi bzad drag po gang / /rnga bo che yi sgra skad 'di yis ni/ /de dag rnams kyi sdug bsngal kun zhi shog /rten med dpung gnyen med pa dang / /skyabs med par yang gyur pa dag /de rnams

la ni skyob pa dang / /dpung gnyen rten mchog bdag gyur cig /sangs rgyas rkang gnyis dam pa dag /thugs brtse thugs rje ldan pa'i thugs/ /gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/ /bzhugs pa bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /bdag gis sngon cad sdig pa'i

las/ /shin tu mi bzad gang bgyis pa/ /stobs bcu'i spyan sngar bdag mchis te/ /de dag thams cad bshags par bgyi/ /pha ma dag tu mi 'dzin dang / /sangs rgyas rnams su mi 'dzin dang / /dge ba dag tu mi 'dzin pas/ /sdig pa bdag gis gang bgyis pa/ /

phyug pa'i rgyags pas dregs pa dang / /rigs dang longs spyod rgyags pa dang / /bzhon pa'i rgyags pas dregs pa yis/ /bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang / /nyes bsams nyes par smras pa dang / /nyes par bgyis pa'i las rnams dang / /nyes pa'i

dmigs su ma bltas pas/ /bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang / /byis pa'i blo yi 'jug pa dang / /mi shes mun pa'i sems dang ni/ /sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang gyur dang / /nyon mongs rnam par 'khrug sems dang / /rtsed mo dga' ba'i dbang nyid dang / /mya

ngan dang ni nad dbang dang / /nor gyis mi chog nyes pa yis/ /bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang / /'phags min skye bo 'dre ba dang / /phrag dog ser sna'i rgyu dang ni/ /g.yo dang dbul ba'i nyes pa yis/ /bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang / /phongs pa byung ba'i dus

kyi tshe/ /'dod pa rnams kyi 'jigs rgyu dang / /phyug po ma yin gyur pa yis/ /bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang / /g.yo ba'i sems kyis dbang nyid dang / /'dod dang khro ba'i dbang dag dang / /bkres dang skom gyis nyen pa yis/ /bdag

gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang / /bza' ba dag dang btung ba dang / /bud med rgyu dang gos kyi phyir/ /nyon mongs gdung ba sna tshogs kyis/ /bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang / /lus dang ngag dang yid kyi sdig /nyes par spyad pa rnam gsum bsags/ /

'di 'dra'i tshul gyis gang bgyis pa/ /de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang chos rnams dang / /de bzhin nyan thos rnams la yang / /gus pa ma lags gang bgyis pa/ /de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so/ /gang yang rang sangs

rgyas rnams dang / /byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yang / /gus pa ma lags bgyis pa rnams/ /de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so/ /dam chos smra ba rnams la yang / /gus pa ma lags bgyis pa dang / /chos la'ang gus par ma bgyis pa/ /de

dag thams cad bdag 'chags so/ /bdag gis rtag tu mi shes pas/ /dam pa'i chos ni spangs pa dang / /pha ma rnams la ma gus dang / /de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so/ /blun pa dang ni byis pa dang / /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang / /nga rgyal

dregs pas bsgribs bgyis pa/ /de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so/ /bdag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten du/ /stobs bcu rnams la mchod par bgyi/ /bdag gis phyogs bcur sems can rnams/ /sdug bsngal kun las 'don par bgyi/ /sems can

bsam gyis mi khyab kun/ /sa bcu la ni dgod par bgyi/ /sa bcu la ni gnas nas kyang / /thams cad de bzhin gshegs gyur cig /ji srid sdug bsngal rgya mtsho las/ /de kun thar bgyi nus srid du/ /sems can re re'i phyir yang ni/ /bskal pa bye bar spyad par

bgyi/ /gser 'od dam pa zhes bgyi ba/ /las rnams thams cad byang bgyid pa/ /zab mo dag ni ston pa ni/ /sems can de dag bstan par bgyi/ /gang gis bskal pa stong rnams su/ /sdig pa shin tu mi bzad bgyis/ /lan cig rab tu bshags pa yis/ /de

dag thams cad byang bar 'gyur/ /gang gis las kyi sgrib pa rnams/ /myur du yang dag zad 'gyur ba/ /gser 'od dam pa dge ba yis/ /bshags pa 'di dag bshags nas ni/ /rin chen 'byung gnas mchog bcu po/ /sa bcu la ni gnas par bgyi/ /sangs rgyas

yon tan snang bar bgyi/ /srid pa'i mtsho las bsgral bar bgyi/ /sangs rgyas rgya mtsho chu bo dang / /yon tan rgya mtsho zab mo dang / /sangs rgyas yon tan bsam yas kyis/ /thams cad mkhyen du rdzogs par bgyi/ /ting 'dzin brgya phrag stong rnams dang / /gzungs

rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dang / /dbang stobs byang chub yan lag gi/ /stobs bcu dam par 'gyur bar bgyi/ /dgongs pa'i thugs kyis sangs rgyas rnams/ /bdag la rnam par gzigs su gsol/ /thugs rje ldan pa'i thugs kyis ni/ /nongs par rab tu gzung

du gsol/ /bdag gis bskal pa brgya rnams su/ /sngon chad sdig pa gang bgyis pa/ /de phyir bdag ni mya ngan sems/ /phongs dang mya ngan 'jigs pas gzir/ /sdig pa'i las la 'jigs par bgyid/ /yid ni rtag tu dman par 'gyur/ /gang dang gang du spyod

bgyid pa/ /bdag ni gang du'ang dga' ma mchis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad thugs rje ldan/ /'gro ba kun gyi 'jigs sel bas/ /nongs par rab tu gzung du gsol/ /'jigs pa dag las bdag thar mdzod/ /bdag gi nyon mongs las rnams kyi/ /dri ma

de bzhin gshegs pas shol/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis bdag la ni/ /snying rje'i chu yis bkru bar gsol/ /sdig pa thams cad bshags par bgyi/ /sngon chad bdag gis gang bgyis dang / /da ltar bdag gi sdig pa gang / /de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so/ /

nongs par bgyis pa'i las rnams kun/ /slan chad mi bgyid bsdam par bgyi/ /bdag gis nongs par bgyis pa gang / /sdig de bcab par mi bya'o/ /lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang / /ngag gi rnam pa bzhi dag dang / /yid kyi rnam pa gsum po rnams/ /

de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so/ /lus kyis bgyis dang ngag gi las/ /yid kyis rnam par bsams pa dang / /las rnams bcu po bgyis pa dag /de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so/ /mi dge las bcu spangs nas su/ /dge ba bcu po bsten bgyis

te/ /sa bcu la bdag gnas par bgyi/ /stobs bcu mchog tu 'gyur bar bgyi/ /bdag gis sdig pa'i las gang dag /mi 'dod 'bras bu thob bgyid pa/ /sangs rgyas spyan sngar mchis nas ni/ /de dag thams cad bshags par bgyi/ /'dzam bu'i gling 'dir

gang dag dang / /'jig rten khams ni gzhan dag tu/ /gang rnams dge ba'i las bgyid pa/ /de dag kun la yi rang ngo / /lus dang ngag dang yid kyis kyang / /bdag gis bsod nams gang bsgrubs pa/ /bdag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba des/ /byang chub mchog la reg

par bgyi/ /srid 'gro nyam ngar byis pa'i blo yis ni/ /shin tu mi bzad sdig pa gang bgyis pa/ /stobs bcu mi mnyam spyan sngar mchis nas ni/ /sdig pa de kun so sor bshags par bgyi/ /skye ba nyam nga srid pa nyam nga dang / /'jig rten nyam nga g.yo sems nyam nga dang / /

lus kyi spyod pa nyam nga sna tshogs kyis/ /bdag gis sdig pa gang bsags de 'chags so/ /byis pa blun byas nyon mongs nyam nga dang / /sdig pa'i grogs dang phrad pa nyam nga dang / /srid pa nyam nga 'dod chags nyam nga dang / /zhe sdang nyam nga gti mug nyam nga dang / /

ngal ba'i nyam nga dus kyi nyam nga dang / /bsod nams bsgrubs pa nyam nga dag gis kyang / /rgyal ba mi mnyam mngon sum mchis nas ni/ /sdig pa de kun so sor bshags par bgyi/ /sangs rgyas gser mdog ri snang ri rab 'dra/ /yon tan rgya mtsho 'dra la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

rgyal ba de dag rnams la skyabs su mchi/ /rgyal ba de dag kun la mgos phyag 'tshal/ /gser mdog gser ni dri ma med pa gser gyi 'od/ /dri med rnam dag bai DUr+ya'i yan lag spyan/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma dpal gzi grags 'bar 'byung ba'i gnas/ /thugs rje'i 'od zer

dag gis mun pa mun nag bsal/ /yan lag rab tu dri med rab bzang rnam par mdzes/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma yan lag dri med gser 'dras khyab/ /nyon mongs mes gdungs yid can 'bar ba'i me 'dra ba/ /thub pa'i zla ba'i 'od zer dra bas tshim par mdzad/ /mtshan

mchog sum cu gnyis kyis dbang po yan lag mdzes/ /dpe byad bzang po dag gis yan lag rnam par mdzes/ /dpal gzi bsod nams 'bar 'khrugs 'od zer dra ba yis/ /'jig rten gsum na mun khrod nyi ma bzhin du bzhugs/ /dri med rgya chen kha dog sna tshogs

bai DUr+ya/ /skya rengs dmar dang dngul dang shel bzhin yan lag dmar/ /'od zer dra ba rnam pa sna tshogs legs brgyan pas/ /thub chen khyod ni nyi ma bzhin du de bzhin mdzes/ /mya ngan 'khrug pa 'chi chu rgal ba'i dba' rlabs can/ /'khor ba'i klung chen phongs pa'i chu bor

lhung ba la/ /sdug bsngal rgya mtsho mchog tu rtsub cing shugs drag pa/ /bde gshegs nyi ma'i 'od zer mang po rnams kyis skems/ /yan lag gser gyi mdog tu rnam par snang / /ye shes 'byung gnas 'jig rten gsum kun mchog /rab mdzes mtshan gyis yan

lag rnams spras pa/ /sangs rgyas gser sku 'bar la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ji ltar rgya mtsho'i chu ni dpag med dang / /ji ltar sa la sa rdul mtha' yas dang / /ji ltar ri rab rdo mtha' mtshungs med dang / /ji ltar nam mkha'i mtha' ma mtha' yas pa/ /de bzhin sangs

rgyas yon tan mtha' yas te/ /sems can kun gyis shes par mi nus so/ /bskal pa du mar gzhal cing bsams kyang ni/ /yon tan mtha' ma shes par mi nus so/ /chu ni skra yi rtse mo'i tshad tsam dang / /rdor bcas rir bcas rgya mtshor bcas pa ni/ /bskal pa bgrangs

na shes par nus kyang srid/ /sangs rgyas yon tan pha mthar shes mi nus/ /yon tan kha dog snyan dang grags pa dang / /dge ba'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa'i sku lus dang / /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan pa yis/ /sems can thams cad de 'drar 'gyur

bar shog /bdag gi dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag gis/ /'jig rten mi ring sangs rgyas 'gyur bar bgyi/ /'gro la phan phyir chos kyang bstan par bgyi/ /sems can sdug bsngal mang gzir thar bar bgyi/ /stobs bcas sder bcas bdud las rgyal bar bgyi/ /

chos kyi 'khor lo dge ba bskor bar bgyi/ /bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab gnas par bgyi/ /bdud rtsi'i chu yis sems can tshim par bgyi/ /ji ltar sngon gyi rgyal bas rdzogs pa ltar/ /pha rol phyin drug bla med rdzogs par bgyi/ /nyon mongs gzhom zhing sdug bsngal

bsal bar bgyi/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug zhi bar bgyi/ /skye ba brgya dang skye ba bye ba stong / /bdag ni rtag tu skye ba dran par bgyi/ /thub pa'i dbang po rtag tu dran par bgyi/ /de yi gsung ni rgya chen thos par bgyi/ /bdag ni dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag gis/ /

rtag tu sangs rgyas 'grogs pa rnyed par bgyi/ /sdig pa'i las rnams rnam par spang bar bgyi/ /dge ba'i 'byung gnas dge rnams spyad par bgyi/ /zhing rnams kun na srog chags thams cad kyang / /'jig rten dag na sdug bsngal kun zhi gyur/ /sems can dbang po

ma tshang yan lag nyams/ /de kun de'u re dbang po tshang bar shog /gang dag nad btab nyam chung lus nyams dang / /phyogs bcu dag na skyabs med gyur pa rnams/ /de kun myur du nad las thar gyur cig /nad med stobs dang dbang po rnyed par shog /gang dag rgyal po chom

rkun bred bsdigs bsad thug dang / /sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs brgya yis phongs gyur pa/ /sems can nyam thag gyur cing sdug bsngal de dag kun/ /'jigs mchog mi bzad brgya po de las thar gyur cig /gang dag brdegs shing bcing bas bcings gzir ba/ /phongs pa

sna tshogs dag na gnas gyur cing / /nyon mongs stong phrag du mas dkrugs nas kyang / /'jigs pa mi bzad mya ngan sna tshogs rnyed/ /de dag thams cad bcings las grol gyur cing / /brdeg pa dag ni brdeg las thar bar shog /bsad pa rnams kyang srog dang ldan gyur

cig /phongs gyur thams cad 'jigs pa med par shog /sems can gang dag bkres sred skom gyis gzir/ /de dag zas skom sna tshogs rnyed par shog /long bas gzugs rnams sna tshogs mthong gyur cig /'on pas yid 'ong sgra rnams thos par shog /gcer bu

rnams kyis sna tshogs gos rnyed gyur/ /sems can dbul pos gter rnams rnyed par shog /nor 'bru rin chen sna tshogs mang po yis/ /sems can thams cad bde dang ldan par shog /gang yang sdug bsngal tshor bas gnod ma gyur/ /sems can thams cad blta na sdug

pa dang / /gzugs bzang mdzes shing tshul du shis par shog /rtag tu bde ba du ma rdzogs gyur cig /yid kyis zas skom rab 'byor bsod nams dag /bsams ma thag tu de dag grub gyur cig /rdza rnga cang te'u pi bang sgra snyan dang / /chu mig mtshe'u dang rdzing bu lteng ka dang / /

gser gyi pad+ma ut+pal pad+ma can/ /zas skom gos nor mu tig nor bu dbyig /rgyan gser rin chen sna tshogs bai DUr+ya/ /de dag bsams ma thag tu grub gyur cig /'jig rten gang na'ang sdug bsngal sgra ma byung / /sems can gcig kyang mi 'phrod mthong ma gyur/ /de dag

thams cad kha dog rgya chen dang / /phan tshun du ni 'od byed gyur par shog /mi yi 'jig rten phun sum tshogs gang yod/ /de dag gang du bsams par skye bar gyur/ /bsam pa thams cad bsams ma thag tu yang / /bsod nams 'bras bu yongs su rdzogs par shog /

spos dang phreng ba dag dang byug pa dang / /gos dang phye ma me tog sna tshogs dag /ljon shing dag las dus gsum 'bab par shog /sems can de dag len cing dgar gyur cig /de bzhin gshegs pa bsam yas thams cad dang / /rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' nyan

thos dang / /rdul bral dri med brtan pa'i chos la yang / /phyogs bcu rnams su mchod pa byed par shog /'gro ba dman pa thams cad spong gyur cig /mi khom brgyad po dag las 'das par shog /dal ba'i rgyal po dam pa thob gyur cig /rtag tu sangs

rgyas 'grogs pa thob par shog /rtag tu mthon po'i rigs su skye bar shog /nor dang 'bru yi mdzod rnams 'byor gyur cig /snyan dang grags dang gzugs dang kha dog gis/ /bskal pa du mar legs par brgyan par shog /bud med thams cad rtag tu phor gyur te/ /dpa'

zhing rtul phod mkhas shing gsal bar shog /de kun rtag tu byang chub phyir spyod gyur/ /pha rol phyin pa drug la spyod par shog /phyogs bcu dag na rin chen shing dbang drung / /sangs rgyas bde bzhugs rin chen bai DUr+ya'i/ /khri la bzhugs pa dag ni mthong gyur cig /chos

bstan pa yang de dag thos gyur shog /bdag gis sdig pa'i las rnams bsgrubs pa ni/ /srid pa nyam ngar sngon chad gang bsgrubs pa/ /sdig las gang dag mi 'dod 'bras thob pa/ /de dag thams cad ma lus zad gyur cig /sems can gang dag srid par bcings nas su/ /

'khor ba'i zhags pa'i thag pas dam bcings pa/ /shes rab lag gis bcings pa bkrol bar shog /sdug bsngal rnams las myur du thar gyur cig /sems can gang dag 'dzam bu'i gling 'di dang / /gang dag 'jig rten khams ni gzhan rnams na/ /bsod nams sna tshogs

zab mo rnams byed pa/ /de dag kun la rjes su yi rang ngo / /lus dang ngag dang yid kyis bsgrubs pa yi/ /bdag gis rjes su yi rang bsod nams de/ /bdag ni smon grub 'bras bu yod par shog /byang chub rdul bral bla med thob gyur cig /gang dag rtag dang dri ma bral ba dang / /

dri med yid kyis phyag 'tshal bstod pa dang / /yongs su bsngo ba brjod pa 'di yis ni/ /bskal pa drug cur ngan song spong bar gyur/ /tshigs su bcad pa brjod pa 'di dag gis/ /skyes pa bud med bram ze rgyal rigs las/ /thal sbyar 'dug ste rgyal ba gang bstod pa/ /

tshe rabs kun tu skye ba dran par 'gyur/ /yan lag dbang po kun gyis yan lag brgyan/ /bsod nams yon tan sna tshogs rnams dang ldan/ /mi dbang rgyal pos rtag tu de mchod de/ /de dang de dag tu ni de 'drar 'gyur/ /gang dag rna ba'i bu gar bshags pa 'di ni

grags 'gyur ba/ /de dag sangs rgyas gcig gi gan nas dge ba byas ma yin/ /gnyis la ma yin bzhi la ma yin lnga min bcu la min/ /de ltar sangs rgyas stong gi gan nas dge ba byas ma yin/ /gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las bshags pa'i

le'u zhes bya ba ste bzhi pa'o// //'phags pa gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po gnyis pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi lha mo byang chub yang dag par bsdus pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs

kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po gser gyi lag pa'i dbang po zhes bya ba des/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod pa pad+ma'i 'byung gnas 'dis/ 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mngon par bstod do/ /rgyal

ba gang dag sngar gyur gang byung dang / /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dag na gang bzhugs pa/ /rgyal ba de dag rnams la phyag bgyi'o/ /rgyal ba de dag kun la bdag gis bstod/ /thub dbang zhi zhing rab zhi rnam par dag /sku ni gser gyi mdog tu rab tu gda'/ /dbyangs rnams

kun gyis sangs rgyas gsung snyan te/ /tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs rab tu bsgrags pa'i gsung / /bung ba rma bya ut+pal sngon po'i dbu/ /mthon mthing lcang lo bya ni tsa sha 'dra/ /kha ba dung ltar rab tu dkar ba'i tshems/ /rtag tu gser ltar rnam par mdzes par gda'/ /spyan ni

ring zhing mthon mthing dri ma med/ /ut+pal sngon po rab tu rgyas pa 'dra/ /ljags ni che zhing legs la pad+ma'i mdog /pad+ma 'drar snang pad+ma'i ze ba 'dra/ /zhal gyi mdzod spu pad+ma dung dang 'dra/ /bai DUr+ya yi mdog 'dra g.yas su 'khyil/ /thub pa'i zla ba phra zhing zla ba zad pa 'dra/ /sku

yi lte ba bung ba gsal ba bzhin/ /zhal mtho'i shangs ni rtag tu lhag ge ste/ /'jam zhing sa la'i gser ltar kha dog bzang / /rtag par rgyun du rgyal ba thams cad kyi/ /ro mchog 'jam zhing dam pa mchog rab 'phags/ /spu yi bu ga nas ni re re

skyes/ /spu rnams skyes pa g.yas su 'khyil pa ste/ /mthon mthing 'od 'bar 'tsher zhing lcang lo can/ /rma bya'i mgrin sdug 'dra bar sngo la mdzes/ /bltams ma thag tu sku yis snang bar bgyis/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dag ni thams cad gang / /'jig rten

gsum na sdug bsngal mtha' yas zhi/ /bde ba kun gyi sems can rnams kyang tshim/ /sems dmyal 'gro dang dud 'gro'i 'gro ba dang / /lha gnas mi yi 'gro rnams su/ /sems can de dag thams cad bde bas tshim/ /ngan song 'gro ba rnams ni

thams cad zhi/ /kha dog mdog bzang gser dang 'dra ba'i 'od/ /btso ma'i gser ltar rab tu snang ba'i sku/ /bde gshegs zla ba rab tu dri med zhal/ /'dzum zhing rnam mdzes shin tu dri med zhal/ /gzhon nu btsas 'drar sku lus yan lag 'jam/ /seng ge 'dra bar rtsal

gyis gnon pa'i mchog /phyag ring phyag ni rab tu ring ba ste/ /sA la'i lcug ma rlung gis bskyod pa bzhin/ /'dom gang 'od 'bar 'od zer rab tu gtong / /nyi ma stong ltar rab tu lhag ge'o/ /thub pa'i dbang po'i sku mchog dri ma med/ /zhing rnams mtha' yas thams cad rab tu snang / /

sangs rgyas 'od ni rnam par lhang nge bas/ /zhing rnams mtha' yas brgya stong rnams su yang / /mtshan byad zla ba nyi ma mang po dag /de dag thams cad 'od ni med par gyur/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma 'jig rten sgron ma ste/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma brgya phrag stong rnams ni/ /zhing rnams mtha'

yas stong phrag brgya dag na/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma sems can mthong / /bsod nams stong phrag brgya dang ldan pa'i sku/ /yon tan kun gyis rab tu brgyan pa'i sku/ /glang chen dbang po'i sna 'dra rgyal ba'i phyag /phyag dang zhabs 'od rab mdzes dri ma med/ /sa yi steng gi rdul

dang mtshungs 'dra snyed/ /phra ba'i rdul snyed sangs rgyas gang 'das dang / /gang dag phra ba'i rdul snyed byung ba dang / /gang dag phra ba'i rdul snyed bzhugs pa yi/ /rgyal ba de dag la ni rab dang ba'i/ /ngag yid lus kyis me tog dbul ba dang / /spos rnams dbul dang bsngags pa brgya

dag dang / /dge ba'i sems kyis kyang ni phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal ba'i yon tan gang dag dger gyur pa/ /snying po mchog rab sna tshogs du ma ste/ /bdag gis bskal pa stong du lce brgya yis/ /sangs rgyas yon tan brjod par mi nus so/ /rgyal ba gcig gi yon tan

rnams kyang ni/ /lce stong gis kyang cung zad brjod mi nus/ /bdag gis rgyal ba dag ni thams cad kyi/ /yon tan lce brgyas brjod par ga la nus/ /lhar bcas 'jig rten thams cad mtshor gyur te/ /srid pa'i rtse mo man chad chus gang ba/ /skra yi rtse mos dpag par nus

srid kyi/ /bde gshegs rnams kyi yon tan gcig la min/ /lus dang ngag yid rab tu dang ba yis/ /rgyal ba kun la bdag gis bsngags bstod pas/ /bdag gis bsod nams 'bras bu mchog bsags gang / /des ni sems can rgyal ba reg gyur cig /de ltar rgyal

pos sangs rgyas rnams bstod nas/ /rgyal po 'di ltar smon lam 'debs pa ni/ /ma 'ongs bskal pa mtha' yas rnams su yang / /gang dang gang du bdag ni skye ba na/ /rmi lam du ni 'di 'dra'i rnga blta zhing / /der ni bshags pa 'di 'dra mnyan par bgyi/ /rgyal bstod pad+ma 'byung

rgyal 'di 'dra ba/ /skye ba de dang der ni rnyed par bgyi/ /sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas mtshungs med dang / /gang yang bskal pa stong du rnyed dka' ba/ /de dag rmi lam du yang mnyan par bgyi/ /nyin gyur tshe yang de dag bshad par bgyi/ /sems can sdug bsngal mtsho las thar

bar bgyi/ /pha rol phyin pa drug po rdzogs par bgyi/ /phyi nas byang chub bla med thob par bgyi/ /bdag gi zhing ni lhod pa med gyur cig /rnga phul rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu dang / /rgyal ba thams cad la yang bstod pa'i rgyus/ /shAkya thub dbang mngon du blta bar bgyi/ /der ni bdag

gis lung bstan thob gyur cig /gser gyi lag pa'i dbang dang gser gyi 'od/ /bdag gi khye'u ni gang yin 'di gnyis kyang / /der ni bu pho de dag gnyi ga dang / /byang chub bla med lung bstan thob par shog /sems can gang dag gnas dang rten med cing / /

skyabs dang bral nas phongs par gyur pa dag /de dag la yang ma 'ongs dus rnams na/ /skyob dang dpung gnyen skyabs dang rten gyur shog /sdug bsngal kun 'byung zad par byed gyur cig /dge ba kun gyi 'byung gnas gyur par shog /sngon mtha' 'das pa de dag ji srid pa/ /ma

'ongs bskal par byang chub spyad par bgyi/ /gser 'od dam pa yi ni bshags pa yis/ /bdag gi sdig pa'i rgya mtsho bskams par shog /bdag gi las kyi rgya mtsho zad gyur cig /bdag gi nyon mongs rgya mtsho zad par shog /bdag gi bsod nams rgya mtsho rdzogs gyur

cig /ye shes dri med snang ba dam pa yi/ /bdag gi ye shes rgya mtsho rnam dag cing / /yon tan kun gyi rgya mtshor gyur par shog /byang chub yon tan rin chen rdzogs gyur cig /gser 'od dam pa'i bshags pa'i stobs kyis ni/ /bdag gi bsod nams rab tu snang bar shog /

bdag gi byang chub snang ba rnam dag gyur/ /ye shes dri med snang ba dam pa yi/ /bdag gi lus kyi 'od ni snang bar shog /bsod nams snang ba lhag ger bya ba'i phyir/ /'jig rten gsum na khyad par 'phags gyur cig /bsod nams stobs dang rtag tu ldan par shog /sdug

bsngal rgya mtsho las ni sgrol ba dang / /bde ba kun gyi rgya mtsho 'dra ba yis/ /ma 'ongs bskal par byang chub spyad par bgyi/ /'jig rten gsum na sngon mthar ji snyed gshegs/ /de dag zhing ni rgyal ba thams cad kyi/ /yon tan mtha' yas khyad 'phags ci 'dra ba/ /yon tan

mtha' yas rnams kyis bdag gi zhing / /ma 'ongs dus na de 'drar 'gyur bar shog /gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod pa me tog pad+ma'i 'byung gnas kyi le'u zhes bya ba ste

lnga pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /bsam gyis mi khyab mdo rnams gzhan dag tu/ /stong pa'i chos rnams rab tu rgyas bshad de/ /de lta bas na mdo mchog dam pa 'dir/ /stong pa'i chos rnams mdo tsam

bshad pa yin/ /sems can blo chung rnam par mi shes pas/ /chos rnams thams cad shes par mi nus te/ /de lta bas na mdo mchog dam pa 'dir/ /stong pa'i chos rnams mdo tsam rab tu bshad/ /sems can kun gyis ci nas shes 'gyur dang / /sems can 'byung

bya'i phyir ni snying rje'i dbang / /thabs dang tshul dang rgyu gzhan rnams kyis ni/ /mdo mchog dam pa dbang po 'di bshad do/ /lus 'di grong khyim stong pa ji bzhin te/ /dbang po rnams ni dmag dang chom rkun 'dra/ /de dag thams cad grong gcig gnas mod kyi/ /de dag

phan tshun rnam par mi shes so/ /mig gi dbang po gzugs gyur rnams la rgyug /rna ba'i dbang po sgra la rnam par spyod/ /sna yi dbang po sna tshogs dri rnams 'phrog /lce yi dbang po rtag tu ro la rgyug /lus kyi dbang po reg pa dag la rgyug /yid kyi dbang po chos rnams

rnam par spyod/ /dbang po drug po 'di dag phan tshun du/ /rang rang yul la rab tu 'jug par byed/ /sems ni sgyu ma lta bur g.yo ba yin/ /dbang po drug ni yul la rnam spyod de/ /ji ltar mi zhig grong stong rgyug pa dang / /dmag dang chom rkun dag dang gnas pa bzhin/ /ji

ltar sems ni yul drug gnas bcas shing / /dbang po'i spyod yul dag kyang rab shes pa/ /de ltar sems ni yul drug gnas bcas te/ /dbang po'i spyod yul rnams kyang rab tu shes/ /gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri rnams dang / /ro dang reg bya de bzhin spyod yul chos/ /

sems ni dbang po drug po thams cad la/ /dbang por bzhugs pa bya bzhin g.yo bar 'gyur/ /dbang po gang dang gang du gnas bcas pa/ /dbang po de ni shes par bdag nyid byed/ /lus ni g.yo ba med cing byed pa med/ /snying po med cing rkyen las byung ba yin/ /yang dag ma yin yongs

su rtog las byung / /grong stong las kyi 'khrul 'khor 'dra bar gnas/ /sa dang me dang chu dang rlung rnams ni/ /gzhan du gnas te phyogs dang phyogs na gnas/ /dper na sbrul gdug gnas gcig ji bzhin te/ /rtag tu phan tshun mthun pa ma yin bzhin/ /khams

kyi sbrul rnams bzhi po de dag kyang / /gnyis ni steng 'gro gnyis ni thur du 'gro/ /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su gnyis gnyis te/ /khams sbrul de dag thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/ /sa yi sbrul dang chu yi sbrul dag dang / /'di gnyis 'og tu zad par 'gyur ba yin/ /

me yi sbrul dang rlung gi sbrul dag dang / /'di gnyis steng gi nam mkhar 'gro ba yin/ /ji ltar sngon chad byas pa'i las rnams kyis/ /sems dang rnam shes kun tu gnas nas dong / /lha dang mi dang ngan song gsum dag tu/ /ji ltar byas pa'i las kyis srid par skye/ /bad kan

rlung dang mkhris pa zad gyur na/ /lus ni gcin dang ngan skyugs rnams kyis gang / /mngon par mi dga' srin bu'i phung por gyur/ /dur khrod dag na 'thor ba shing bzhin gyur/ /lha mo khyod ni chos 'di rnams la ltos/ /'di la sems can de bzhin gang zag dang / /chos rnams

'di dag thams cad stong pa ste/ /ma rig pa yi rkyen las byung ba yin/ /'byung ba chen po 'di dag che 'byung min/ /ma byung ba las byung zhing mi 'byung ste/ /gang gi phyir ni 'byung ba mi 'byung ba/ /de phyir 'byung ba che zhes ngas brjod do/ /yod pa min zhing gzhar yang yod min la/ /

ma rig pa yi rkyen las byung ba yin/ /ma rig 'di ni yod pa ma yin te/ /de bas ngas ni ma rig 'di bshad do/ /'du byed rnam shes ming dang gzugs bcas dang / /skye mched drug dang reg dang tshor ba dang / /sred dang len dang de bzhin srid pa dang / /skye dang rga shi mya ngan gnod pa rnams/ /

'khor ba'i sdug bsngal bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /'khor ba'i 'khor lo ji ltar gnas pa dag /ma byung ba las byung dang mi 'byung dang / /tshul bzhin ma yin sems kyis rnam dpyad dang / /bdag gi lta bar gyur par bcad par gyis/ /ye shes ral gris nyon mongs rgya mo grol/ /phung

po'i gnas la stong par gyur par ltos/ /byang chub yon tan rgya chen reg par gyis/ /ngas ni bdud rtsi grong khyer sgo yang phye/ /bdud rtsi khu ba'i snod kyang kun tu bstan/ /nga ni bdud rtsi'i grong khyer gnas der 'jug /ngas ni bdud rtsi'i khu bas bdag tshim byas/ /ngas ni chos kyi rnga chen dam

pa brdungs/ /ngas ni chos kyi dung gi mchog kyang bus/ /ngas ni chos kyi sgron ma mchog 'bar byas/ /ngas ni chos kyi char pa dam pa phab/ /nga ni nyon mongs dgra mchog rnams las rgyal/ /ngas ni chos kyi rgyal mtshan dam pa bsgreng / /srid pa'i mtsho las sems can rab tu bsgral/ /

ngas ni ngan song gsum gyi lam rnams bkag /sems can nyon mongs me yis gdungs gyur pa/ /rten med gyur cing dpung gnyen med pa dag /srog chags nyon mongs mes gdungs zhi byas nas/ /bdud rtsi'i khu ba bsil bas tshim par byas/ /gang phyir bskal pa

du mar sngon chad ngas/ /'dren pa bsam gyis mi khyab mchod pa byas/ /chos kyi sku de yongs su tshol ba na/ /brtul zhugs brtan pas byang chub phyir spyad de/ /lag pa dang ni mig dang rkang pa dang / /yan lag mchog dang bu sdug bu mo dang / /nor dbyig nor bu mu tig

rgyan dang gser/ /bai DUr+ya dang rin chen sna tshogs btang / /stong gsum shing ljon thams cad dang / /rtswa dang rtswa rnams thams cad dang / /nags tshal dag dang sa las ni/ /skye ba thams cad bcad gtubs te/ /de dag thams cad phyer brlag nas/ /rab tu phra ba'i rdul

'drar byas/ /nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor ji tsam par/ /phye ma'i phung po spungs nas ni/ /'di la cha gsum dbye bar nus/ /sa la rdul ni yod pa rnams/ /stong gsum dag ni thams cad kyi/ /rdul khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /sems can kun gyi shes pa gang / /

de ni sems can gcig gir gyur/ /shes pa de yis rdul rnams kyi/ /phye ma bgrang bar byed na ni/ /sems can kun las rab 'phags pa/ /ye shes rab ldan mi rnams kyis/ /thams cad bgrang bar nus srid kyi/ /rgyal ba'i mkhyen la mi nus so/ /thub pa chen po'i

ye shes gang / /skad cig gcig la 'jug pa yang / /bskal pa bye ba du mar ni/ /gang du'ang bgrang bar mi nus so/ /gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ stong pa nyid kyi le'u zhes bya ba ste drug pa'o// //de nas rgyal po chen po rnam

thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang rnams stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs

su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gzigs pa/ de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba/ lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis mchod pa/ lha'i dbang po'i tshogs thams cad kyis mngon par bstod pa/ 'jig rten skyong ba thams

cad kyis mchod cing bsngags pa brjod nas rab tu bkur ba/ lha'i khang khyim thams cad snang bar bgyid pa/ sems can thams cad la mchog tu bde ba rab tu sbyin par bgyid pa/ sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad

rab tu skems pa/ 'jigs pa thams cad kyi rgyun gcod pa/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad rab tu bzlog pa/ mu ge'i dgon pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ nad kyi dgon pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ gza' thams cad sel ba/ mchog tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ mya

ngan dang nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ gnod pa rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ gnod pa brgya stong rab tu 'joms par bgyid pa lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'khor gyi nang du rgya cher yang dag par rab tu

bshad na/ chos nyan pa chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa bzhi lha'i lus 'di gzi brjid chen pos rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /bdag cag gi lus la brtson pa dang stobs dang mthu yang skyed par 'gyur/ gzi brjid dang dpal

dang phun sum tshogs pa yang de dag gi lus la 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi ni chos dang ldan pa chos smra ba chos kyi rgyal po lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni chos kyis lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang

nam mkha' lding dang dri za dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyi rgyal po bgyi'o/ /'byung po'i tshogs mi bzad pa snying rje ma mchis pa gzhan gyi mdangs 'phrog pa rnams bzlog par bgyi'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gnod sbyin gyi

sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu rtag par rgyun du lha'i mig rnam par dag pa/ mi las 'das pas 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad la blta bar bgyi/ bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyang bar bgyi ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das

de'i slad du/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi 'jig rten skyong zhes ming du chags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang su dag 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis yul 'joms par 'gyur ram/ mu ge'i gnod pa'am/ nad kyi gnod pa'am/ gnod pa sna

tshogs brgya dang gnod pa stong dang gnod pa brgya phrag stong dag gis gtses par 'gyur ba na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa'i dge slong chos smra ba de dag la bskul ba bgyi'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan

'das nam bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis rdzu 'phrul dang byin gyi rlabs kyis dge slong chos smra ba de dag la bkur ba na/ yul gang dang gang du mchi bar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yul de dang de dag tu rgya cher yang dag par ston par 'gyur te/ gang gnod pa sna tshogs

brgya dang gnod pa stong yul du 'byung ba 'di lta bu 'di dag rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po gang gi yul du mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa'i dge slong chos smra ba de dag mchi bar 'gyur ba'i yul de dag tu gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i

dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yang bsnyen par 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam mi'i rgyal pos gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan te thos nas/ mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa'i dge slong de dag phyir rgol ba thams cad las kun tu bsrung bar bgyid/ yongs

su bskyab pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa dang / yongs su skyong bar bgyid na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis/ mi'i rgyal po'i yul de thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kun tu bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su

gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal pos nam/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa la/ bde bar sbyar ba thams cad

kyis bde bar bgyid na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis/ mi'i rgyal po de'i yul thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams la bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis/ bde ba dang yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs par bgyi'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam

mi'i rgyal pos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa la bsti stang du bgyid/ bla mar bgyid/ rim gror bgyid cing mchod na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis/ mi'i rgyal po de la rgyal po

thams cad pas ches bsti stang du bgyi/ ches bla mar bgyi/ ches rim gror bgyi/ ches mchod par bgyi ste yul thams cad du yang rab tu bsngags par bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la legs so zhes bya ba byin te rgyal po chen po dag legs so legs so/ /

rgyal po chen po khyod yang legs so legs so/ /'di lta ste khyod ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa chos dang ldan pa chos smra ba chos kyis lha dang mi rnams kyi rgyal po byas pa'o/ /

'di lta ste khyod ni yun ring por sems can thams cad la phan pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ bde ba dang byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa/ mi phan pa thams cad 'gog pa/ sems can thams cad la bde ba

thams cad nye bar bsgrub par brtson pa yin te/ rgyal po chen po khyed bzhis/ mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa dang rim gro byed par brtson pa de dag la kun tu bsrung bar gyis shig /yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su

bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar gyis shig /de nas rgyal po chen po dpung dang / g.yog dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dang bcas pa khyed bzhis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams

kyis chos kyi tshul kun tu bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /yongs su bskyang ba dang yongs su gzung bar yang 'gyur ro/ /de nas rgyal po chen po dpung dang / g.yog dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dang bcas pa khyed bzhi lha dang lha ma yin du g.yul 'gyed pa na rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /lha ma yin

rnams pham par 'gyur ro/ /'di ltar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad 'dul bar byed pa 'di'i phyir/ dge slong ngam dge slong ma'am dge bsnyen nam dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa/ de dag la kun tu bsrung ba gyis shig /yongs su

bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar gyis shig /de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang stan las langs

te/ gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gser 'od dam pa

mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ yul 'khor ram/ pho brang 'khor gang du spyod par 'gyur ba dang / mi'i rgyal po gang dang gang gi yul du spyod par 'gyur ba dang / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal por gyur pa gang la la

zhig lha'i dbang po'i dam tshig rgyal po'i bstan bcos 'dis/ rgyal po bgyid cing rtag par rgyun du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan tam/ rim gro bgyid dam/ mchod pa bgyid dam/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo

sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'dzin pa de dag la yang bsti stang bgyid/ btsun par bgyid/ rim gror bgyid cing mchod de rtag par rgyun du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyan na/ chos mnyan pa'i chu bo'i chu chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / g.yog

rnams dang gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma'i lha'i lus 'di dag gzi brjid chen po rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/ bdag cag la brtson 'grus dang mthu dang stobs chen por yang bgyid par 'gyur/ bdag gi gzi brjid dang dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /

btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dang lus bltar mi gda' bar bgyis te/ da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ yul 'khor ram/ pho brang

'khor gang na/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di spyod par 'gyur ba de dag tu mchi bar bgyi'o/ /mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan pa dang / rim gro bgyid pa dang / mchod pa bgyid pa de dag la kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /yongs su

bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o/ /rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dag dang yul 'khor de dag dang yul de dag kyang kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs

su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o/ /yul de dag kyang 'jig pa dang gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar bgyi'o/ /pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams kyang slar bzlog par bgyi'o/ /

mi'i rgyal po gang la la gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan pa dang / rim gro bgyid pa dang / mchod pa bgyid pa de'i dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po gzhan zhig mchis la/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po de 'di snyam du bdag dpung gi

tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu yul der song ste/ yul de rnam par gzhig go snyam du sems bskyed na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe de'i dus na/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i gzi brjid kyi mthus dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po de rgyal po gzhan

dag dang g.yul 'gyed par 'gyur/ rang gi yul du phyin na yang / yul 'khrug par 'gyur/ rgyal po'i 'khrug pa mi bzad pa yang 'byung bar 'gyur/ yul du gza' dang nad kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/ yul du brel ba sna tshogs brgya dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa

bcom ldan 'das nam dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po de rang gi yul du phyin pa na/ gnod pa sna tshogs brgya dang brel ba sna tshogs brgya 'di lta bu 'byung ngo / /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po de yan lag bzhi pa'i dmag bsogs te/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs

su mchi ba'i slad du rang gi yul nas byung ste/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu yul der mchi 'tshal ba dang / gang na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di gnas pa'i yul de rnam par gzhig 'tshal bar gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag

cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa/ gnod sbyin brgya stong du ma dang lhan cig tu lus mi gda' bar bgyis te der mchi bar bgyi'o/ /pha rol gyi dmag tshogs de yul du zhugs pa las kyang / de nyid nas ldog par bgyi'o/ /brel ba rnam pa sna tshogs

brgya dag kyang nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /bgegs kyang bgyi'o/ /'di lta ste yul der pha rol dmag tshogs de mchi bar yang mi nus na/ yul gzhig par bgyid par lta ga la 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/

rgyal po chen po dag legs so legs so/ /rgyal po chen po dag khyed yang legs te/ khyed bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du yang dag par bsgrubs te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di'i phyir/ mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i

dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang / rim gro byed pa dang / mchod pa byed pa de dag la kun tu bsrung ba gyis shig /yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar gyis shig /rgyal po'i

pho brang 'khor de dag dang / grong khyer de dag dang / yul 'khor de dag dang / yul de dag kyang kun tu srungs shig /yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar gyis shig /yul de dag

kyang 'jigs pa dang gnod pa dang 'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar gyis shig /pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams kyang zlog cig /'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i mi'i rgyal po dag mi 'thab pa dang / mtshang mi 'dru ba dang / mi rtsod pa dang / mi 'gyed par bya ba la

spro bar gyis shig /rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa khyed bzhi'i 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir nam grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag na/ rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag rang rang gi yul la mngon par dga' ba dang / rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug des mngon par dga' ba dang / rang gi

nor gyi phung pos phan tshun rnam par mi 'tshe ba dang / phan tshun rnam par 'tshe ba mi bskyed pa dang / rang gis ji ltar sngon gyi las bsags pas rgyal po thob pa'i rang gi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug gis dga' ba dang / phan tshun du yul 'jig par mi byed pa dang / yul gzhig pa'i phyir pha rol

gyi gnod pa dang / nam 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong dag na rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag phan tshun du byams pa'i sems su 'gyur/ byams pa'i sems dang phan pa'i sems su 'gyur te/ phan tshun du mi 'thab mtshang mi 'dru mi rtsod mi 'gyed par rang rang gi yul

dag na dga' bar 'gyur na/ de'i phyir rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa khyed bzhi 'dzam bu'i gling 'di rgyas par 'gyur/ lo legs par 'gyur/ nyams dga' bar 'gyur/ skye bo mang po dang mis gang bar 'gyur/ sa yang mdangs can du 'gyur/ dus dang zla ba dang zla ba

phyed dang lo khyud kor thams cad kyang yang dag pa'i dus dang ldan par 'gyur/ gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma yang nyin mtshan du legs par rgyu bar 'gyur/ char pa'i rgyun yang sa la dus dus su 'bab par 'gyur/ 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can

rnams kyang nor dang 'bru thams cad 'byor par 'gyur/ longs spyod che ba dang / ser sna med par 'gyur/ gtong ba dang ldan par 'gyur/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par 'gyur/ phal cher bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur/ lha'i khang khyim rnams kyang lha dang

lha'i bu rnams kyis gang bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po dag gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur la gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan par gyur te/ rim gro byas/ mchod pa byas/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang

po 'dzin pa de dag la yang bsti stang byed/ bla mar byed/ rim gror byed/ mchod par byed cing / rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa gnod sbyin stong phrag du ma la snying brtse ba'i phyir rtag par rgyun du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan na/ chos nyan pa'i chu'i

klung chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis khyed cag gi lus 'di dag tshim par 'gyur ro/ /khyed kyi lha'i lus 'di dag gi gzi byin chen po yang rnam par 'phel lo/ /khyed kyi brtson 'grus dang mthu dang stobs kyang bskyed do/ /khyed kyi gzi brjid dang dpal dang phun sum tshogs

pa yang rnam par 'phel lo/ /mi'i rgyal po des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa nga la yang mchod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rgya chen po yangs pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /mi'i rgyal po des 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i de

bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma la yang yo byad bsam gyis mi khyab pa rgya che ba yangs pa thams cad kyis mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /des na mi'i rgyal po de la bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro/ /des na mi'i rgyal po de la kun tu bsrung ba dang / yongs su

bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /btsun mo dam pa dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor thams cad kyang bsrung ba chen

po byas par 'gyur/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba byas par 'gyur/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor na gnas pa'i lha thams cad kyang ches gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang / ches stobs dang

ldan pa dang / bde ba dang yid bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ dga' ba sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur/ grong khyer de dag dang yul 'khor de dag kyang kun tu bsrung bar 'gyur/ yongs su bskyang bar 'gyur/ gnod pa med par 'gyur/ dgra med par 'gyur/ pha rol gyi dmag

tshogs thams cad kyis mi rdzi ba dang gnod pa med pa dang 'khrug pa med par 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang de dag

gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po gang la la zhig gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yang nyan par 'tshal bar 'gyur/ bdag nyid la yang bsrung ba chen po bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ btsun mo dam pa dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / rgyal

po'i bu mo rnams dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs rnams la yang bsrung ba chen po bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dag thams cad la yang zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa mchog tu khyad par du 'phags pa bla na med pa bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/

tshe 'di la bdag gi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par 'phel bar bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ rgyal po nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu ma mchis pa yongs su 'dzin 'tshal bar 'gyur/ bdag gi yul thams

cad kyang kun tu bsrung 'tshal bar 'gyur/ yongs su bskyang 'tshal bar 'gyur/ rang gi yul na gnod pa ma mchis pa dang / dgra ma mchis pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis mi rdzi ba dang / nad 'go ba ma mchis pa dang / 'khrug pa ma mchis par bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur na/

btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po des g.yeng ba ma mchis pa'i sems dang gus pa dang bcas pa dang ri mo dang bcas pas gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di bsti stang du bgyid de mnyan par bgyi'o/ /gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan pa'i slad du/ mi'i

rgyal po des rgyal po'i pho brang khyad par du 'phags par mchi bar bgyi'o/ /der mchis nas kyang rgyal po'i pho brang spos chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag gdab cing me tog sil ma sna tshogs dgram par bgyi'o/ /spos chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag btab pa der chos kyi khri mthon po rgyan sna tshogs kyis

legs par brgyan pa bsham par bgyi'o/ /phyogs der gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan par bgyi'o/ /mi'i rgyal po des lus bkru bar bgyi'o/ /gos dri rab tu bda' ba gos sar pa mdzes pa bgos nas rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan par bgyi'o/ /

bdag gi stan rab tu dma' ba gding bar bgyi ste/ stan de la mchis nas rgyal po'i rgyags pas dregs par mi bgyi'o/ /der rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la chags par mi bgyi'o/ /rgyags pa dang nga rgyal dang dregs pa thams cad rnam par spangs pa'i sems kyis gser

'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bgyi'o/ /dge slong chos smra ba de la yang ston par 'du shes bskyed par bgyi'o/ /mi'i rgyal po des de'i tshe de'i dus na/ btsun mo dam pa dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / rgyal po'i bu mo rnams dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs rnams la

sdug pa dang phan pas blta bar bgyi'o/ /btsun mo dam pa dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / rgyal po'i bu mo rnams la tshig snyan pa smra bar bgyi'o/ /btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad la yang tshig snyan pa smra bar bgyi'o/ /chos nyan pa'i mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs sbyor du stsal bar bgyi'o/ /

dga' ba bsam gyis mi khyab cing mtshungs pa ma mchis pas bdag tshim par bgyi'o/ /dga' ba dang bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas bde bar bgyi'o/ /dbang po bde bar bgyi'o/ /bdag nyid don chen po thob par bsam par bgyi'o/ /bdag dga' ba chen pos dga' bar bgyi'o/ /

rab tu dga' ba chen po bskyed nas chos smra ba bsu bar bgyi'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rgyal po chen po dag de'i tshe de'i dus na/ mi'i rgyal po des gos thams cad dkar po sar pa mdzes pa bgo bar

bya'o/ /spud pa dang rgyan sna tshogs kyis bdag legs par brgyan par bya'o/ /gdugs dkar po yang gzung bar bya'o/ /rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang rgyal po'i bkod pa chen pos bkra shis tha dad pa sna tshogs thogs te/ rgyal po'i pho brang de nas byung la chos smra ba bsu ba'i phyir der

'gro bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi'i rgyal pos der gom pa ji snyed bor ba de snyed kyi bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi 'khor ba phyir bsnyil bar 'gyur/ de snyed kyi 'khor los sgyur pa'i rgyal rigs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong thob par 'gyur/ der gom pa ji snyed bor ba de snyed du tshe 'di

la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'phel bar 'gyur/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mar gnas yangs shing rgya che ba lha'i gzhal med khang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa dag thob par 'gyur/ mi rnams kyi rgyal rigs lha'i rgya che zhing rgya che ba

brgya stong phrag du ma thob par 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad du dbang phyug chen po thob par 'gyur/ tshe ring bar 'gyur/ yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur/ spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ tshig gzung bar 'os par 'gyur/ grags pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ brjod pa shin tu rgya che bar 'gyur/

bsngags par 'os par 'gyur/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten la phan par 'gyur/ lha dang mi rnams kyi bde ba rgya che zhing rgya che ba thob par 'gyur/ stobs che bar 'gyur/ tshan po che chen po'i stobs kyi shugs dang ldan zhing gzugs bzang bar 'gyur/ mdzes

pa dang blta na sdug pa dang / kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan par 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad par 'gyur/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams rnyed par 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa yongs su gzung bar 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po dag

yon tan gyi phan yon 'di lta bu dag mthong nas/ mi'i rgyal po des dpag tshad tsam du chos smra ba bsu bar bya/ dpag tshad brgya dang / dpag tshad stong du yang bsu bar bya/ chos smra ba de la ston par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/ /'di snyam du yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa

yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa deng bdag gi rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /deng de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa bdag gi rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir bshos gsol bar 'gyur ro/ /deng bdag gis de

bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i chos 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa mnyan par bya'o/ /deng bdag gis chos nyan pa 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par bya'o/ /deng bdag gis de bzhin gshegs

pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma mnyes par byas par 'gyur ro/ /deng bdag gis 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa yangs shing rgya che ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /deng bdag

gis sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad shin tu rgyun bcad par 'gyur ro/ /deng bdag gis tshangs pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma 'thob pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon

bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /deng bdag gis brgya byin nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma thob pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /deng bdag gis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma 'thob pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa

bon bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /deng bdag gis bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar byas par 'gyur ro/ /deng bdag gis bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa bla na med pa yangs shing rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su gzung bar 'gyur/

deng bdag gis btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad la bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro/ /deng bdag gis rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa mchog tu khyad par du 'phags pa bla na med pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /deng bdag gis yul 'di

thams cad kun tu bsrungs par 'gyur ro/ /yongs su bskyangs pa dang / gnod pa med pa dang / dgra med pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad kyis mi rdzi ba dang / nad 'go ba med pa dang / 'khrug pa med par 'gyur ro snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o/ /rgyal po chen po

dag dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'dzin pa dag la mi'i rgyal po de dam pa'i chos la gus pa 'di lta bus bsti stang byed/ bla mar byed/ rim gror byed/ mchod pa byed cing / rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi

dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / lha'i tshogs de dag dang gnod sbyin brgya stong du ma dag la shas kyi dam pa byin na/ mi'i rgyal po de bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa dang / dge ba mngon par 'du byed pa dang / tshe 'di'i lus kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa

des rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe 'di la rgyal po'i gzi brjid chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /dpal dang phun sum tshogs pa dang gzi brjid kyis kyang brgyan par 'gyur ro/ /phyir rgol ba thams cad dang dgra thams cad chos dang mthun pas shin tu tshar gcod

par 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur la/ de chos la gus pa de lta bus gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po

nyan la dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'dzin pa de dag la yang bsti stang bgyid/ bla mar bgyid/ rim gror bgyid/ mchod pa bgyid cing / rgyal po chen po bdag cag gi slad du rgyal po'i pho brang de shin tu dag par phyag

dar bgyid/ spos chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag legs par 'debs la/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang lhan cig thun mong du chos nyan pa de nyan cing bdag dang lha thams cad kyi slad du dge ba'i rtsa bar shas cung zad cig sbyin pa bgyid na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dge slong

chos smra ba de chos kyi stan la mchis ma thag tu mi'i rgyal po des bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi'i don gyi slad du spos sna tshogs kyis bdug par bgyi'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po de la mchod pa'i slad du bdug pas bdugs ma thag

tu spos sna tshogs rnams las spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la bdag cag rgyal po chen po bdag cag bzhi'i rang rang gi khang pa'i steng gi bar snang la spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag gi gdugs rnams

su gnas par 'gyur/ spos dri rgya chen po yang mnam par 'gyur/ gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhing snang ba des bdag cag gi khang pa rnams kyang snang ba bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi

'khri shing dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / lha mo chen mo dbyangs can dang / lha mo chen mo brtan ma dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad

dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nor bu bzang dang / 'phrog ma'i bu lnga brgya'i 'khor dang ldan pa dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po rgya mtsho dang / de dag gi

rang rang gi khang pa'i steng gi bar snang la byung ste/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing gi gdugs rnams su gnas par 'gyur/ spos dri sna tshogs rgya chen po yang mnam par 'gyur/ khang pa rnams kyi nang du gser du snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhing snang ba des gnas thams cad snang ba

bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rgyal po chen po dag rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi'i rang rang gi khang pa rnams kyi steng gi bar snang la spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing de dag gdugs

rnams su gnas par ma zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po chen po dag mi'i rgyal po des gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa'i phyir/ spos sna tshogs de dag gis bdugs ma thag tu lag na spos snod gcig thogs pa de las spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri

shing rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad na gang na zla ba bye ba phrag brgya dang / nyi ma bye ba phrag brgya dang / rgya mtsho chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang / ri'i rgyal po ri rab bye ba phrag brgya dang / ri'i rgyal po

khor yug dang / khor yug chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang / gling bzhi pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgya dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha bye ba phrag brgya nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min du nye bar song ba'i bar gyi lha bye ba

phrag brgya dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad du sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris bye ba phrag brgya po thams cad na lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i

tshogs rnams kyi rang rang gi khang pa dag gi steng gi bar snang la spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing de dag gdugs rnams su gnas par 'gyur/ spos dri rgya chen po yang mnam par 'gyur/ lha'i khang pa rnams su gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba yang 'byung bar 'gyur zhing snang ba des kyang

lha'i khang pa rnams snang ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po dag 'di ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na lha'i khang pa thams cad kyi steng gi bar snang la spos dang bdug pa'i 'khri shing de dag gdugs rnams su gnas pa de bzhin du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i

dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa'i phyir mi'i rgyal po des spos sna tshogs de dag gis bdugs ma thag tu gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i gzi brjid kyi mthus spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la

kun tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams du ma gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong rnams su de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi steng gi bar snang la spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri

shing gi gdugs rnams su gnas par 'gyur/ de dag kyang sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma la spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs rgya che zhing rgya che ba mnam par 'gyur/ gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhing snang ba des kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag

du ma gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag snang ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po dag cho 'phrul de lta bu de dag byung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag chos smra ba de la dgongs par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa

legs so legs so/ /skyes bu dam pa khyod gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po'i tshul 'di lta bu/ zab mor snang ba 'di lta bu'i yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa dang 'di lta bu 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu 'chad par 'dod pa khyod yang legs so legs so zhes bya ba

sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /su tha na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa'i sems can de dag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan par mi 'gyur na/ gang dag 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / 'chad pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 'khor la rgya cher
