pa dang / 'joms pa'i 'jigs pa dang / pha rol gyi dgra'i tshogs kyi 'jigs pa dang / mu ge'i 'jigs pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa dang / sa g.yo ba'i 'jigs pa dang / gcan gzan khro bo'i 'jigs pa las bdag bde legs su gyur cig /lha'i 'jigs pa dang / klu'i

'jigs pa dang / lha ma yin gyi 'jigs pa dang / rlung lha'i 'jigs pa dang / nam mkha' lding gi 'jigs pa dang / dri za'i 'jigs pa dang / mi 'am ci'i 'jigs pa dang / lto 'phye chen po'i 'jigs pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi 'jigs pa dang / srin po'i 'jigs pa dang / yi

dgas kyi 'jigs pa dang / sha za'i 'jigs pa dang / 'byung po'i 'jigs pa dang / grul bum gyi 'jigs pa dang / srul po'i 'jigs pa dang / lus srul po'i 'jigs pa dang / skem byed kyi 'jigs pa dang / smyo byed kyi 'jigs pa dang / grib gnon gyi 'jigs pa dang / brjed

byed kyi 'jigs pa dang / gnon po'i 'jigs pa las bdag bde legs su gyur cig /gshed byed dang / sgyur ba'i las dang / byad dang / g.yengs byed dang / ro langs dang / sems sgyur ba dang / sbod gtong dang / bza' nyes dang / skyug nyes dang / gnod sgrib dang / gnod

bltas dang / bri nyes dang / bsgom nyes dang / smad pa'i 'jigs pa las bdag bde legs su gyur cig /shu ba dang / g.ya' ba dang / mdze dang / 'brum bu phra mo dang / phol mig dang / g.yan pa dang / me dbal dang / lhog pa'i 'jigs pa las bdag bde legs su gyur cig /

mtshan mo bde legs nyin bde legs/ /nyi ma'i gung gi bde legs dang / /nyin mtshan kun gyi bde legs dag /sangs rgyas kun gyis bdag la stsol/ /sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal byang chub phyag 'tshal lo/ /grol gyur phyag 'tshal grol la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhi gyur phyag 'tshal zhi la

phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnam grol phyag 'tshal grol la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bram ze gang dag sdig pa'i chos rnams bsal bar gyur pa de dag la yang phyag 'tshal lo/ /de dag gis kyang bdag la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa gyis shig swA hA/ kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo

'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis gsungs pa'o/ /tad+ya thA/ a ra De/ ka ra De/ ma de/ ma da bar d+ha ni/ a ba re/ sha ba re/ tu re tu re/ tsu re tsu re/ sha ba re/ par+Na sha ba re/ hu tsi hu tsi mu tsi mu tsi swA hA/ kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi

rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gtsug tor can gyis gsungs pa'o/ /tad+ya thA/ iT+Te/ miT+Te/ khu re bi khu re/ hi li hi li/ mi li mi li/ ke tu mU le/ am+ba re/ am+ba rA/ ba ti/ dum+be/ do dum+be/ hi li hi li/ ku tsi ku tsi/ mu tsi mu tsi swA hA/ kun

dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad skyob kyis gsungs pa'o/ /tad+ya thA/ mo ri mo ri/ ke baT+Te/ N+De/ maN+Di/ ti ke/ ha re ha re/ g+ha re g+ha re/ kha re kha re/ hi li hi li ni/ ha la ha la ni/ pha le pha le/ pha li ni/ dan+te/

dan+ti ni/ dan+ti le/ sha ka Ti/ ma ka Ti/ ma ka Ti/ na De/ na Di ni/ shi ri shi ri/ shi ri shi ri/ shi ri shi ri swA hA/ kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig gis gsungs pa'o/ /tad+ya thA/ hi Di mi Di/ ku Di/ mu Di/ tu Di/

A Di/ dan+ti/ dan+ti le/ sha ka ri/ tsa ka ri/ tha ga ri/ ta ga ri/ kAny+tsi ni/ kany+tsa nA ba ti/ ba re ba re/ ba re ba re/ dan+te sid+d+hi swA hA/ kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser thub kyis gsungs pa'o/ /tad+ya thA/ tat+ta le ta ta le/ ta la to ta

le/ bI re/ bi dza ye/ bidz+dza d+ha re/ a ra dze/ bi ra dze/ bi rA dzA/ ma si/ ma ti/ mA li ni/ muN+Ti/ shrI muN+Di/ dz+wa le dz+wa le/ dz+wa le dz+wa le/ b+ha ga ba ti/ sid+d+hi swA hA/ kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis gsungs pa'o/ /tad+ya

thA/ aN+Dare/ kaN+Da re/ maN+Da re/ khaN+Da re/ dzam+bu/ dzam+bu na di/ dzam+bu ba ti/ mat+te/ maN+Di ti ke /a ma re/ sid+d+he/ ha ra ha ra/ ha ra ha ra/ pa shu pa shu/ pa shu pa shu/ pa shu pa ti sid+d+hi swA hA/ kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub

pa ngas sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir da ltar bshad pa'o/ /tad+ya thA/ hi li mi li/ ki li mi li/ i li le/ ka ta le/ ke tU mU le/ a Ta ma li/ Dab+se/ Da Dab+se/ bu sa ra ke /bu sa Te/ na ra kan+te/ kA mi Ni/ kam+bu/ da ra ki ru ru ta ra/ ba ra Ni/ pra kr-i ti/ dAMSh+Te/ mi li ta le/

hi ti hA se/ a ba le/ tu ba le/ pi laM ke /baT+Ti baT+Ti ti ke /a Dan+hu be/ ba Ti tum+me/ phyogs bcu kun tu lhas char phob shig /bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sa la dga' bas chu dbab tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo/ /i ri dza ye/ go do hi kA ye/

b+h+ring+ga ri kA ye/ a ru tsi/ na ru tsi/ naT+Te/ badzre badzre naT+Te/ u da ya na/ pri ye/ a le ta le/ ku la tA le/ nA rA ya Ni/ pA rA ya Ni/ pa sh+ya ni/ spar+sha ni/ 'gro lding ba'i gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams grub par gyur cig swA hA/ ci ltar de bzhin gshegs pa ngas bstan cing rjes su yi

rangs nas dge slong kun dga' bos dge slong sa ri la bde legs su 'gyur bar byas pa de bzhin du bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig /sba ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang /

mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / dug gsad pa dang / mtshams gcad pa dang / sa bcing ba gyis shig /lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig /ston brgya mthong bar shog shig /kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' byams pas bshad

cing rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /tad+ya thA/ shi ri shi ri shi ri/ b+ha dre/ dz+yo ti dz+yo ti dz+yo ti b+ha dre/ ha re ha re ha re/ hA ri Ni/ dan+ti/ sha ba re/ shi be/ shU la pA Ni ni/ bo d+hi bo d+hi/ bo d+hi bo d+hi/ be d+hi be d+hi/ sa twe bo d+hi/ pa ri tsA ra ni ye swA hA/ kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo

'di ni mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas smras shing rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /tad+ya thA/ hi li hi li/ mi li mi li/ mi li ni/ tsaM ka ri/ ki ri ki ri ki ri ki ri ki ri ki ri ki ra ye/ brah+mA ye/ rat+na ka raN+Da ke/ be Do hu phus+sa/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sa ra sa ra/ ha ra ha ra/ ha la ha la/ phu ru phu ru/

phu ru phu ru phu ru phu ru swA hA/ dug bcom mo/ /dug nges par bcom mo/ /sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid kyis dug nges par bcom mo/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid kyis dug bcom mo/ /dgra bcom pa'i gzi brjid kyis dug bcom mo/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i gzi

brjid kyis dug bcom mo/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i gzi brjid kyis dug bcom mo/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i gzi brjid kyis dug bcom mo/ /bden par smra ba'i gzi brjid kyis dug bcom mo/ /tshangs pa'i me dbal gyi gzi brjid kyis dug bcom mo/ /dbang po rdo rje'i gzi

brjid kyis dug bcom mo/ /khyab 'jug gi 'khor los dug bcom mo/ /gshin rje'i be con gyis dug bcom mo/ /chu lha'i zhags pas dug bcom mo/ /lha ma yin gyi sgyus dug bcom mo/ /klu'i rig sngags kyis dug bcom mo/ /drag po'i mdung rtses dug bcom mo/ /

skem byed kyi mdung thung gis dug bcom mo/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mos dug bcom mo/ /dug nges par bcom mo/ /dug sa'i nang du song shig /bdag dug thams cad dang / be'u lta bu'i dug dang / ha la ha la'i dug dang / nag po brtsegs pa'i dug dang / mche

ba'i dug dang / rtsa ba'i dug dang / kha zas kyi dug dang / phye ma'i dug dang / lta ba'i dug dang / glog gi dug dang / sprin gyi dug dang / sbrul dang / byi ba dang / srin bu ki ta dang / lu ta dang / ka na b+ha ba dang / sbal pa dang / sbrang bu dang / bung ba dang / ba ta ri dang / tre ma

bu ga dang / trai la ta'i dug dang / mi'i dug dang / sdig pa'i dug dang / mi ma yin pa'i dug dang / dogs pa'i dug dang / sman gyi dug dang / rig sngags kyi dug las bde legs su gyur cig /dug thams cad las bdag bde legs su gyur cig /kun dga' bo rig sngags

kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis smras shing rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /tad+ya thA/ dza lA/ dzan+tu le mA lA/ dzan+tu le/ tsa pe Ti/ dzan+tu le/ ma tha ni/ g+ha ta ni/ gra sa ni/ ha ri shi ri/ hu ti shi ri/ ta ru ta ru Na ba ti/ ha ha ha ha ha/ sing he/ d+hi ti d+hi ti/ ku ru ku ru/ bas

re badzre/ tu Ta tu Ta si/ ba Ta ba Ta si/ si li si li/ ka pi li/ ka pi li/ mU le/ hA hI hU/ sdang ba dang / rab tu sdang ba thams cad rab tu rmugs par bya'o/ /lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / yan lag dang / nying lag dang / sum cu pa'i lha dang bcas te chad pas gcad par bya'o/ /

uSh+Ti gi ni/ su ra pa te/ brti/ badzra badzra badzra badzra badzra pa ta ye swA hA/ kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni rgyal po chen po bzhis smras shing rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /tad+ya thA/ dz+wa la dz+wa la na/ ta pa ta pa na/ ma tha ma tha na/ d+ha ma d+ha ma na/ sa ra sa ra Na/ ki Ti ki Ti/

ku Ti ku Ti/ mu Ti mu Ti/ mi Ti mi Ti/ pi Ti pi Ti/ sa ra sa ra/ ma ra ma ra/ ha ra ha ra/ ta ra ta ra/ ti ri ti ri/ TA TA TA TA TA/ dA dA dA dA dA/ bA bA bA bA bA/ ha la ha la ha la ha la ha la/ sid+d+hi/ sid+d+hi/ sid+d+hi/ sid+d+hi/ sid+d+hi/ swa sti/ swa sti/ swa sti/ swa sti/ swa sti/ sbod gtong dang /

gshin rje'i pho nya dang / mtshan mo nag mo dang / dus kyi zhags pa dang / 'chi bdag gi chad pa dang / tshangs pa'i chad pa dang / dbang po'i chad pa dang / drang srong gi chad pa dang / lha'i chad pa dang / klu'i chad pa dang / lha ma yin gyi chad pa dang / rlung lha'i chad pa dang / nam mkha'

lding gi chad pa dang / dri za'i chad pa dang / mi 'am ci'i chad pa dang / lto 'phye chen po'i chad pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi chad pa dang / srin po'i chad pa dang / kyi chad pa dang / sha za'i chad pa dang / 'byung po'i chad pa dang / grul bum gyi chad pa dang / srul po'i chad pa dang /

lus srul po'i chad pa dang / skem byed kyi chad pa dang / smyo byed kyi chad pa dang / grib gnon gyi chad pa dang / brjed byed kyi chad pa dang / gnon po'i chad pa dang / ro langs kyi chad pa dang / rgyal po'i chad pa dang / chom rkun gyi chad pa dang / me'i chad pa dang / chu'i chad pa dang /

chad pa thams cad las bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig /lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig /ston brgya mthong bar shog shig /kun dga' bo khyod kyis klung gi rgyal po rnams kyi ming zung shig /'di lta ste/ klung gi rgyal po gang gA dang / klung gi rgyal po sin d+hu dang / klung gi rgyal po pak+Shu dang / klung

gi rgyal po sI ta dang / klung gi rgyal po mda' 'byung dang / klung gi rgyal po khyim ldan dang / klung gi rgyal po gshin rje sel dang / klung gi rgyal po gya gyu dang / klung gi rgyal po rgyas 'bab dang / klung gi rgyal po zhags bral dang / klung gi rgyal po zhi ba 'dzin dang / klung gi

rgyal po sa ldan dang / klung gi rgyal po zla ba'i cha dang / klung gi rgyal po dbyangs can dang / klung gi rgyal po rus sbal can dang / klung gi rgyal po chu dron can dang / klung gi rgyal po chu mchog can dang / klung gi rgyal po zangs 'dab dang / klung gi rgyal po sbrang rtsi can dang / klung gi rgyal po

spa ldan dang / klung gi rgyal po bu ram shing ldan dang / klung gi rgyal po ba lang ldan dang / klung gi rgyal po 'phags pa can dang / klung gi rgyal po rtse sbyin dang / klung gi rgyal po mdza' bzang dang / klung gi rgyal po kun gyi bshes dang / klung gi rgyal po 'chi med dang / klung gi rgyal po me tog

pad+ma dang / klung gi rgyal po rnga len dang / klung gi rgyal po dngos bzang dang / klung gi rgyal po rab bzang dang / klung gi rgyal po dka' thub sbyin dang / klung gi rgyal po dri bral dang / klung gi rgyal po skyon bral dang / klung gi rgyal po klung chen dang / klung gi rgyal po gser ldan dang /

klung gi rgyal po ba lang sbyin mchog can dang / klung gi rgyal po gsang srung dang / klung gi rgyal po ba lang can dang / de dag dang gzhan yang gang dag sa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir 'bab pa'i chu klung de dag thams cad la gang dag rgyun du gnas pa dang / gzugs tha dad pa/ gzugs mi sdug

pa/ gzugs mang ba/ gzugs mtha' yas pa/ 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can/ gzugs sna tshogs pa'i lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / rlung lha rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / dri za rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams dang /

mi'am ci rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / srin po rnams dang / rnams dang / sha za rnams dang / 'byung po rnams dang / grul bum rnams dang / srul po rnams dang / lus srul po rnams dang / skem byed rnams dang / smyo byed rnams dang / grib gnon rnams

dang / brjed byed rnams dang / gnon po rnams dang / zas su mdangs za ba rnams dang / zas su mngal za ba rnams dang / zas su khrag 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su sha za ba rnams dang / zas su tshil za ba rnams dang / zas su zhag za ba rnams dang /

zas su rkang za ba rnams dang / zas su btsas pa za ba rnams dang / zas su srog 'phrog pa rnams dang / zas su gtor ma za ba rnams dang / zas su phreng ba za ba rnams dang / zas su 'bras bu za ba rnams dang / zas su me tog za ba rnams dang / zas su dri za ba rnams dang / zas su bdug pa

za ba rnams dang / zas su lo tog za ba rnams dang / zas su sbyin sreg za ba rnams dang / zas su rnag 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su phyi sa za ba rnams dang / zas su gcin 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su mchil ma za ba rnams dang / zas su ngar snabs za ba rnams dang / zas su snabs za ba

rnams dang / zas su lhag ma za ba rnams dang / zas su skyugs pa za ba rnams dang / zas su mi gtsang ba za ba rnams dang / zas su stor khung nas 'bab pa 'thung ba de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig /lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig /ston

brgya mthong bar shog shig /kun dga' bo khyod kyis ri'i rgyal po rnams kyi ming zung shig /'di lta ste/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang / ri'i rgyal po gangs can dang / ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad ldan dang / ri'i rgyal po rtse brgya pa dang / ri'i rgyal po seng ldeng can dang / ri'i rgyal po gser logs

dang / ri'i rgyal po 'od 'dzin dang / ri'i rgyal po mu khyud 'dzin dang / ri'i rgyal po khor yug dang / ri'i rgyal po khor yug chen po dang / ri'i rgyal po dbang po'i brag dang / ri'i rgyal po tshangs pa ldan dang / ri'i rgyal po dpal ldan dang / ri'i rgyal po blta na sdug dang / ri'i rgyal po

shin tu rgyas dang / ri'i rgyal po rin chen 'byung gnas dang / ri'i rgyal po srin bu can dang / ri'i rgyal po nor bu rdza dang / ri'i rgyal po thags ris dang / ri'i rgyal po rdo rje 'byung gnas dang / ri'i rgyal po 'gram pa ldan dang / ri'i rgyal po lha min 'bab dang / ri'i rgyal po glog 'od dang /

ri'i rgyal po khyab gnas dang / ri'i rgyal po zla 'od dang / ri'i rgyal po brag bzang dang / ri'i rgyal po'i ma mdzes dang / ri'i rgyal po thigs pa dang / ri'i rgyal po 'bigs byed dang / ri'i rgyal po zla ba'i brag dang / ri'i rgyal po sna tshogs brtsegs dang /

ri'i rgyal po ma la ya dang / ri'i rgyal po gser gyi rtse mo dang / ri'i rgyal po kun nas 'gro dang / ri'i rgyal po lag bzang dang / ri'i rgyal po nor bu ldan dang / ri'i rgyal po sde bzang dang / ri'i rgyal po tshangs pa'i mchu dang / ri'i rgyal po rig byed srung dang / ri'i rgyal po ba lang rna

dang / ri'i rgyal po sna tshogs phreng dang / ri'i rgyal po mi 'jigs sna tshogs dang / ri'i rgyal po ral gri dang / ri'i rgyal po gdung ba dang / ri'i rgyal po mig bsku dang / ri'i rgyal po muny+dza dang / ri'i rgyal po can dang / ri'i rgyal po 'joms byed dang / ri'i rgyal po ti

se dang / ri'i rgyal po mi mjed dang / ri'i rgyal po nye dkar dang / ri'i rgyal po tsan+dan phreng dang / ri'i rgyal po stobs 'dzin dang / ri'i rgyal po dbang chen dang / ri'i rgyal po dus 'bri byed dang / ri'i rgyal po skem byed dang / ri'i rgyal po ba lang srung dang / ri'i rgyal po bya rog

sgra can dang / ri'i rgyal po bstan pa 'dzin dang / sa'i dkyil 'khor 'di na ri'i rgyal po 'di dag dang / gzhan dag kyang yod pa de la lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / rlung lha rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / dri za rnams dang / mi

'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / srin po rnams dang / rnams dang / sha za rnams dang / 'byung po rnams dang / grul bum rnams dang / srul po rnams dang / lus srul po rnams dang / skem byed rnams dang / smyo byed

rnams dang / grib gnon rnams dang / brjed byed rnams dang / gnon po rnams dang / rig sngags 'chang grub pa rnams dang / rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa gang dag rgyun du gnas pa de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig /lo brgya

'tsho bar gyur cig /ston brgya mthong bar shog shig /sdig pa thams cad sol cig /dge ba rnams snang bar gyur cig /mi dge ba sol cig /don rnams la snang bar gyis shig /gnod pa rnams sol cig /mtshan mo bde legs nyin bde legs/ /nyi ma'i gung

gi bde legs dang / /nyin mtshan kun gyi bde legs dag /sangs rgyas kun gyis bdag la stsol swA hA/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis rgyu skar gang dag nam mkha' la rgyu zhing snang bar byed pa rnams kyi ming zung shig /'di lta ste/ smin drug dang ni snar ma dang / /mgo dang lag dang

nab so dang / /rgyal ni bkra shis phun sum tshogs/ /de bzhin skag ste bdun po yin/ /de ltar rgyu skar bdun po 'di dag ni shar gyi sgo na gnas pa dag ste/ gang dag shar phyogs srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa dag go/ /de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis

bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig /lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig /ston brgya mthong bar shog shig /mchu ni mi mdza' 'joms pa dang / /de bzhin gre dang dbo gnyis dang / /me bzhi nag pa sa ri dang / /sa ga ste ni bdun pa yin/ /de ltar rgyu skar bdun po 'di dag ni/ lho phyogs kyi sgo na

gnas pa dag ste/ gang dag lho phyogs srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa dag go/ /de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig /lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig /ston brgya mthong bar shog shig /lha mtshams gzi brjid chen mo dang / /de bzhin

snron dang snubs dang ni/ /chu stod dang ni chu smad dang / /de ltar byi bzhin gro bzhin no/ /de ltar rgyu skar bdun po 'di dag ni nub phyogs kyi sgo na gnas pa dag ste/ gang dag nub phyogs srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa dag go/ /de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la

bsrung ba gyis shig /lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig /ston brgya mthong bar shog shig /mon gru dang ni mon gre dang / /de bzhin khrums stod khrums smad dang / /nam gru dang ni tha skar dang / /bra nye ste ni bdun pa yin/ /de ltar rgyu skar bdun po 'di dag ni byang gi phyogs na gnas pa dag ste/ /gang dag

byang phyogs srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa dag go/ /de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig /lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig /ston brgya mthong bar shog shig /kun dga' bo khyod kyis gza' gang dag rgyu skar rnams

kyi khrod na rgyu zhing 'grib pa dang / 'phel ba dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / lo legs pa dang / lo nyes pa dag kyang ston pa rnams kyi ming zung shig /'di lta ste/ gza' nyi ma dang / gza' zla ba dang / gza' phur bu dang / gza' pa bsangs dang / gza' spen pa dang /

gza' mig dmar dang / gza' gza' lhag dang / gza' lha min dbang po sgra gcan dang / gza' du ba mjug / /rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad ni/ /de ltar phyogs na bdun bdun no/ /skar ma gza' bdun de bzhin te/ /rdzu 'phrul che zhing dka' thub che/ /nyi ma dang ni zla ba dang / /

sum cu rtsa bdun tshang ba dag /'char ba dang ni nub pa ni/ /'khor lo mtshon cha bzhin du rgyu/ /'jig rten du ni zad 'phel byed/ /gzi che rdzu 'phrul chen po dag /rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis su/ /rig sngags rjes su yi rang byos/ /de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen

mo 'dis bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig /lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig /ston brgya mthong bar shog shig /kun dga' bo drang srong rnying pa brtul zhugs grub pa/ rig sngags grub pa/ grags pa 'bar ba/ klung dang ri la gnas pa/ dmod pa'i mtshon cha can/ dka' thub grags pa/

rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba de dag gi ming brjod kyis khyod kyis zung shig /'di lta ste/ drang srong chen po brgyad pa zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po g.yon phyogs pa zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po g.yon phyogs lha zhes bya ba

dang / drang srong chen po lha skyabs kyi bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po 'od zer can zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po kun gyi bshes zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po gnas 'jog ces bya ba dang / drang srong chen po grog mkhar ba zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po 'drob skyong gi bu zhes bya ba

dang / drang srong chen po 'drob skyong gi bu rgan po zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po ngan spong zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po ngan spong dga' zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po 'gro 'dzin ces bya ba dang / drang srong chen po 'gro dga' zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po 'jigs can zhes bya ba dang /

drang srong chen po skal ldan shing rta zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po rgyun shes kyi bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po mdun du bdar zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po mgo bo che zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po gshin rje'i me zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po gnyis 'thung gi bu zhes bya ba

dang / drang srong chen po gnyis 'thung nag po'i bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po ljang sngo'i bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po ljang sngo'i tsha bo zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po ngag mnyam zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po 'phags po zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po yang dag

'phags po zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po bzod pa smra zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po grags pa zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po rab grags zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po bla ma zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po grub pa zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po gru 'dzin ces bya ba dang / drang

srong chen po rta bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po gangs can zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po mig dmar zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po cha byad 'dzin zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po gos ngan zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po mda' ltar snang ba zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po rgyags pa zhes

bya ba dang / drang srong chen po 'od ces bya ba dang / drang srong chen po pa ba sangs zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po phur bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po rtsibs kyi mu khyud ces bya ba dang / drang srong chen po spen pa zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po gza' lhag ces bya ba dang / drang srong chen po dug sel

zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po sa 'dzin zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po rwa gcig pa zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po drang srong rwa zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po gyur mid kyi bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po gar ldan gyi bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po sgra'i bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po

'jigs byed ces bya ba dang / drang srong chen po 'jigs byed glang po zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po ser skya zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po gau ta ma zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po rta dmar zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po byis pa rtse zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po mis

byin gyi bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po ri bo zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po srin bu 'dzin ces bya ba ste/ kun dga' bo drang srong chen po rnying pa 'di dag ni rig byed rnams byed pa/ gsang sngags rnams byed pa/ dmod pa 'dor ba/ brtul zhugs grub pa/ gzi brjid che ba grub pa/ pha

rol gnon pa grub pa dag ste/ de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig /lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig /ston brgya mthong bar shog shig /tad+ya thA/ hi ri hi ri/ khi ri khi ri/ mi ri mi ri/ phu ri phu ri/ su ri su ri/ hi li hi li/ mi li mi li/

si ri si ri/ Dab+phu/ Dab+phu/ Da Dab+phu/ gra sa ni/ ma tha ni/ da ma ni/ da ha ni/ g+hA ta ni/ pa tsa ni/ pA tsa ni/ ta pa ni/ tA pa ni/ ha na ni/ da ha ni/ dA ha ni/ da hA da hA da hA/ da la da la dA la ni/ pA Ta ni mo ha ni/ stam+b+ha ni/ dzam+b+ha ni/ swa yam+b+hu swA hA/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis skye dgu'i

bdag po chen po gang dag lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / rlung lha rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / dri za rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / srin po rnams dang / mi dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas

pa dang / sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi dge ba dang / mi dge ba la sogs pa'i dge ba'i khyad par grangs med pa dag gis 'jig rten gsum du rnam par gzhag pa rnams kyi ming zung shig /'di lta ste/ skye dgu'i bdag po tshangs pa dang / skye dgu'i bdag po bu can dang / skye dgu'i

bdag po za tshul gyi bu dang / skye dgu'i bdag po me dang / skye dgu'i bdag po gso ba dang / skye dgu'i bdag po mdun du bdar dang / skye dgu'i bdag po spu zing sel dang / skye dgu'i bdag po go byed dang / skye dgu'i bdag po mdzes gnas dang / skye dgu'i bdag po zin po dang /

skye dgu'i bdag po lus mdzes dang / skye dgu'i bdag po rab dga' dang / skye dgu'i bdag po mkhas pa dang / skye dgu'i bdag po gus yod de/ kun dga' bo skye dgu'i bdag po bdag nyid chen po 'di dag ni gnas pa dang / 'gro ba'i 'byung po'i tshogs bsrung ba'i phyir gnas pa dag go/ /de

dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig /lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig /ston brgya mthong bar shog shig /thogs pa med pa'i gsang sngags 'di dag gis kyang bsrung ba gyis shig /tad+ya thA/ hi ri hi ri/ khi ri khi ri/ mi ri mi ri/ phu ri phu ri/

su ri su ri/ hi li hi li/ mi li mi li/ si ri si ri/ Dab+phu/ Dab+phu/ Da Dab+phu/ gra sa ni/ ma tha ni/ da ma ni/ da ha ni/ g+hA ta ni/ pa tsa ni/ pA tsa ni/ ta pa ni/ tA pa ni/ ha na ni/ dA ha ni/ dA ha ni/ da ha da ha da ha/ da la da la/ dA la ni/ pA Ta ni/ mo ha ni/ stam+b+ha ni/ dzam+b+ha ni swA hA/ kun dga' bo

khyod kyis dug chen po rnams kyi ming zung shig /tad+ya thA/ aN+Da rA/ paN+Da rA/ kA ra DA/ ke yU rA/ b+hU taM ga mA/ b+hu ta pa ti/ bin+du pa ti/ si ri pa ti/ te dze pa ti/ te dzo gra pa te/ ya sho pa te/ ya sho gra ba te/ a ra DA/ ta ra DA/ ta ra ta ra DA/ dan+tA/ dza hA dzau hA/ dzo lA/ mi lA/ ha lA/ pha lA/

gu la hA/ ru tsi rA/ dan du rA/ i ri ki tsi kA /kam+b+ha/ sha ta dan+du rA/ bi pu le/ na ku le/ ki ri pi/ ta raM gA rISh+Ta/ a mra ma ti dzAm bU ma ti/ ma d+hu ma ti/ ka ma le/ bi ma le/ kuN+Da le/ a hi/ tu hi/ du hi/ bag+ke bag+kedU de/ bad sa nA b+he/ ma hA ga re/ tu lam+be/ du lam+be/ su lam+be swA hA/

kun dga' bo 'di dag ni dug chen po dag ste/ de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig /sba ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang /

mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / dug gsad pa dang / mtshams gcad pa dang / sa bcing ba gyis shig /lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig /ston brgya mthong bar shog shig /kun dga' bo khyod kyis shing ljon pa rnams kyi ming zung shig /'di lta ste/ shing ljon pa chen po gser zhes bya ba dang /

shing ljon pa chen po ser skya zhes bya ba dang / shing ljon pa chen po khyab gnas zhes bya ba dang / shing ljon pa chen po spre'u gnas zhes bya ba dang / shing ljon pa chen po pad+ma dkar po zhes bya ba dang / shing ljon pa chen po ser po zhes bya ba dang / shing ljon

pa chen po mya ngan 'tshang zhes bya ba dang / shing ljon pa chen po rna ldan byed ces bya ba dang / shing ljon pa chen po rgyas byed ces bya ba dang / shing ljon pa chen po bil ba zhes bya ba dang / shing ljon pa chen po tsU ta zhes bya ba dang / shing ljon pa chen po de dag dang gzhan dag la

lha gang dag gnas pa de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig /lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig /ston brgya mthong bar shog shig /kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas

bdun gyis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba ste/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gtsug tor can gyis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /yang

dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad skyob kyis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig gis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser thub kyis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang

ba'o/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ngas kyang da ltar bstan cing rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni byang chub sems

dpa' byams pas kyang bshad cing rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas kyang smras shing rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis kyang smras shing rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis kyang smras shing rjes su yi rang ba ste/ dri za'i

rgyal po yul 'khor srung gis kyang smras shing rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /grul bum gyi bdag po 'phags skyes pos kyang smras shing rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /klu'i rgyal po mig mi bzang gis kyang smras shing rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos kyi bus kyang smras shing

rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /dri za'i sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dag dang / grul bum gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dag dang / klu'i sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dag dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dag dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lngas rtsen dang / 'phrog ma

bu lnga brgya'i 'khor can gyis kyang smras shing rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni lha'i gdon dang / klu'i gdon dang / rlung lha'i gdon dang / lha ma yin gyi gdon dang / nam mkha' lding gi gdon dang / dri za'i gdon dang /

mi 'am ci'i gdon dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gdon dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon dang / srin po'i gdon dang / kyi gdon dang / sha za'i gdon dang / 'byung po'i gdon dang / grul bum gyi gdon dang / srul po'i gdon dang / lus srul po'i gdon dang /

skem byed kyi gdon dang / smyo byed kyi gdon dang / grib gnon gyi gdon dang / brjed byed kyi gdon dang / gnon po'i gdon gyis 'gal bar bya ba ma yin no/ /gdon thams cad kyis 'gal bar bya ba ma yin pa'o/ /mdangs 'phrog pa rnams dang / zas su mngal

za ba rnams dang / srog 'phrog pa rnams dang / zas su gtor ma za ba rnams dang / zas su sha za ba rnams dang / zas su khrag 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su zhag za ba rnams dang / zas su tshil za ba rnams dang / zas su rkang za ba rnams dang / zas su btsas

pa za ba rnams dang / zas su dri za ba rnams dang / zas su me tog za ba rnams dang / zas su 'bras bu za ba rnams dang / zas su lo tog za ba rnams dang / zas su sbyin sreg za ba rnams dang / zas su rnag 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su phyi sa za ba rnams dang /

zas su gcin 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su mchil ma za ba rnams dang / zas su ngar snabs za ba rnams dang / zas su snabs za ba rnams dang / zas su lhag ma za ba rnams dang / zas su skyugs pa za ba rnams dang / zas su mi gtsang ba za ba rnams

dang / zas su stor khung nas 'bab pa 'thung ba rnams kyis 'gal bar bya ba ma yin no/ /gshed byed dang / sgyur ba'i las dang byad dang / g.yengs byed dang / ro langs dang / sems sgyur ba dang / sbod gtong dang / bza' nyes dang / skyug nyes dang / gnod sgrib

dang / gnod bltas dang / bri nyes dang / bsgom nyes dang / gnod pa rnams kyis 'gal bar bya ba ma yin pa'o/ /rims nyin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang / nyin bzhi pa dang / nyin bdun pa dang / zla ba phyed pa dang / zla ba

gcig pa dang / nyi ma phyed pa dang / nyin mo pa dang / yud tsam pa dang / rtag pa'i rims dang / rims drag po dang / 'byung po'i rims dang / rlung las gyur pa dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / 'dus pa las gyur pas

'gal bar bya ba ma yin pa'o/ /rims thams cad kyis 'gal bar bya ba ma yin pa'o/ /klad pa na ba dang / gzhogs phyed na ba dang / yi ga 'chus pa dang / mig nad dang / sna nad dang / kha nad dang / mgul nad dang / snying nad dang / lkog ma'i lha gor

na ba dang / rna ba na ba dang / so na ba dang / snying na ba dang / rtsib logs na ba dang / rgyab na ba dang / lto ba na ba dang / mkhur ba na ba dang / chu so na ba dang / skye gnas na ba dang / rab tu skye gnas na ba dang / rked pa na ba dang / brla na ba dang / byin pa na ba dang /

lag pa na ba dang / rkang pa na ba dang / yan lag na ba dang / nying lag na ba las 'gal bar bya ba ma yin no/ /shu ba dang / g.ya' ba dang / 'brum bu phra mo dang / mdze dang / 'bras dang / phol mig dang / g.yan pa dang / me dbal dang / lhog pa rnams kyis

'gal bar bya ba ma yin pa'o/ /nad thams cad dang / dug thams cad dang / sdang ba thams cad dang / 'jigs pa thams cad dang / yams kyi nad thams cad dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa thams cad dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'khrug pa

thams cad kyis 'gal bar bya ba ma yin pa'o/ /kun dga' bo gang gis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di las 'gal bar byas na lag na rdo rjes de'i mgo bo tshal pa bdun du 'gems par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas

dang / nyan thos thams cad kyi gzi brjid kyis de'i snang ba ma rungs par 'gyur ro/ /sems ma rungs par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i gang zag rnams bslus par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis kyang gshur zhes bya ba la thug gi bar gyi gsang sngags

rnams kyis de la sdug bsngal chen po byed par 'gyur ro/ /lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin yang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis bskor te/ rdo rjes de'i mgo 'gems par 'gyur ro/ /tshangs pa'i gzi brjid kyis kyang de'i 'byor pa thal bar rlog par 'gyur ro/ /

kun dga' bo su zhig gis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bsrung ba byas sam/ skud pa btags na de bsad pa'i rigs pa ni chad pas bral bar 'gyur ro/ /chad pas bcad pa'i rigs pa ni gzhu btsog pas so/ /gzhu btsog pa'i rigs pa ni spyo bas

so/ /spyo ba'i rigs pa ni dam bca' bas so/ /dam bca' ba'i rigs pa ni spu zing zhes bya bas so/ /spu zing zhes bya ba'i rigs pa ni de bzhin du thar bar 'gyur ro/ /de la rgyal po'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung / me'i

'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo / /chus 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /de'i lus la dug gis mi tshugs te/ mtshon gyis kyang ma yin no/ /bde bar gnyid kyis log cing bde bar sad par 'gyur ro/ /bde ba dang / gnod pa med pa dang / 'jigs pa med par 'gyur ro/ /

phyir rgol ba bcom pa dang / dgra choms par 'gyur ro/ /rmas pa med par 'gyur ro/ /'jigs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /bde bar yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur te/ kun dga' bo sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni ma gtogs so/ /

kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni ha cang char che ba'am/ char dkon pa'i tshe bklag par bya'o/ /des ni klu thams cad spro bar 'gyur te/ char chen po ni gcod par byed/ char dkon pa'i tshe ni rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsam pa ci srid par

char 'bebs par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di dran pas kyang 'jigs pa dang dgra thams cad zhi bar 'gyur na sus dum bur ma gyur cing rdzogs par 'chang ba'am/ bde legs su 'gyur ba byas pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ kun dga' bo khyod

kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di zung shig /'khor bzhi po dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i phyir rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo dgra thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa 'di kun

chub par gyis shig /chongs shig /lhogs shig /tad+ya thA/ yA ba ti/ d+hA ba ti/ d+ha ra ki la/ hu lu/ hu lu me swA hA/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams/ /de dag 'jig rten dug gsum ste/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan dug med pa/ /sangs rgyas

bden pas dug bcom mo/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams/ /de dag 'jig rten dug gsum ste/ /bcom ldan chos ni dug med pa/ /chos kyi bden pas dug bcom mo/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams/ /de dag 'jig rten dug gsum ste/ /

bcom ldan dge 'dun dug med pa/ /dge 'dun bden pas dug bcom mo/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi stobs gang dang / /dgra bcom rnams kyi grags gang dang / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzi brjid kyis/ /ngas ni bde legs 'gyur bar byas/ /kun dga' bo rig

sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mos dug bcom mo/ /dge slong sa ri bde legs su gyur cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/

lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ dge slong sa ri ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis dge slong sa ri la chad pa spang bar byas te/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang /

bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / dug gsad pa dang / mtshams gcad pa dang / sa bcing ba byas te/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bsrung ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba byas pas tshe dang ldan pa

dge slong sa ri nad de las sos so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa dge slong sa ri bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te ci ltar gyur pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das la gsol

nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di'i mthu mthong ngam/ kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das

de bzhin du gsung ba de la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du ma 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yang bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo 'di ltar rgya mtsho chen po bzhi ni skam yang srid/ sa ni nam mkha' la 'phags kyang srid/

zla ba dang nyi ma ni sa la ltung yang srid/ klung ni rgyun las ldog kyang srid kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' ni gzhan du 'gyur mi srid do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de lta bas na rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma

bya chen mo 'di la 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams mos par gyis shig /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes bya ba gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/

'khor bzhi po dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma de rnams rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di la mos par byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa sa ri dang /

lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / rlung lha dang / nam mkha' lding dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa gang dag 'khor der 'dus te 'khod pa de dag thams cad yi rangs te/ bcom ldan

'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len dra bo d+hi dang / dz+nyA na sid d+hi dang / shAkya pra b+ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad

gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ma yU ra bid+yA gar+b+he nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya'i yang snying zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das rma bya chen mo la

phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dgra yis 'jigs pa'am/ 'thab rtsod kyis 'jigs pa'am/ bgegs kyis 'jigs pa'am/ dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'jigs pa'am/ sbrul

gyis 'jigs pa'am/ gcan gzan gyis 'jigs pa'am/ dug gis 'jigs pa'am/ mes 'jigs pa'am/ chus 'jigs pa'am/ rlung gis 'jigs pa'am/ 'jigs pa thams cad kyi nang na 'dug na 'di yid la bya'o/ /rlung las gyur pa'am/ mkhris pa las gyur

pa'am/ bad kan las gyur pa'am/ 'dus pa las gyur pa'am/ gdon gyis zin tam/ rims kyis btab pa'am/ dug 'thungs sam/ nad thams cad kyi nang na 'dug na 'di yid la bya'o/ /na mo b+ha ga ba te/ iT+TiT+TA ya/ in+d+ra go mi si kA ya/ A sha ne/ pA sha ne/

pA pa ni kU le/ ka pi la mit+te/ i le mit+te swA hA/ gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams grub par gyur cig /nA rA ya Ni/ pA rA ya Ni/ ha ri ta/ tA li/ kun tA li/ i li mi sti/ ki li ti li mi sti swA hA/ rig sngags kyi gzhi rnams grub par gyur cig /ha ha/ hi hi/ hu hu/

kha rA/ ma rA/ kha hi/ kha hi/ hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT swA hA/ bdag la srungs shig /srungs shig /lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig /ston brgya mthong bar shog shig /lan nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod de gtor ma ri mthon po la gtang bar bya'o/ /des thams cad zhi zhing phyir

bzlog par 'gyur ro/ /rma bya'i snying po rig pa dang bcas pa rdzogs so// @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ma hA pra ti sa rA bid+yArAdz+nyI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo sangs rgyas dang /

byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i lhun po chen po'i zom na/ khang pa brtsegs pa rdo rje chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sa'i gnas/ rdo rje chen po'i dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pas legs par

brgyan pa/ rdo rje chen po'i rdzing gi rin po che dang / pad+ma'i 'od kyis snang bar byas pa/ sa phyogs rdo rje chen po'i bye ma bdal ba/ rdo rje chen por byin gyis brlabs pa/ 'khor gyi khyams rdo rje chen po las byas pa/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi rdo rje'i seng ge'i khri chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya

stong gis rnam par mdzes pa/ chos bstan pa dang / cho 'phrul can sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi byin gyis brlabs pa/ chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis nges par 'byung ba na/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum

phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi thams cad kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa/ mthu chen po thob pa/ rdo rje chen po'i rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar rnam par 'phrul pa dang /

cho 'phrul chen po kun tu ston pa/ sems kyi skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la sems can thams cad kyi sems dang / spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i chos ston pa sna tshogs snyan cing rgya che la zab cing yangs pa dang / spobs pa dang / cho 'phrul dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing

du mar de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa chen po'i sprin gyis mchod pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang / gzungs dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / dbang po dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / sa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa

dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang / byams pa'i stobs dang bden pa dang / yongs su byang ba'i sems kyi rgyun dang ldan pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po rdo rje'i snying po dang / rdo rje'i lus dang / rdo rje'i blo gros dang / lag na rdo rje dang / rdo rje 'dus pa dang / rdo rje mthu bo che dang / rdo rje rnam par 'phrul pa dang / rdo rje brtsegs pa dang / rdo rje phung po dang / rdo rje bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i

tog dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang / nyan thos chen po rab tu mang po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba/ yongs su chad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par

grol ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang / cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pas rnam par 'phrul pa'i mthu chen po thob pa/ lta ba chags pa med pa/ thams cad kyang dri ma dang bral ba thob pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi sa bon nges par bsregs pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/

tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ka pi na dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa skul byed dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung dang /

tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung dang / de dag la sogs pa nyan thos chen po rab tu mang po dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu grangs med dpag tu med pa/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag

dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la sogs pa tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / lha'i bu rab 'thab bral g.yog 'thab bral gyi ris kyi lha'i bu dang bcas pa dang / yongs su dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin

lha'i bu thams cad kyi 'khor can dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags ris dang / stobs can dang / rab sim dang / sgra gcan dang / rnam par snang byed dang / de dag la sogs pa lha ma yin gyi dbang po tshad med/ grangs med/ dpag tu med pa rnams dang /

klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / 'jog po dang / nor rgyas kyi bu dang / dung skyong dang / stobs kyi rgyu dang / pad+ma dang / pad+ma chen po dang / de dag la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams dang / mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa mi 'am ci'i rgyal po g.yog du ma can dang / dri za'i

rgyal po zur phud lnga pa dri za'i rgyal po g.yog du ma can dang / rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po don thams cad grub pa rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po g.yog du ma can dang / nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po gser mig nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po g.yog du ma can dang / gnod sbyin gyi

rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu dang / nor bu bzang dang / gang ba bzang dang / lngas rtsen gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po g.yog du ma can dang / 'phrog ma bu lnga brgya'i g.yog du ma can dang / 'jig rten gyi ma bdun dang / srin mo chen mo bdun dang / drang srong gi mchog chen po bdun dang /

bar snang la rgyu ba'i rgyu skar dang / gza' thams cad kyi lha rnams dang / phyogs kyi lha rnams dang / phyogs mtshams kyi lha rnams dang / sa'i lha dang / dbyangs can dang / 'byung po rnams dang / bgegs rnams dang / log 'dren rnams dang /

rnams dang / 'byung po rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams dang / ri'i rgyal po thams cad dang / 'jig rten skyong ba chu lha g.yog rgya mtsho'i lha thams cad dang bcas pa dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzad dang / lag na be con dang / bden bral dang / me'i

lha dang / rlung gi lha chen po bdun dang / dbang bdag chung ma dang bcas pa g.yog bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma can dang / sred med kyi bu g.yog dang bcas pa dang / byin pa po dang / phreng ba can dang / zla ba can dang / lcags can dang / tshogs kyi bdag po chen po

dang / sprin ta la la dang / log 'dren gyi dbang po bgegs log 'dren gyi dbang po g.yog du ma can dang / shing gseb kyi lha drug cu dang / sring mo bzhi ming po dang bcas pa dang / rdo rje'i lu gu rgyud dang / rdo rje'i pho nya mo drug cu rtsa bzhi dang / rdo rje'i sde dang / lag bzang

dang / gtsug gis 'gro rdo rje'i ris kyi 'khor du ma dang bcas pa dang / de las gzhan pa sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la mngon par dad pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye

chen po dang / 'byung po dang / dang / sha za dang / grib gnon dang / smyo byed dang / brjed byed dang / skem byed dang / sgrub pa dang / sbrul 'dzin bcas pa dang / gnon po tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa dag dang / lha'i bu nyi ma dang / lha'i bu zla ba dang / nub

ka'i lha dang / nang bar gyi lha dang / dus kyi lha thams cad dang / sa'i lha dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das des chos kyi 'khor lo ni shin tu bskor/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ni shin tu yongs su mthar phyin/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs ni shin tu yongs su

rdzogs/ thams cad mkhyen pa ni shin tu yongs su bzung / byang chub chen po'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa dang sa ni brnyes/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa'i sku ni rab tu 'bar/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad ni dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus rnam par spras/

dbu'i gtsug ni sems can thams cad kyis bltar mi mthong / bdud kyi las thams cad la ni mkhas/ sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa ni shes/ spyan rnam pa lnga ni mnga'/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ni ldan/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ni ldan/

sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang ni ldan/ bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba'i tshogs thams cad ni bcom/ grags pa dang / sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pas ni 'phags/ khyu mchog dang / seng ge'i sgra ni sgrogs/ ma rig pa'i mun pa ni kun tu bsal/ bskal pa bye ba

khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med dpag tu med par sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / thabs dang / stobs dang / smon lam dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bya dka' ba'i spyod pa

las ni phyir ma log /sku ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan te/ rab tu mdzes shing rdo rje rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri chen po rdo rje rin po che dang / mu tig dang / dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba du ma sgra 'byung ba/

rtsa ba'i drung na rdo rje rin po che'i stegs bu du ma shin tu brtan par gnas pa/ rdo rje rin po che'i chu srin du ma'i kha nas byung ba'i mu tig dmar po'i phreng ba bres pa'i phang bshams pa/ rin po che du ma pad+ma'i snying po la chags pa rin po che ke ke ru dang / ke ke ru chen po dang / an da rnyil dang / an da

rnyil chen po dang / dun las kyi 'od zer chen po 'tsher bas snang bar byas te kun nas mdzes pa/ gdugs rtsa ba dang bcas pa/ rdo rje rin po che'i shar bu du mas rnam par brgyan pa/ bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas rnam par brgyan pa/ bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas kun nas

bskyabs pa/ dpag bsam gyi shing du mas rgyas par mdzes par byas pa/ rdo rje rin po che'i khri ri rab tsam la bzhugs te/ gser gyi ri bo'i rgyal po ltar dpal ni rab tu 'bar/ sa phyogs ni nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis rnam par brgyan/

zla ba nya ba ltar 'jig rten thams cad la sdug par ni snang / dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa chen po ltar/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni shin tu rgyas shing chos ston te/ tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/

ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba/ yang dag par rab tu ston to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer gyi dra ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba bkye ste/ 'od zer gyi dra

ba des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bas khyab par byas par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag seng ge'i khri bkod pa du ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzhal med khang na nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad dang thabs cig tu chos ston pa'i

sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang mnyam pa de dag thams cad kyang snang ba des khyab par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor phal po che la bka' stsal pa/ sems can kun la snying brtse'i phyir/ /nyes par byas dang gnod pa kun/ /rab 'joms so

sor 'brang ba yi/ /gzungs 'di rab tu bshad par bya/ /'di ni thos pa tsam gyis kyang / /sdig pa kun ni zad par 'gyur/ /sems can kun la bde ba sbyin/ /nad do cog las grol bar byed/ /sems can kun la snying brtse bas/ /lus can ngan 'gror 'gro ba rnams/ /

de dag thams cad bskyab pa'i phyir/ /'jig rten dag gi mgon pos gsungs/ /'di yis bsrung ba byas na ni/ /lha ma yin gyi gnas su 'jug /de bzhin lcang lo can dang ni/ /srin po'i gnas kyi sar yang 'gro/ /'byung po klu dang sha za rnams/ /mi bzad

'jigs pa'i g.yul 'gyed par/ /'byung po tshogs rnams thams cad dang / /dgra bo cog gis mi tshugs so/ /ming tsam bzung ste brjod byas kyang / /skem byed smyo byed brjed byed dang / /mkha' 'gro ma dang sha za dang / /gdon rnams rab tu brlag par 'gyur/ /

so sor 'brang ba'i gzi brjid kyis/ /gzi chen mdangs rnams za ba dang / /mi yi skye dgu rnams 'tshe ba/ /de dag thams cad rengs byed 'gyur/ /byad stems mi bzad gang yin dang / /pha rol dmag tshogs phung bar byed/ /sngags kyi las kyis gnod mi

'gyur/ /rtsa ba'i las las rnam par grol/ /dug dang dug sbyar mes mi tshugs/ /mtshon dang chus kyang tshugs mi 'gyur/ /lce 'bab glog gis mi tshugs te/ /dus kyi rlung gis gnod mi 'gyur/ /rig pa'i rgyal mo'i gzi brjid kyis/ /dgra kun rab tu

'joms par 'gyur/ /de yis don rnams thams cad 'grub/ /rtag tu rgyal ba thob par 'gyur/ /gang gis rtag tu mgul pa'am/ /lag par rig pa btags na ni/ /de yi dgos pa yod do cog /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med/ /byang chub sems dpa'

chen po dang / /sangs rgyas rnams dang rang 'dren dang / /de bzhin klu yi rgyal po dang / /lha dbang rnams ni rtag tu bsrung / /so sor 'brang ba'i gzungs 'dzin la/ /nyan thos sangs rgyas thams cad dang / /rig pa'i lha mo rdzu 'phrul che/ /rtag tu srung ba byed par 'gyur/ /

lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin dbang / /de bzhin rgyal po bzhi rnams kyang / /de la nyin dang mtshan rnams su/ /srung bar byed de the tsom med/ /brgya byin lha dang bcas pa dang / /tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang chen dang / /dga' ba'i dbang po nag po che/ /smin drug bu dang tshogs kyi dbang / /

ma mo'i tshogs rnams thams cad dang / /de bzhin bdud ris gzhan rnams dang / /drang srong gzi brjid che rnams dang / /rdzu 'phrul chen po'i lha rnams dang / /de kun so sor 'brang ba yi/ /gzungs 'dzin de la srung bar byed/ /sangs rgyas bdag

nyid che rnams dang / /rig pa'i lha mo stobs chen dang / /bdag gi ma dang khro gnyer dang / /lha mo sgrol ma lcags kyu dang / /rdo rje lu gu rgyud dang dkar/ /de bzhin dkar mo chen mo dang / /nag mo che dang pho nya dang / /de bzhin rdo rje pho nya gzhan/ /zhags pa bzang

dang rdo rje zhags/ /lag na rdo rje stobs po che/ /rig pa lha mo rdo rje phreng / /bdud rtsi thab sbyor byed pa dang / /gzhan gyis mi thub lha mo che/ /rna ba nag mo stobs chen mo/ /dpal yon ldan pa skal chen dang / /rna cha gdub kor pad+ma 'dra/ /me tog so can nor

bu gtsug /skra mdog mdzes dang kham pa mo/ /lha mo gzi brjid chen mo dang / /dpal yon ldan pa glog phreng can/ /srin mo ral pa gcig pa dang / /sangs rgyas bsrungs zhes bya ba dang / /skal ba chen po mi thod can/ /lang ka'i bdag po dpal yon can/ /

gzhan yang lha mo mang po rnams/ /sems can rjes su 'dzin byed dag /rig pa gang gi lag na gnas/ /de la srung ba byed par 'gyur/ /'phrog ma dang ni lngas rtsen dang / /dung can dang ni so brtsegs ma/ /dpal gyi lha mo dbyangs can yang / /de yi rjes 'gro

rtag tu bsrung / /so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di/ /bud med gang zhig rtag 'chang na/ /de yi thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /rtag par mngal na bu pho chags/ /mngal rnams na yang bde bar skye/ /sbrum ma dag kyang bde bar 'gyur/ /nad dang sdig pa thams cad kyang / /

'jig par 'gyur te the tsom med/ /bsod nams ldan zhing stobs dang ldan/ /nor dang 'bru yang rtag tu 'phel/ /tshig kyang gzung du 'os pa dang / /mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur ba yin/ /bud med dang ni skyes pa'ang rung / /gtsang ma gang zhig 'chang bsrel na/ /de ni sems

can thams cad dag /thar bar bya phyir brtson par 'gyur/ /rtag tu bde bar 'gyur ba yin/ /nad do cog kyang rnam par spangs/ /slas dang skye bo mang bcas pa'i/ /rgyal po'ang de yi dbang du 'gyur/ /phun sum tshogs pa rtag tu 'bar/ /bsod nams phung po rnam par

'phel/ /de yi bsam pa thams cad 'grub/ /dkyil 'khor kun tu zhugs pa yin/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi bka' bzhin du/ /de ni kun tu dam tshig shes/ /rmi lam ngan pa rmi mi 'gyur/ /sdig pa thams cad 'phrog pa'i mchog /sdig pa rnams dang de bzhin du/ /

dgra yang rab tu phung bar byed/ /gza' kun rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir/ /ye shes dbang phyug chen pos gsungs/ /'dod pa thams cad sbyin par byed/ /de phyir rtag tu bcang bar bya/ /'byung po'i tshogs rnams nga la nyon/ /da ni rab tu 'di brjod do/ /de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ oM bi pu la bi pu la gar+b+he/ bi pu la bi ma le/ bi pu la gar+b+he/ bi ma le/ dza ya gar+b+he/

badzra dz+wA lA gar+b+he/ ga ti ga ha ne/ ga ga na bi sho d+ha ne/ sarba pA pa bi sho d+ha ne/ oM gu Na pa ti/ ga ga na/ pi tsA ri Ni/ ga ga ri Ni/ gi gi gi ri/ gi ri Ni gi ri Ni/ ga ma ri/ ga ma ri/ ga ha ga ha/ garga ri garga ri/ ga ga ri/ ga ga ri/ gaM b+ha ri/ gaM b+ha ri/ ga b+hi ga b+hi/

ga hi ga hi/ ga ma ni/ ga ma ni/ ga ri ga ri/ gu b+ha gu b+ha/ gu ha gu ha/ gu ru gu ru gu ru Ni/ tsa le gu ha Ni/ gu ha Ni/ gu ru Ni/ tsu lu tsu lu/ tsa le tsa le/ mu tse le mu tse le/ dza ye bi dza ye/ sarba b+ha ya bi ga te/ satwa sarba gar+b+ha saM rak+Sha Ni/ si ri si ri/ b+hi ri b+hi ri/ mi ri

mi ri/ mi ri mi ri/ gi ri gi ri/ g+hi ri g+hi ri/ g+hi ri g+hi ri/ sa man+ta par+Sha Ni/ bcom ldan 'das ma sems can 'dren ma/ kun nas 'dren ma/ dgra thams cad 'joms par mdzad ma/ bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / nad 'go ba thams cad dang /

nad thams cad las bsrung du gsol/ bsrung du gsol/ tsi ri tsi ri/ bi ri bi ri/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ bi ga ta/ A ba ra Ne/ bi sho d+ha ne/ bi bi d+ha/ A pa ra Na/ bi nA sha ni/ mu ri mu ri/ mu tsi mu tsi/ mu li mu li/ tsi li tsi li/ ki li ki li/ mi li mi li/ ka ma le/

bi ma le/ dza ye bi dza ye/ bi dza yA/ ba he dza ya ba ti/ bi she Sha ba ti/ bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa chen po'i cod pan dang / phreng ba mnga' ba cha byad rnam pa sna tshogs mang po mnga' ba/ bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i lha mo chen mo/ sdig pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba/

bdag la thams cad du kun nas bsrung du gsol/ bsrung du gsol/ hu ru hu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ rak+Sha rak+Sha ma ma/ mgon ma mchis pa/ skyabs ma mchis pa/ dpung gnyen ma mchis pa/ bdag la bsrung du gsol/ bsrung du gsol/ bdag sdug bsngal thams

cad las thar bar mdzad du gsol/ tsaN+De tsaN+De/ tsaN+De tsaN+De/ tsaN+De Ni/ tsaN+De Ni/ be ga ba ti/ sarba duSh+Ta ni bA ra Ni/ bi dza ya/ bA hi ni/ hu ru hu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ tu ru tu ru/ A yuHpA li ni/ su ra ba ra pra ma tha ni/ sarba de ba ga Na pU dzi te/ tsi ri tsi ri/

d+hi ri d+hi ri/ sa man+ta a ba lo ki te/ pra b+he pra b+he/ su pra b+he/ su pra b+ha/ bi shud d+he/ sarba pA pa bi shud+d+he/ sarba pA pa bi sho d+ha ne/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ d+ha ra ni/ d+ha re d+ha re/ d+ha ra/ su mu su mu/ su mu su mu/ mu su mu su/ ru ru tsa le/ tsA la ya/ dpal gyi sku mnga' ba/ bdag la

gnod par sems pa las bskyab tu gsol/ bdag gi bsam pa rdzogs par mdzad du gsol/ dza ya ka ma le/ k+Shi ni k+Shi ni/ pa ra da/ aM ku she /oM pad+ma bi shud d+he/ sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/ shud d+he shud d+he/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ b+hi ri b+hi ri/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ mang+ga la bi shud d+he/ pa bi tra

mu khi/ khaD+ge ni khaD+ge ni/ kha ra kha ra/ dz+wa li ta/ shi kha re/ sa man+ta a ba lo ki ta pra b+he/ su pra b+ha bi shud d+he/ sa man+ta pra sA ri ta/ A bA b+ha si ta shud d+ha/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ sarba d+he ba ga Na/ gra ha na k+Sha tra/ sa ma A kar+Sha ni/ sa t+ya pra ti/ oM hrI traM ta ra ta ra/ tA ra ya tA ra ya/

glang po che'i lta stangs kyis gzigs ma/ bdag mi'i gnod pa las bsgral du gsol/ la hu la hu/ hu lu hu lu/ hu du hu du/ tu ru tu ru/ ki Ni ki Ni/ k+Shi Ni k+Shi Ni/ hu Ni hu Ni/ sarba gra ha b+ha k+Sha Ni/ piM ga li/ piM ga li/ mu tsu mu tsu/ tsu mu tsu mu/ su bi tsa re/

ta ra ta ra/ bcom ldan 'das ma glang po che'i lta stangs kyis gzigs ma/ thams cad du kun nas phyogs thams cad bcing ba dang / rdo rje'i ra ba dang / rdo rje'i zhags pa'i bcing bas bdag 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las bsgral du gsol/ badzra dz+wA lA bi shud d+he/ b+hu ri b+hu ri/

d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ti ri ti ri/ tu ru tu ru/ b+ha ga ba ti/ gar+b+ha bi shud d+he/ gar+b+ha saM sho d+ha ni/ ku k+Shi sam pU ra Ni/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ tsa la tsa la/ dz+wA li ni/ lha'i chus kun tu char dbab tu gsol/ a mr-i ta bar+Sha Ni de ba ta/ a ba tA ra Ni/ bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung rab bdud

rtsi mchog gi sku dang ldan pa bdag la dbang bskur du gsol/ 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang / bkra mi shis pa dang / sdig pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang /

klu thams cad 'joms pa/ gnod pas 'jigs skrag pa/ bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / nad 'go ba thams cad dang / nad thams cad las thams cad du rtag par bsrung du gsol/ bsrung du gsol/ ba la ba la/ ba la ba ti/ dza

ya dza ya/ bi dza ya/ bi dza ya/ thams cad du dus kun tu bdag rgyal bar mdzad du gsol/ bdag la rig pa chen mo 'di grub par mdzad du gsol/ dkyil 'khor chen po bsgrub tu gsol/ gsang sngags rnams bsgrub tu gsol/ bgegs rnams gzhom du

gsol/ dza ya dza ya/ sid d+hi sid d+hi/ sid+d+h+ya sid+d+h+ya/ bud+d+h+ya bud+d+h+ya/ sU tsa ya sU tsa ya/ pU ra ya pU ra ya/ pU ra Ni pU ra Ni/ bdag gi bsam pa rdzogs par mdzad du gsol/ rig pa thams cad las byung ba'i sku can/ rgyal ba lhag par rgyal ba can/ de bzhin

gshegs pa'i snying po rnam par dag pa bcom ldan 'das ma bzhugs su gsol/ bzhugs su gsol/ dam tshig bskyang du gsol/ 'jigs pa mi bzad pa chen po brgyad las bdag la gzigs su gsol/ sa ra sa ra/ pra sa ra pra sa ra/ sarba

A ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ni/ sa man+ta A ka ra maN+Da la bi shud d+he/ bi ga te bi ga ti/ bi ga ta ma le/ sarba ma la bi sho d+ha ni/ k+Shi Ni k+Shi Ni/ sarba pA pa bi shud d+he/ ma la bi ga ti/ dza ya ba ti/ te dzo te dzo ba ti/ badzra badzra ba ti swA hA/ 'jig rten gsum du byin gyis brlabs pa la

swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba la swA hA/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba la swA hA/ lha thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba la swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying pos byin gyis brlabs pa la swA hA/

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dam tshig grub pa la swA hA/ dbang po dang ldan pa dbang pos rnam par bltas pa la swA hA/ tshangs pa dang tshangs pa la gnas pa la swA hA/ khyab 'jug gis phyag byas pa la swA hA/ dbang phyug chen pos phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa la swA hA/

rdo rje 'dzin lag na rdo rje'i stobs dang brtson 'grus kyis byin gyis brlabs pa la swA hA/ yul 'khor srung la swA hA/ 'phags skyes po la swA hA/ mig mi bzang la swA hA/ rnam thos kyi bu la swA hA/ rgyal po chen po bzhis phyag byas pa la swA hA/ gshin rje la swA hA/ gshin

rjes mchod cing phyag byas pa la swA hA/ chu lha la swA hA/ rlung lha la swA hA/ rlung lha chen po la swA hA/ me lha la swA hA/ klus rnam par bltas pa la swA hA/ lha'i tshogs rnams la swA hA/ klu'i tshogs rnams la swA hA/ gnod sbyin gyi tshogs rnams la swA hA/ gshin rje'i

tshogs rnams la swA hA/ srin po'i tshogs rnams la swA hA/ dri za'i tshogs rnams la swA hA/ lha ma yin gyi tshogs rnams la swA hA/ nam mkha' lding gi tshogs rnams la swA hA/ mi 'am ci'i tshogs rnams la swA hA/ lto 'phye chen po'i tshogs rnams la swA hA/ mi rnams la swA hA/

mi ma yin pa rnams la swA hA/ gdon thams cad la swA hA/ 'byung po thams cad la swA hA/ la swA hA/ sha za la swA hA/ brjed byed la swA hA/ gnod byed la swA hA/ grul bum la swA hA/ oM d+hu ru d+hu ru swA hA/ tu ru tu ru swA hA/ mu ru mu ru swA hA/ ha na ha na sarba sha trUM

swA hA/ da ha da ha sarba duSh+TA nAM swA hA/ pa tsa pa tsa sarba pra t+yar+thi kA pra t+ye mi hrA nAM swA hA/ gang dag bdag la mi phan par 'dod pa de dag thams cad kyi lus dz+wa la ya sarba duSh+TaM tsi trA nAM swA hA/ 'bar ba la swA hA/ rab tu 'bar ba la swA hA/ rdo rje 'bar ba la swA hA/ me lce 'bar ba la swA hA/

kun tu 'bar ba la swA hA/ nor bu bzang la swA hA/ gang ba bzang po la swA hA/ nag po chen po la swA hA/ ma mo'i tshogs la swA hA/ gnod sbyin mo rnams la swA hA/ srin mo rnams la swA hA/ nam mkha'i ma mo rnams la swA hA/ rgya mtsho na gnas pa rnams la swA hA/ mtshan

mo rgyu ba rnams la swA hA/ nyin mo rgyu ba rnams la swA hA/ dus gsum du rgyu ba rnams la swA hA/ dus su rgyu ba rnams la swA hA/ dus ma yin par rgyu ba rnams la swA hA/ zas su mngal za ba rnams la swA hA/ mngal 'dzin pa la swA hA/ hu lu hu lu swA hA/ oM swA hA/ swaHswA hA/

b+huHswA hA/ b+hu baHswA hA/ b+hur b+hU baHswA hA/ tsi Ti tsi tsi Ti swA hA/ bi Ti ba Ti swA hA/ d+hA ra Ni swA hA/ d+hA ra Ni swA hA/ ag+ni swA hA/ te dzo ba yu swA hA/ tsi li tsi li swA hA/ mi li mi li swA hA/ si li si li swA hA/ bud+d+h+ya bud+d+h+ya swA hA/ sid+d+h+ya sid+d+h+ya swA hA/ maN+Da la ban d+he swA hA/ sI mA ban

d+he swA hA/ d+ha ra Ni b+han d+he swA hA/ sarba sha truM NAM b+hany+dza ya swA hA/ dzam+b+ha ya dzam+b+ha ya swA hA/ stam+b+ha ya stam+b+ha ya swA hA/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da swA hA/ b+hin+da b+hin+da swA hA/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza swA hA/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha swA hA/ mo ha ya mo ha ya swA hA/ ma Ni bi shud d+he swA hA/ sUr+ye swA hA/ sUr+ya bi shud d+he swA hA/ sho d+ha ni swA hA/

bi sho d+ha ni swA hA/ tsaN+De tsaN+De pa ri pU ra Na tsa swA hA/ gra he b+h+yaHswA hA/ nak+Sha tre b+h+yaHswA hA/ shi bi b+h+yaHswA hA/ shAn+ti b+h+yaHswA hA/ puSh+Ti b+h+yaHswA hA/ swa sti ya ne b+h+yaHswA hA/ gar+b+ha d+ha re swA hA/ shi baM ka ri swA hA/ shaM ka ri swA hA/ shAn+tiM ka ri swA hA/ puSh+TiM ka ri swA hA/ ba la bar+d+ha ni swA hA/ ba la bar+d+hi ni ka ri

swA hA/ shrI ka ri swA hA/ shrI bar+d+hi ni swA hA/ shrI dz+wA li ni swA hA/ mu tsi swA hA/ na mu tsi swA hA/ ma ru tsi swA hA/ be ga ba ti swA hA/ oM bcom ldan 'das ma de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku mchog dri ma dang bral ba/ bdag gi sdig pa thams cad zhi bar mdzad du

gsol/ bdag bde legs su gyur cig /oM mu ni mu ni/ bi mu ni bi mu ni/ d+ha ri tsa la tsa la ni/ b+ha ga ba ti/ b+ha ya bi ga te/ b+ha ya ha ri Ni/ bo d+hi bo d+hi/ bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ bud d+hi li bud d+hi li/ tsum+bu li tsum+bu li swA hA/ sarba ta thA ga ta hri da ya dzuSh+Te swA hA/ oM mu ni

mu ni mu ni ba re/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig pa'i dbang bskur ba/ rdo rje'i go cha chen po'i phyag rgyas btab pa thams cad kyis bdag la dbang bskur du gsol/ sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya/ a d+hiSh+ThA na/ a d+hi ti badzre swA hA/ bram ze chen po rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang

ba chen mo/ kun nas me lce'i phreng ba rnam par dag pas rgyas pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu phyag rgya dang / snying po gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gzungs 'di rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos thos ma thag tu sdig pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /bram ze chen po rig pa

'di gang gi snying la gnas par gyur pa de'i lus rdo rjer rig par bya'o/ /de'i lus la mes mi tshugs so/ /ci mngon zhe na/ gang gi tshe grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas na/ gzhon nu sgra gcan zin bzang po mngal du zhugs pa de'i tshe shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma bdag nyid me'i nang

du mchongs pa dang / der pad+ma dag byung ste/ de'i tshe gzhon nu sgra gcan zin bzang po mngal na gnas bzhin du rig pa 'di yid la byas so/ /rig pa 'di rjes su dran pa tsam gyis me de skad cig de nyid la bsil bar gyur to/ /de nas shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma'i lus la mes ma reg go /

de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rig pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /bram ze chen po rgyu des na mes mi tshig go/ /dug gis kyang srog dang 'bral bar mi nus so/ /de ci lta zhe na/ bram ze chen po gang gi tshe grong khyer chen po bde bar pha rol tu

'gro ba zhes bya ba na/ tshong dpon mdzod stobs can gyi bu rig pa smra bar gyur to/ /de'i rig pa'i stobs des klu'i rgyal po 'jog po bkug go/ /bkug nas kyang bag med pa'i dbang gis ma bcings pas des khros nas de la bzung ba dang / de tshor ba mi bzad pa myong nas ji

ltar yang bdag ni srog dang bral lo snyam du shes so/ /de nas smra ba can mang po bos kyang 'ga' tsam gyis kyang dug las gso bar ma nus so/ /de nas grong khyer chen po bde bar pha rol tu 'gro ba na dge bsnyen ma dri ma med par dag pa zhes bya ba snying rje chen po dang ldan pa zhig

gnas pa des rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo 'di kha ton du shes so/ /de de'i gnas su song ste phyin pa dang / rig pa chen mo 'di brjod do/ /des de la lan cig brjod pa tsam gyis de dug med par byas shing de dran pa rnyed par byas te/ sdug bsngal chen po de las yongs su

thar bar byas nas rig pa chen mo'i snying po 'di cho ga ci ltar bka' stsal pa bzhin du tshong dpon gyi bu de'i snying la gnas par byas so/ /bram ze chen po gzhan yang ci ltar yongs su shes zhe na/ rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba'i grangs su chud pa zhig grong khyer chen po ba rA rA Na sI

na sngon yongs su rgyu ba'i tshe/ de'i shar phyogs kyi mtshams kyi stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po des dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon te/ grong khyer chen po ba rA rA Na sI kun nas bskor te/ gzhom par bshams so/ /de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin de

la blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis grong khyer 'phrog la thug na thabs gang gis pha rol gyi dmag tshogs gzhom par bgyi/ bka' stsal du gsol zhes byas pa dang rgyal pos khyed 'tsher 'grib chung ngur gyis shig /rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang

ba chen mo zhes bya ba yod de/ ngas des dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa 'di pham par bya'o/ /thal ba bzhin du bya'o zhes bsgo ba dang / blon po rnams kyis mgo btud de rgyal po chen po sngon bdag cag gis nam yang ma thos pa 'di ci zhig lags zhes smras pa dang / rgyal pos

ngas de mngon sum du bya'o zhes bsgo'o/ /de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin spos chu sna tshogs kyis mgo bkrus te/ gos gtsang ma bgos nas rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo 'di cho ga bzhin du bris te/ mgo'i gtsug gi skra'i nang du bzhag nas rig pa'i rgyal mo chen

mo 'di nyid kyis go cha byas te/ g.yul gyi nang du zhugs pa dang / gcig pus dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa thams cad pham par byas te/ ji srid skyabs su dong ba de srid du 'dis tshar bcad nas stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de gcig pu btang ngo / /bram ze

chen po de ltar na rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang / phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs pa/ mthu chen po 'di mngon sum du gyur pa yin te/ mngon sum du gyur to snyam du gzung bar bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mtshungs pa

nyid du blta bar bya'o/ /phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na sems can tshe thung ba rnams dang / bsod nams chung ba rnams dang / longs spyod chung ba rnams la phan par 'gyur bar blta'o/ /bram ze chen po gang la la zhig rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di cho ga bzhin du bris

te lag pa'am/ mgul du btags na de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par rig par bya'o/ /de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur rig par bya'o/ /rdo rje'i lus yin par rig par bya'o/ /de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ring bsrel

gyi snying po can yin par rig par bya'o/ /de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan yin par rig par bya'o/ /de rdo rje chen po'i lus su rig par bya'o/ /de 'bar ba 'od 'phro ba'i lus dang ldan par rig par bya'o/ /de mi shigs pa'i go cha can du rig par bya'o/ /de dgra

thams cad rab tu 'joms par rig par bya'o/ /de sgrib pa dang sdig pa thams cad 'joms par rig par bya'o/ /de sems can dmyal ba'i 'gro ba rnams sbyong bar rig par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sngon yongs su shes pa yin te/ bram ze chen po phyogs gzhan zhig na dge

slong ma dad pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la bslab pa 'dral ba/ ma byin par len pa/ bza' ba 'du ba'i sgo 'phrog pa/ dge 'dun gyi dang / phyogs bzhi dang / tshogs kyi rdzas su gyur pa de thams cad gang dag gir byin gyis brlabs te za ba zhig dus gzhan zhig na

nad tshabs chen pos btab pa dang / sdug bsngal chen po'i tshor ba myong ngo / /nyon mongs te skyabs med dpung gnyen med nas ku co'i sgra chen po 'byin to/ /bram ze chen po de nas phyogs de na dge bsnyen zhig gnas pa des sgra de thos so/ /thos nas kyang dge slong de ga

la ba der song ste phyin nas rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di bris te/ dge slong de'i mgul du btags so/ /rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo dge slong de'i mgul du btags ma thag tu tshor ba thams cad ni rab tu zhi/ nad thams cad las ni yongs su thar

te/ sos par gyur nas de'i mtshan mo zad pa dang / dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag ste 'chi ba'i dus byas so/ /lus de bor ba dang / sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skyes so/ /de'i ro de yang dge slong dag gi sgang bu zhig la bzhag go/ /rig pa chen mo

so sor 'brang ba chen mo de yang de'i mgul du btags pa bzhin du gnas so/ /dge slong de mnar med pa der skyes ma thag tu sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag gi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad rab tu zhi nas sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag thams cad bde

ba thams cad kyis tshim par gyur to/ /mtshams med pa'i me'i phung po chen po gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang yongs su zhi bar gyur to/ /de nas gshin rje'i mi de dag thams cad ngo mtshar skyes nas chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje la nges pa'i tshig 'di dag rgyas par brjod do/ /

sems can las las skyes pa yi/ /sdug bsngal mi bzad rab tu zhi/ /shin tu ngo mtshar 'di ni lha/ /sems dmyal nyam nga rnams na gda'/ /lus can lus la rtag gnas pa'i/ /me ma mur de rab tu zhi/ /sog le rnams kyis gshegs ma mchis/ /spu gri'i sos

yang gcod mi bgyid/ /lcags sdong shal ma ri yang chag /lcags zangs thams cad rab tu zhi/ /ral gri lo ma can nags na/ /las skyes lo ma gnod mi 'gyur/ /chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje khyod/ /mi rnams la ni chos kyi ston/ /rgyu 'di mi chung

bdag cag la/ /khyod kyis brjod par mdzad pa'i rigs/ /de nas chos kyi bdag nyid can/ /chos nges chos kyi rgyal po des/ /snying rje'i bsam pa nyams rnams kyi/ /'di 'dra'i tshig de thos gyur nas/ /myur du 'di ni ci yin smros/ /'di ni ci 'dra yang smros shig /

de nas mi bzad gshin rje'i mi/ /gnod pa'i rgyun can de dag gis/ /chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje la/ /'di skad kyi ni tshig smras so/ /mnar med rab tu nyam nga bar/ /sems can chen po 'di skyes lha/ /gang gi ming ni mnar med pa/ /des na de ni nyam ngar brjod/ /

gang gis sems can bde bgyis pa/ /rnam pa sna tshogs las la gzigs/ /'di ni kun tu bde gyur nas/ /slar yang lha yi gnas su mchis/ /chos kyi rgyal po gshin rjes kyang / /mthong nas ngo mtshar smras pa ni/ /'di ni rdzu 'phrul che ba ste/ /'di ni tshe rabs

snga lus tshe/ /ci ltar sku gdung brgya mang pos/ /ston pa'i mchod rten mdzes pa ltar/ /so sor 'brang ba mgul btags pas/ /de yi lus ni de bzhin mdzes/ /de nas sems can dmyal ba'i srung ma gnod sbyin de dag gis chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje la 'di skad ces

smras so/ /lha ci ltar na 'di so sor 'brang ba zhes bgyi/ chos kyi rgyal pos smras pa/ gang gi tshig rnams so sor dran/ /de ni ngan 'gror 'gro mi 'gyur/ /so sor 'brang ba bsgoms pa yi/ /shes rab can de bde 'gror 'gro/ /sems can dmyal ba'i srung ma khyed/ /

rab tu rgyas dang ldan par dong / /der ni sgang bu mthon po la/ /lha rnams kyis ni bskor ba ltos/ /de mthong sems can thams cad la/ /byams pa'i sems su 'gyur bar gyis/ /de nas gshin rje'i mi de dag de nyid kyi nub mo rgyas pa dang ldan par dong ngo / /de tshe der ni de dag gis/ /

rgyal po'i pho brang nye ba na/ /sgang bu de yi khor yug na/ /'bar ba gcig gis gang bar mthong / /mi ro zhig gi mgul pa na/ so sor 'brang ba btags pa'ang mthong / /lha dang klu dang dri za dang / /gnod sbyin srin po mi 'am cis/ /kun nas 'khor bar

bskor nas ni/ /bla na med pa'i mchod pa byed/ /de la gnod sbyin de dag gis/ /so sor 'brang ba'i sgang zhes btags/ /de nas gnod sbyin de dag gis chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje'i nges pa de rtogs te slar log nas lha khyod kyis bka' stsal pa bzhin no zhes rgyas par

brjod do/ /de skad ces smras ma thag tu tshig de smras pa'i tha ma la sems can chen po de sems can dmyal ba'i lus de bor nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skyes so/ /rgyu des na sngon so sor 'brang ba'i lha'i bu zhes bya'o/ /bram ze chen po des na sngon chad yongs su

shes so/ /de'i phyir so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di gdon mi za bar gzung bar bya'o/ /yi ger bri bar bya/ bklag par bya'o/ /cho ga bzhin du rtag tu lus la btags nas bcang bar bya ste/ de rtag tu sdug bsngal zhing nyam thag pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur/

ngan 'gro'i 'jigs skrag pa thams cad las rgal bar 'gyur ro/ /glog gis 'gyel bar byed mi nus so/ /glog gis ci ltar mi nus zhe na/ bram ze chen po sngon yongs su shes te/ grong khyer chen po'i mchog shing kun rdzib na/ tshong dpon chen po dri med dung zhes bya ba nor mang

ba/ gser shin tu 'byor pa/ mdzod dang / bang ba kun tu gang zhing phun sum tshogs pa zhig gnas te/ ded dpon zhes bya bar grags so/ /de nas ded dpon chen po des gru bo che de rnyed nas/ rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa dang / nya mid rnams kyis de'i gru de bzung nas/

rnam par gzhig par 'dod pa'i klu rnams kyang 'khrugs te/ 'brug sgra chen po sgrog go/ /glog dang skar mda' yang gtong ngo / /rdo rje'i lce 'bebs par yang bshams so/ /de nas tshong pa de dag sdug bsngal chen pos sems non to/ /klu 'khrugs pa chen po de dang / glog

dang skar mda' dang / rdo rje'i lce 'bebs pa dang / nya mid de dag gis kyang gru bo che bzung bar mthong nas ku co'i sgra chen po bton te/ de dag lha khyad par can rnams la gsol ba btab kyang 'ga' tsam yang de dag gi dpung gnyen du ma gyur to/ /de nas de dag

tshong dpon sems rab tu brtan pa'i gan du song nas/ de dag gis snying rje rje skad du tshig 'di skad smras so/ /sems can chen po khyod kyis bdag cag bskyab cing 'jigs pa chen po las thar bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas ded dpon chen po sems brtan pa blo gros chen po des

tshong pa 'khrugs par gyur pa rnams la tshig 'di skad smras so/ /ma 'jigs ma 'jigs tshong pa rnams/ /khyed cag brtan par dengs shig dang / /khyed rnams sdug bsngal chen po yi/ /rgya mtsho che las ngas bsgral lo/ /de nas yid ni brtan gyur nas/ /tshong pa

rnams kyis tshig 'di smras/ /sems can chen po 'di ci lags/ /bgegs bral myur du bka' stsol cig /blo gros chen po khyod kyi mthus/ /bdag cag ji srid 'tsho ba'i tshe/ /ye shes che ba'i bdag nyid gsungs/ /slad na khyod kyis ci zhig bgyi/ /de nas 'gron

mang bdag po yis/ /de dag la ni tshig 'di brjod/ /nga la so sor 'brang ba yi/ /rig pa chen por grags pa yod/ /gnod byed thams cad sel bar byed/ /stobs chen pha rol gnon byed pa/ /des ni rab tu sdug bsngal ba'i/ /'jigs pa che las ngas bsgral

lo/ /de nas ded dpon chen po de'i tshe rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo 'di bris nas rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags pa dang / rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags ma thag tu nya mid de dag thams cad kyis gru bo che de me lce gcig tu gyur pa mthong

ngo / /de nas klu de dag byams pa'i yid kyis de dag gi drung du lhags nas mchod pa bya bar bshams so/ /nya mid de dag kyang rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di nyid kyi mthus tshig nas byer te zhi bar gyur to/ /'gron po phal po che de dag kyang klu chen po de dag gis rin po che'i

gling chen por phyin par byas so/ /de ltar na ye shes dang ldan pa rig pa chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ste/ bram ze chen po rgyu des na 'di rig pa chen mo zhes grags so/ /'di ni nges par rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags

te bcang bar bya'o/ /rlung dang / grang ba dang / dus ma yin pa'i sprin dang / glog dang / lce 'bab pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed do/ /lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa las yongs su thar bar byed do/ /sbrang bu mchu dang / sha sbrang dang /

byi ba dang / srog chags kyi rigs gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs lo tog ma rung bar byed pa thams cad mthu med cing rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /dang / bya dang / gcan gzan gnod par sems pa thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /me tog dang / 'bras bu dang /

lo ma dang / nags tshal dang / sman dang / lo tog la sogs pa thams cad 'phel bar 'gyur te/ rab tu bro zhing zhim pa dang 'jam par 'gyur ro/ /legs par yongs su smin par 'gyur ro/ /ha cang char che ba dang / char dkon pa'i nyes pa rnams yongs su mi 'byung ngo / /

char dus su 'bab cing / dus ma yin par mi 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /yul de'i klu chen po gang yin pa de dag kyang dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par 'bebs so/ /yul gang na rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo zhes bya ba 'di spyod pa'i yul der sems can de dag gis shes

par bya ste/ spos sna tshogs dang / bdug pa sna tshogs dang / me tog sna tshogs kyis mchod cing bsti stang byas la/ tshon sna tshogs kyis dkris te rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags nas glu dbyangs dang / rol mo sil snyan byas te/ bskor ba byas nas lha rnams dang / brgya

byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pas sems can chen po de dag gi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ re ba yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro/ /cho ga ci lta ba bzhin du de lta de lta bur 'grub ste/ bu pho 'dod na'ang khye'ur 'grub/ /mngal na 'dzin pa dam par 'gyur/ /mngal

na bde bar skye ba dang / /mngal nas bde bar btsas par 'gyur/ /mngal na dus bzhin skye ba dang / /dus bzhin rab tu btsas par 'gyur/ /cis mngon zhe na/ bram ze chen po snga ma bzhin du de nyon cig /yul ma ga d+hA 'di nyid na/ rgyal po lag brkyang

zhes bya ba de bu med par gyur to/ /ci'i phyir lag brkyang zhes bya zhe na/ rgyal po de btsas ma thag tu lag pa brkyang nas ma'i nu zho la bzung ste/ nu zho ngoms ngoms su 'thungs so/ /nu ma de gnyis la reg ma thag tu gser gyi kha dog tu gyur to/ /dus kun tu nu zho 'phel bar

gyur to/ /rgyu des na rgyal po lag brkyang zhes bya bar btags par gyur to/ /gzhan yang gang gi tshe rgyal po'i gan du skye bo slong mo pa 'ongs pa de'i tshe rgyal po de lag pa g.yas pa bar snang la brkyang ba dang / rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' de rgyu des sangs rgyas la mngon

par dad pa'i lha rnams kyis lha'i rin po che khyad par du 'phags pa gser dang / nor bu rnams kyis lag pa gang bar byed do/ /rgyal po des kyang skye bo slong mo pa lhags pa rnams la rab tu byin no/ /bsams pa tsam gyis slong mo pa thams cad la 'dod pa bzhin du bde ba
