bgyis so/ /tad+ya thA/ badzre badzre badzre/ ha na badzre ni ha na badzre/ khA da khA da badzre Na/ s+phA Ta ya/ s+phA Ta ya/ badzre Na/ i daM gr-i ha na/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT/ gra sa gra sa gra sa/ pA ta ya/ pA ta ya/ pA ta ya/ d+ha ra d+ha ra d+ha ra/ bdag dang sems can thams cad 'jigs pa dang / gnod

pa thams cad dang / 'thab mo dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad las srungs shig /dza ya kA ri/ dza yaM ku ru/ ta ra ta ra ta ra/ ma hA ta ra Ne/ ku Te ku Te ku Te/ badzra ku Te swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la legs so

zhes bya ba byin te/ lag na rdo rje legs so legs so/ /lag na rdo rje sems can chen po khyod sems can rnams la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / snying brtse ba'i phyir zhugs pa yang legs so/ /lag na rdo rje rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di su'i lag tu song ste/

lus la btags sam/ glegs bam la bris sam/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ gnas khang ngam/ 'chag sa na spyod par 'gyur ba der rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i tshogs kyi g.yog dang bcas pas grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/

grong rdal lam/ yul de bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /yul der pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis kyang gnod par mi 'gyur ro/ /sa phyogs der mi ngas mi 'byung ngo / /dgra ni 'byung ngo / /rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag phyi bzhin 'brang ba dang / lhan

cig der bsrung ngo / /yongs su bskyab bo/ /yongs su 'dzin to/ /zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar byed do/ /chad pa spong ngo / /mtshon cha spong ngo / /dug gsod do/ /mi mdza' ba 'gog go/ /mtshams gcod do/ /sa gcod do/ /tad+ya thA/ ta pa ni ta pa ni/ pra ta pa ni/ d+hu ru

me/ d+hu ru me/ bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te/ mu khe/ mu khe/ su mu khe/ su mu khe/ pra la pra la te/ sa mA d+hi te/ sa mA d+hi gar+b+he/ sa mA d+hi gar+b+he/ mA na si/ phu ru phu ru phu ru d+hu ru/ bud+d+ha mA na si ke swA hA/ lag na rdo rje 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'o/ /gsang

ba'i gnas so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /lag na rdo rje mi'i rgyal po gang la la zhig gis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can 'di glegs bam la legs par bris te 'chang ngam/ lus

la btags te 'chang zhing de la spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / me tog sna tshogs kyi lhab lhub kyis bsti stang du byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed na/ mi'i rgyal po de la rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin phyi bzhin 'brang ba/ bye ba khrag khrig

'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /mi'i rgyal po de la phyir rgol ba dang / dgra dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad kyis glags mi rnyed do/ /mthus yul der 'jug pa dang / bgegs 'jug na yang rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu bgegs sna tshogs brgya dang /

bgegs sna tshogs stong byed par 'gyur ro/ /mi'i rgyal po gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang der rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te mdun du bkur bar bya'o/ /gang du g.yul dor 'jug gam/ dgra chen po dang 'thab pa der rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen

mo rgyal ba can 'di mgul du btags te/ g.yul dor zhugs na der rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus pha rol gyi dmag tshogs de pham par byed par 'gyur ro/ /de ni rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di su'i mgul du btags pa de rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje

grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gang du gal te nad 'go ba sna tshogs dang / mi ngas mi bzang pa chen po byung na der rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di dang me tog sna tshogs dang / cho ga dang / gtor ma dang / bum pa btung ba

sna tshogs kyis bkang ba bzhi phyogs bzhir bzhag ste/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di bklags na de'i tshe rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu tshogs kyi g.yog dang bcas shing / gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu nad 'go ba dang / mi ngas de rab tu zhi bar

byed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di las lhag pa'i rig sngags ches stobs dang ldan pa'am/ gzi brjid che ba'am/ rdzu 'phrul che ba'am/ mthu che ba gang yang ma mchis so/ /rig

sngags thams cad kyi mchog rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di yul gang dang gang du spyod par 'gyur ba'i gnas de dang de dag tu sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad par 'gyur ro/ /tad+ya thA/ badzre badzre badzre/ a mr-i ta badzre/ dz+wa li ta badzre/ hu tA sha ni/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ dzam+b+ha/ stam+b+ha

ya/ sarba gra hA NAM/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT/ gra sa gra sa gra sa/ ba Ta pa Ta pa Ta/ ta Ta ta Ta ta Ta/ mu ru mu ru mu ru/ d+ha ma d+ha ma d+ha ma/ dz+wa la dz+wa la dz+wa la/ khu khu me/ khu khu me/ g+ho ri g+ho ri g+ho ri/ badzra mA na si/ badzra hu ti/ hu ti ru/ phu ru phu ru/ gra sa gra sa/

sarba a hi ti Shi NAM/ nA bu ru Ni/ mu mu le/ badzra bra dI pA ni/ tsi ma le phu swA hA/ A yuHpA la ni tsu tsu re swA hA/ dza ye dza ye/ dza ya sam+b+ha be swA hA/ dza yot+ta me swA hA/ dza ya ba re de swA hA/ dza ya n+d+ha re swA hA/ dza ya mA na si swA hA/ dza ya badzra swA hA/ a dzi ta badzrA ya swA hA/ ma hA badzra hu tA sha

nA ya swA hA/ a mo g+ha badzra ha sta swA hA/ de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos kyi

rnam grangs 'di la bsrung ba stsal bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug dgum pa dang / mi mdza' ba dgag pa dang / dus ma lags par 'gum pa dgag pa dang / 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang /

rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / g.yul 'gyed pa dang / khrag khrug dang / 'jigs pa thams cad dgag par bgyi'o/ /mtshams dgum par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ dza ye dza ye dza ye/ ma hA dza ye/ mi li ma na si/ dz+he dz+he dz+he/ mu ru mu ru/ tu Tu tu Tu/ mu mu le/ mArga ba ti/

d+hu d+hu me/ be ge be ga d+hA ri NI/ te dza ba tI/ bdag dang sems can thams cad 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni sangs rgyas

bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus gsungs pa/ byin gyis brlabs pa lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ bud+d+he bud+d+he/ bud+d+he bud+d+he/ bud+d+ha ba tI/ bud+d+ha a ba b+hA sa ni/ d+harma ba tI/ sa ma hi te/ sa mA d+hi gar+b+he bud+d+ha a ba b+hA sa ni/ bud+d+ha pa ri ha ri/ d+harma a ba b+hA sa ni swA hA/ su la la zhig rig sngags

kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can 'di las 'da' bar bgyid pa de ni mgo bo si ta ka'i 'bras bu bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas so/ /su zhig rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ mchod par bgyid dam/ yi ger 'dri 'am/ glegs bam la bris

te/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor ram/ gtsug lag khang du 'jog na/ der bdag tshogs kyi g.yog dang bcas shing / gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu rig sngags 'dzin pa de'i slad bzhin

du 'brang ste bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /dpag tshad brgya stong tshun chad du mtshams dgum par bgyi'o/ /slar rgol ba dang / dgra dang / g.yul 'gyed pa dang / 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa thams cad ma mchis par bgyi'o/ /slar bzlog par

bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rgyal po chen po legs so/ /sems can chen po khyod 'jig rten thams cad la phan pa dang / sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba dang / bde ba dang / bstan pa

bsrung ba'i phyir zhugs pa yang legs so/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'dis gang yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba byas pa de'i lus la mtshon dang / dug dang / byad dang / gsod byed dang / rims dang / gnod pa thams cad

kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa'o/ /lag na rdo rdo khyod kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di zung shig /chongs shig /kun chub par gyis shig /lag na rdo rje phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i

dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos rab tu rnam par 'jig pa'i dus na/ sems can drag shul dang ldan pa/ shin tu mi bzad pa/ mdangs 'phrog pa'i gnod sbyin dang / srin po rnams dang / chos ma yin pa spyod pa'i rgyal po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe thung ba chos ma yin pas yul

'khor skyong ba 'byung ba de'i tshe rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di sems mi mnyam pa/ sems mi bzad pa de dag dang / sdang ba dang / rab tu sdang ba'i sems can thams cad kyi don du 'gyur/ tshar gcod par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo

chen mo rgyal ba can bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas gsungs pa/ byin gyis brlabs pa dang / phyag rgyas btab pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di ni lha thams cad kyis

phyag byas pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje de'i phyir khyod

kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dang / phyag rgya zhes bya bar zung shig /bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa rgyal ba can zhes bya bar yang zung shig /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang /

rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //'phags pa rgyal ba can zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a b+hiShiny+tsa ni nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das

mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong brgyad stong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa bye ba sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das

kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu khyod kyis 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i ma dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi spyod pa dang / bden pa'i smon lam dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa yongs su bzung ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos

'di dag sgoms shing / /ston cig /'di lta ste/ gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gzungs ni/ yul na mi gnas/ phyogs na mi gnas na bcom ldan 'das gzungs

gzungs zhes bgyi ba la/ bcom ldan 'das gzungs zhes bgyi ba 'di'i tshig gi don gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ri'i bu legs so legs so/ /shA ri'i bu khyod 'di ltar theg

pa chen po la yang yang dag par zhugs pa dang / theg pa chen po la mngon par brtson pa dang / theg pa chen po la lhag par bya ba byed pa dang / khyod gzungs yul na mi gnas/ phyogs na mi gnas par ston pa yang legs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu gzungs ni chos nyid

kyis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba ma yin te/ shA ri'i bu gzungs ni 'das pa zhes mi 'chad/ ma 'ongs pa zhes mi 'chad/ da ltar byung ba zhes mi 'chad/ dngos por mi 'chad/ dngos po med par mi 'chad/ mtshan ma dang / mtshan ma med par mi

'chad/ chos gang skye ba'i phyir ram/ 'gag pa'i phyir mi 'chad mod kyi/ shA ri'i bu 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' la phan par bzhed pa'i phyir chos ston te/ gang 'di gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi gzungs ni gzugs med pa bya ba'i lam du gyur pa/ /rigs pa'i stobs kyis gnas

ba/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan/ sangs rgyas kyi lhag par bya ba sgrub pa/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims/ sangs rgyas kyi bsdus pa/ sangs rgyas kyi mtshams sbyor ba/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /

bcom ldan 'das gzungs gang la gnas shing gzungs de thob na byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang / dam bca' ba bzang ba dang / chos la mi gnas pa dang / bdag the tshom ma mchis pa

dang / slob dpon ma mchis pa dang / rang gi lam la gnas pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pas bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu legs so legs so/ /shA ri'i bu gzungs thob pa'i byang chub sems

dpa' ni sangs rgyas nyid du brjod do/ /shA ri'i bu gang la la zhig byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs thob pa la bsti stang du byed dam/ bla mar byed dam/ rim gror byed dam/ mchod na des sangs rgyas thams cad la bsti stang byas par 'gyur ro/ /gang dag gis gzungs 'di thos pa

dang / gang dag mos pa de dag kyang sangs rgyas rnams ji lta ba de bzhin du mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur zhing byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu gzungs ni 'di yin te/ san+d+hA ra NI/ ud+d+hA ra NI/ saM pra tiSh+Thi ta/ ut+ta ma/ su pra tiSh+Thi tA/ bi dza ya ba lA/

sarba pri ta dz+nyA A ro hA dz+nyA na ba ti/ uta pA da ni/ bi ni ma NI/ a b+hi Shany+tsa ni/ a b+hi bya hA rA/ shu b+ha ba ti/ a ni shri ta/ ba hu kum+b+ha/ a b+hi ba tsa/ shA ri'i bu 'di dag ni dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi ming rnams te/ 'das pa rnams dang / ma 'ongs pa rnams

dang / da ltar byung ba rnams dang / legs par gnas pa rnams byang chub sems dpa' gang gis legs par bzung ste 'chang ba de myur du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir bskal pa brgya dang / bskal pa stong dag smon lam gyis zad par byed par 'gyur/ de la mtshon

gyis mi tshugs par 'gyur/ me dang srog chags mi srun pa rnams kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shA ri'i bu gzungs 'di ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum mo/ /shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la las stong gsum

gyi stong chen po grangs med pa bcu mthar chags su gang ba'i sangs rgyas rnams la na bza' dang / zhal zas bzang pos bskal pa grangs med par gzung ba byas pa bas/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang gis gzungs 'di las tha na tshig gcig tsam bzung ba de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed do/ /

de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu dbang bskur ba'i gzungs 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi yum yin pa'i phyir ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/

bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas

gtan la phab pa// @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya hi ra N+ya ba tI nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dbyig dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig

na/ bcom ldan 'das dga' ldan na la ba dkar po lta bu'i rdo leb la byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag du ma thams cad kyang 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa/ skye ba gcig gis thogs pa sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas

bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po legs par gnas la bka' stsal pa/ legs par gnas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di 'dzin par mi 'dod pa des/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da

ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma mthong ngo / /ma thos so/ /ma myong ngo / /gang gis 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / myong ba des gzungs thob bo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar legs par gnas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bdag gis

bsod nams byas so zhes mi 'dzin/ bdag gis bsod nams ma yin pa dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas so zhes mi 'dzin to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar legs par gnas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gzungs 'dzin par mi rtog /

rnam par mi rtog go/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs thob pa ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams la dngos por ram/ mtshan nyid du mi rtog /yongs su mi rtog ste/ rkyen du ma yin/ rkyen med par ma yin/ 'gro bar ma yin/

'gro ba med par ma yin/ 'chi 'pho bar ma yin/ skye bar ma yin/ stong par ma yin/ mi stong par ma yin/ mtshan mar ma yin/ mtshan ma med par ma yin/ smon par ma yin/ smon pa med par ma yin/ skye bar ma yin/ 'gag par ma yin no/ /legs par

gnas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang mtha' 'dis spyod pa de ni ye shes la gnas pa zhes bya'o/ /gang gi tshe ye shes la gnas par gyur pa de'i tshe mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o/ /gang gi tshe mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de'i tshe dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs len

cing kun chub par byed la 'dzin te/ don dang tshig 'bru yang yongs su zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /yongs su ma brtags pa'i tshul khrims can yang yin te/ bden pa'i tshul khrims dang / rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims can no/ /ma brtags pa'i chos can yin te/ bden pa'i chos

can dang / rnam par dag pa'i chos can no/ /gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog cing rang gi chos la zhugs so/ /sangs rgyas la lhag par bya ba byas pa'o/ /rig pa'i cho ga la zhugs pa'o/ /legs par gnas de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi chags so/ /mi

'chad do/ /mi 'grol lo/ /legs par gnas gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi chags/ mi 'chang / mi 'grol ba de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi rigs dang / 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams

kyi rig sngags kyi ming gzhan gyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams kyis dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs thob bo/ /tad+ya thA/ ku Ti ku Ti/ ku tsA la/ e lA i mi ri to/ /ko thA lA/ i re ri/ i mi ri Ni/ legs par gnas 'di dag ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan

'das kyi rig sngags kyi ming gzhan no/ /ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi rig sngags kyi ming gzhan no/ /legs par gnas/ dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan

'das rnams kyi yum mo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'das pa'i don la mi gnas/ ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i don la mi gnas pa'i phyir ro/ /legs par gnas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la la dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di 'dzin pa des sangs rgyas

bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byas pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa dag gis bsgrags pa dang / khong du chud par byas pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

byang chub tu lung bstan pa yin no/ /legs par gnas/ dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di 'dzin pa des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa dag 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mnyes par byas/ bsnyen

bkur byas/ mchod pa byas so/ /bsod nams grangs med pa bskyed do/ /snyam du shes par bya'o/ /su zhig bsam pa gang gis dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di 'dzin pa de la de nye bar gnas par 'gyur te/ shes rab 'dod pa la shes rab dang / gzungs 'dod pa la

gzungs dang / dbyig 'dod pa la dbyig dang / thos pa 'dod pa la thos pa nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/ /'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/ zla ba yar gyi ngo la nyi ma shar kar 'bras sA lu'i chan dang 'o mar sbags te bza'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi rig sngags 'di dag dang / sangs rgyas bcom

ldan 'das rnams kyi rig sngags kyi ming gzhan dag rgyun du yid la bya'o/ /'on kyang gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gi mthus gang dag gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag na 'khod pa'i lha ma yin nam/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ mi 'am ci'am/

lto 'phye chen po 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ sam/ grul bum mam/ sha za 'am/ mi 'am/ mi ma yin pa de dag de la sems dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /bar chad byed par mi 'gyur/ rtag tu yongs su gzung bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

dga' bzang dang / yangs pa chen po dang / lag na rdo rje dang / yongs su dga' ldan dang / ri dben pa la gnas pa dang / gangs ri la gnas pas kyang yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro/ /'og min gyi bar gyi byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis kyang 'di lta ste/ dbyig dang ldan pa'i

gzungs kyi mthus 'jigs pa 'am/ dgon par de la byin gyis rlob par 'gyur/ de la mi 'jigs pa sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' ldan na la ba dkar po lta bu'i rdo leb la bzhugs shing / de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po legs par gnas dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag du ma de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //'phags pa dbyig dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar

gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya dzi gu li nA ma bid+yA/ bod skad du/

'phags pa dug sel ces bya ba'i rig sngags/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs

te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i tshe nga byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na/ gangs kyi ri yi byang ngos na/ /spos ngad ldan pa'i ri bo la/ /ri yi rgyal po'i sul gnas tshe/ /gzhon nu bsod nams brgya yi

mtshan/ /e na ya yi pags gyon la/ /sbrul gyis brgyan pa'i ska rags can/ /gdug pa'i sbrul gyis mgo rgyan byas/ /mthong na gdug pa'i rna rgyan can/ /dug gi me tog rnams za zhing / /ma lu ta yi lcug khu 'thung / /nga la de 'bod du 'jug /bu khyod tshur shog nga las

nyon/ /nga la dug sel ces bya ba/ /dug 'jig rig sngags dam pa yod/ /dug rnams gang yin de kun ni/ /nga yi ming gis 'jig par 'gyur/ /tad+ya thA/ oM i li mit+te/ ti li mit+te/ i li ti li mit+te/ dum+be/ dum bA lI ye/ dusme/ dusma li ye/ tar ke/ ta ka ra Ne/

marme/ marme ra Ne/ kash+mi ri/ kash+mI ra/ mug te/ a g+he/ a g+ha Ne/ a g+ha na g+ha Ne/ i lI a lI e/ a khA/ I e/ a byA/ i e/ shwe te/ sha ta/ duN+De/ a nu rag+te swA hA/ dge slong dag nga'i dug sel gyi rig sngags 'di ni sbyin pa thams cad dkar po ste/ sus rig

sngags 'di lan cig thos pa de la lo bdun gyi bar du sbrul gyis mi za'o/ /de'i lus la dug gis mi tshugs so/ /sbrul gang zhig de la 'dzin na de'i mgo shing ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas so/ /gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag sbrul gyi mdun du brjod par mi bya'o/ /de

ci'i phyir zhe na/ sbrul de 'chi ba'i phyir ro/ /tad+ya thA/ i la lA/ tsi la lI/ tsakra bak+ko/ /kau Da/ ko De Di/ ku ru ta/ ku ru Da ti/ po DA ti/ bu ru dA/ pu ru de ti/ mo De ti/ ni ku ru De/ ni ku ru De/ ni ma mu ru ta/ ni ma mu ru De te/ pu ru de/ phut+ta re ha/ phut+ta phuT+TaT+TaM Da ra he/ nA ga rA

he/ na gad+ta da ta N+Da ra he/ sarba ra he/ sarba tat+ta da ra ha/ ats+tshi ats+tshi/ pu ru Ta ta/ tsa la bi She/ shI te/ shI tA/ ban+d+ha le/ mA tA le/ ha le ha le/ ha la ha la/ ha la le/ e la le/ ke pa tsa le/ mi la le/ taN+Di haN+Di/ ta Ta ta Ta/ s+phu Ta s+phu Ta/ phaT Ta phaT Ta/ ha ra bi shwa swA hA/

dge slong dag de ltar na dug sel gyis 'byung po 'dus pa thams cad la rig sngags gang brjod cing bsnyad pa de dag thams cad ni de bzhin no/ /gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin no/ /yang dag pa'o/ /bden pa'o/ /ma nor ba'o/ /phyin ci ma log pa'o/ /dug 'di mi

gdug par gyur cig /sbyin par byed pa'i gan du song shig /'dzin pa'i gan du song shig /me'i nang du song shig /chu'i nang du song shig /thang la song shig /ka ba'i nang du song shig /rtsig pa'i nang du song shig /nam mkha' la song shig /sa'i nang du song shig /zhi

bar gyur cig swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// /'phags pa dug sel ces bya ba'i rig sngags rdzogs so// //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ sid+d+ha pa Thi ta b+ha ga wa tI Ar+ya ang+gu li nA ma bid+yA rA dz+nyI/ bod skad du/ bklags pas grub pa bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sor mo can zhes bya ba rig pa'i rgyal mo/ /sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun

la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de ltar dge slong rnams ri dri rgyal na gnas te de'i tshe 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang de na bzhugs te/ des bdag la smras pa/ bu sngags kyi tshig 'di nyon cig /klu'i dbang po rnams kyi dug med par byed/ sbrul gyi dug med par byed/ g.yog

rnams dang / srin po rnams dang / 'byung po rnams dang / sha za rnams dang / sems can stobs po che rnams dang / grul bum rnams dang / sems can phra mo rnams dang / phra men pha dang / phra men ma dang / chu srin dang / stag dang / grul bum dang rwa can

dang / mche ba can gyis de ltar sngags kyi tshig drag shul chen po a~M gu li yang dag par thos na sngags kyi gtso bo sems can gdug pa rab tu 'jil bar byed pa ste/ sngags can gang gis de shes na lha rnams kyi gdug pa yang dag par med par byed do/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba ti ar+ya aM gu li/

tad+ya thA/ oM klu'am/ klu mo'am/ sbrul lam/ sbrul mo'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ gnod sbyin mo'am/ 'byung po'am/ 'byung mo 'am/ phra men pha 'am/ phra men ma'am/ gdug pas zin pa'am/ gdug pas ma zin pa yang rung ste/ pha pha pha/ ha re ha re ha re/

re dza re/ be sha be/ nA ga re/ sarba re re/ ha ra ha ra/ ma ra ma ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ bi d+ha ra bi d+ha ra/ ma ra ma ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ ma Ta ma Ta/ mo Ta ya mo Ta ya/ shI g+h+raM shI g+h+raM/ la g+hu la g+hu/ A na ya A na ya/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ g+hur+N+Na g+hur+N+Na/ g+hur+NaN pa ya g+hur+N+Na

pa ya/ dpag tshad stong brgyad cu na gnas pa'i klu rnams kyi gdug pa med par mdzod cig /klu thams cad chings shig /sod cig /thar bar mdzod cig /oM hu lu hu lu/ ha la ha la/ ha la bi shaM/ bcom ldan 'das ma grub pa'i rgyal mo aM gu lis bka' stsal pa/ tak+ke/

Tak+ke/ Tak+ke ni/ Tak+ke ni/ shi ra shi ra/ tsan+d+ra ke sha ro hi Ni/ bgegs thams cad sel bar mdzad pa can/ las stong can/ bcom ldan 'das ma grub pa a~M gu li ta thA bi ga ta/ klu mo'i tshogs sum cus mchod pa/ dza ya dza ya sid+d+ha/ rgyal bar mdzad pa/ mi mgo'i thod kyi

phreng ba can hU~M k+Sha skad cig thang cig yud tsam nyin par gyi bar du dug sel ba/ a su ra de bi ta dang / da na pa'i stobs 'joms par byed pa can/ bgegs 'joms par mdzad pa can/ lha'i yum khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod swA hA/ sngags kyi tshig drag shul can sbrul

gyi mdun du bklag par mi bya ste/ 'chi ba dang / klad pa 'gas shing tshal pa brgyar 'gyur ro/ /sngags kyi tshig drag shul can chen mo sbrul gyis thos na thams cad tshig par byed do/ /oM ki li ki li/ ma hA ki li/ kA la rU pi ni/ bgegs thams cad zlog shig /pha pham

pha rol pham par mdzod cig swA hA/ bklags pas 'grub pa aM gu li'i snying po dang bcas pa'o/ /tad+ya thA/ oM d+hu ne d+hu ne/ d+hu ni d+hu ni/ sat+ya/ tAT+Ta hA si ni d+hu d+hu ni/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ rdo rje'i gzungs mang pos bka' stsal pa/ 'jog po'i dug 'dor du 'jug la/ dza ya dza ya/ mu dza

mu dza/ muny+dza muny+dza/ thong shig /glog dang rlung zhes bya ba mgyogs pa'i shugs can/ ro langs chen mo bcom ldan 'das ma shAkya thub pa'i zhal nas 'byung ba'o/ /mu ya muny+tsa muny+tsa swA hA/ bklags pas 'grub pa bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags

ma sor mo can zhes bya ba rig pa'i rgyal mo rdzogs so// @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yA sarba d+ha rma mA tr-i kA nA ma d+hA ra NI/ /bod skad du/ 'phags ma chos thams cad kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'

thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis chos thams cad kyi yum zhes bya ba'i

phyag rgya'i gzungs/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa ste/ nga yang da ltar 'chad pa zung shig /tad+ya thA/ a brte a brte/ bi brte bi brte/ b+ha ga ma shud+d+he/ pra b+hA swa re tA ra Ne/ uka kha le/ mug kha le/ sarba d+harmA pA shi ba ta

ni swA hA/ de nas gnas gtsang ma'i lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis gzungs 'di'i snying po brjod par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ ats+tshe/ a na le/ e lu le/ e lu phe/ mUrta a nu ga te sarba d+harma a d+hi pa ta ye/

prAp+te dz+yosna ka ra/ a d+hi ga ta dz+nyA ne bi shud+d+he pa ti swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //

chos thams cad kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tsU Da ma Ni nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'phags

pa nyan thos dang / /rang sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes bya mtha' yas pa ma lus par khyab pa mchog tu rmad du byung zhing rnam par dag

pa'i thugs mnga' ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa/ phongs pa thams cad las yongs su skyob par mdzad pa/ 'jigs pa thams cad

las rnam par thar bar mdzad pa/ yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa thams cad 'jigs par mdzad pa/ mi mthun pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'thab pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar mdzad pa/ sdig pa thams cad 'joms par mdzad pa/ 'byung po dang / ro langs

dang / gshis ngan du 'chi ba dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / bgegs kyi log 'dren thams cad 'jigs par mdzad pa/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / mu ge dang / mya ngan gyi 'jigs pa thams cad bzlog par mdzad pa/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri

za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad 'dun par mdzad pa/ /dug dang / 'brum phran dang / thor bu dang / gshed byed dang / byad dang / ro langs dang / bkra mi shis pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad 'jigs par mdzad pa la

phyag 'tshal lo/ /gshed byed thams cad sel bar byed/ /sdig pa thams cad 'phrog pa nyid/ /nor dang 'bru rnams 'phel mdzad pa/ /bdag gi bu dang tsha bo dang / /g.yog 'khor rtag tu mang gyur pa/ /phyir bzlog pa 'di brjod par bya/ /lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed tshe/ /

brgya byin lha min rnams las pham/ /de nas rings pa kho nar ni/ /'jig rten dbang gi drung 'ongs te/ /de nas snying ni rab skrag pas/ /'di skad kyis ni tshig gsol to/ /lha min bdag pham 'jig rten dbang / /ji ltar bdag gis nan tan bgyi/ /'jig rten dbang po bdag

la ni/ /lha yi gzigs pas rtag tu gzigs/ /brgya byin gyi ni tshig gsan nas/ /dbang phyug gis ni 'di skad gsungs/ /lha yi dbang po nga la nyon/ /khyod la ngas ni bsrung ba sbyin/ /lha'i dbang po sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na 'jig rten gyi

khams 'jig rten gyis rnam par bltas pa zhes bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten dbang phyug 'od las ngas gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba'i phyir zlog pa de bzhin gshegs pa bye bas gsungs pa bzung ngo / /mkhas pa

gang gis rig sngags 'di/ /bris nas spyi bor 'dogs pa'am/ /'don tam 'on te klog na yang / /de yi 'jigs pa kun med de/ /rtag tu srung zhing sba ba dang / /g.yul 'gyed pa na rgyal bar byed/ /sdig dang rmi ngan zhi ba dang / /bsod nams bkra shis rab tu 'phel/ /

lha yi dbang po de bas na/ /gang zhig rgyal bar 'gyur 'dod pas/ /bris te spyi bor gdags par bya/ /yid la rtag tu dran par gyis/ /g.yul 'gyed 'ba' zhig ma yin te/ /'di ni rtag tu sdig pa 'phrog /bud med rnams la bu pho skyed/ /mngal na gnas pa yongs su skyong / /

phun sum tshogs pa thams cad byed/ /sdig pa thams cad rab tu 'jig /'di ming phyir zlog byed ces bya/ /yan lag rnams la phyir 'bab byed/ /lha'i dbang po phyir zlog pa zhes bya ba rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo sems can thams cad la phan par byed pa/ lha ma yin rnams

pham par byed pa/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa zung shig /sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub

sems dpa' dag dang bcas pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ oM dza ya ka ri/ yud d+ho t+ta ra Ni bi tsi tra mu khi/ sarba maM ga la d+hA ra NI/ dzI mU te sa ha sra b+hu dze/ sa ha sra ne tre/ sa ha sra shir se/ nA nA lang+kA rA b+hi b+hU Shi te/ ma Ni kuN+Da la saM nA ha san+na d+he/ bi tsi tra mau li d+ha re/ tsan+d+ra sUr+ya/

a ti re ke/ A kA sha ga ga na tsa ri Ne/ maM ga la shi re dzI mU te/ pa bI tra kr-i ta maM ga l+ye/ b+hU ri ma d+h+ri ka ra Ne/ tsu ru tsu ru/ shwe te da ste/ mu ru mu ru/ shwe te/ a ba nat+te/ hu ru hu ru/ pa bi tra mu khi/ ku ru ku ru/ tsan+d+ra mu khi/ A di t+ya pa sha brti ni/ dzaM b+ha ni/ maM ga la

d+hA ra Ni/ stam+b+ha ni/ sarba bid+yA d+ha ra mA te/ mo ha ne/ a mo g+ha pA sha ha ste/ sarba b+ha ya bi mo tsa ni/ rA dza tsau ra/ a g+ni bi Sha u da ka b+ha ya pra sha ma ni/ kakhorda ni bAr Ni/ oM hi ri hi ri/ dza ya ka ri/ ba la ka ri/ d+ha na ka ri/ te dza ska ri/ bi bA da pra sha ma ni/ yud+d+ha ni bA ra Ni/

pa ra tsa kra pra sha ma ni/ pa ra sai n+ya bi nA sha ni/ yud+d+hot+ta ra Ni/ pra b+hU ta be la/ ma Ni ma Ni/ ma hA ma Ni/ ma nyA ma Ni/ ma NI na d+ha ri/ tri lo ka A lo ka ka ri/ tri pu ra na ga ra bi d+h+wan+sa ni pa ra sai n+ya bi dra ba ni/ sarba kr-i t+ya karma Ni sU da ni/ sarba byA d+hI nAM pra sha ma ni/ oM tsi le mi le swA hA/ tsi le

mi le swA hA/ mi li mi li swA hA/ tsi li tsi li swA hA/ tsa khi li tsa khi li swA hA/ tsaN+Da li mi Ti ni swA hA/ Ur d+ha ke shi pid+ga le/ pid+ga lA k+She dan+te mu khi swA hA/ oM ka ra ka ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ sa ra sa ra/ si ri si ri/ su ru su ru/ muny+tsa muny+tsa/ muny+tsA pa ya/ muny+tsA pa ya/ pra sha ma ya/ pra sha ma

ya/ yud+d+hot+ta ra Ni phaT/ tsit+ta nir ma la ka ri phaT/ a su ra ni r+g+ha ta ni phaT/ dza ya ka ri phaT/ pri ti ka ra phaT/ sa ha sra shi ra se phaT/ sa ha sra b+hu dze phaT/ sa ha sra ne tre phaT/ sarba bid+yA d+ha ra d+ha ra na ma skr-i te phaT/ sarba sha truM nA sha ni phaT/ sarba b+ha ya bi mo k+Sha Ni phaT/ pa ra tsakra ni bar

Ni phaT/ pa ra sai n+ya bi dra ba Ni phaT/ sarba kr-i t+ya karma sU da ni phaT/ sarba byA d+hi pra sha ma ni phaT/ sarba gra ho ta sA da ni phaT/ rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM sarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/ sa man+ta bi trA nAM/ so bsta ya kA nAM/ sa pa ri bA rA NAM/ te dzasaM ma ma sha rI raM/ sarba b+ha yo pa dra beb+h+yaH/ sarba yud+d+he b+h+yaH/ sarba

gra he b+h+yaH/ sarba byA d+hi b+h+yaH/ sarba duskr-i te b+h+yaH/ sarba kr-i t+ya ka kho rde b+h+yaH/ sarba bi She b+h+yaH/ sarba kA ya bAk+tsit+ta bi rA d+he b+h+yash+tsa/ rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM swA hA/ gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba'i phyir zlog pa las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar byed pa/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ thams cad du zhi bar

byed pa/ bsod nams thams cad sogs par byed pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yang dag par ston par byed pa/ rnam pa thams cad du dpal du byed pa ste/ yi ge bris pa dang / ston pa dang / bklags pa dang / bzung bas bdag dang gzhan bsrung

ba'o/ /de bzhin du khrus bya ba dang / sbyin sreg gis yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o/ /'phags pa gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye

shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya Sha Da k+Sha ra bid+yA/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag

gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags gang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas drug dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang / gnod sbyin

gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis bshad pa/ yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di kun dga' bo khyod kyis zung shig /chongs shig /lhogs shig /kun chub par gyis shig /tad+ya thA/ dan+ti le/ kan+ti le/ da N+Di ma ti/ ma d+hu ma ti/ ma raN+Di/ ko ra N+De/ drA bi ti/ ko shA ri/ tsha Ta dze/

du du ma ni/ ke tu ma ti/ tsu dun+d+he/ kau Ta da na te/ ta hu ra re/ e na ni ge/ hu ta ba hu ni/ kun dga' bo 'di ni yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags te/ klad pa na ba dang / mig na ba dang / rna ba na ba dang / so na ba dang / sna na ba dang / lce na ba dang / snying na ba dang / lto na ba dang / rgyab na ba dang / rtsib

logs na ba dang / chu so na ba dang / byin pa na ba dang / rkang pa na ba dang / yan lag na ba dang / nying lag na ba dang / zas ma zhu ba dang / sbos pa dang / mngal du thogs pa dang / rlung las gyur pa dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / 'dus pa las gyur

pa dang / rims drag po dang / nyin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang / nyin bzhi pa dang / rims yud tsam pa dang / nyin mo'i rims dang / mtshan mo'i rims kyis btab pa las yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags 'dis bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba

dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / chus gtor ba dang / srad bus bcing ba byas pa las gang zhig 'gal bar byed na/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal ba bdun du mi 'gas pa ni

kun dga' bo ngas lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten na ma mthong ngo / /tad+ya thA/ aN+Da re/ paN+Da re/ ka re te/ ke yU re/ b+hU taM ga me/ b+hu ta gra he/ b+hu

ta pra k+Shi te/ b+hu ta ya sma ra ya ni/ pri yA ba ni te/ dza ba ti/ ya sho ba ti/ gi ri Ni ni/ sha rI Ni ni/ bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad las bde legs su gyur cig swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha

dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //'phags pa yi ge drug pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags rdzogs so// @#/ /'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong

phrag brgya pa'i gzungs/ bcom ldan 'das ma yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ta d+ya thA/ oM mu ni d+harme/ saM gra ha d+harme/ a nu gra ha d+harme/ bi muk+ti d+harme/ sA rA nu gra ha d+harme/ bai shra ba Na pa ri brta na d+harme/ sarba kAr+ya pa ri pra ma Na d+harme/ sa man+tA nu pa ri brta ni d+harme swA hA/ oM pradz+nye

shru tismr-i ti ma ti bi dza ye swA hA/ d+hIHd+hA ra NI swA hA/ oM pradz+hA pA ra mi tA ba la swA hA/ 'di bzung bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa gzung bar 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro/ /las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa stong phrag brgya pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// @#/ /'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa'i gzungs/ bcom ldan 'das ma yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ oM pradz+nyApradz+nye/ pradz+nyA a ba b+hA se/ pra dz+nyA ba lo ka ti sarba d+ha rma

an+d+ha ka ra b+hi d+ha ma ni/ sid+d+he su sid+d+ha/ sid+d+h+yan+tu mAM b+ha ga ba ti/ sarba dz+nyA nas n+ng+ha ri/ b+ha ga ba ti bad tshe la/ pra sa ra d+he hasta ma ma su ka ra/ sid+d+hi sid+d+hi/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ kaM pa kaM pa/ pA la pA la/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ba ra ba ra/ gardza gardza/ A gats+tsha A gats+tsha ba ga ba ti mA bi lam+ba swA hA/ 'di bzung bas shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa gzung bar 'gyur ro/ /las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// @#/ /'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa'i gzungs/ bcom ldan 'das

ma yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ oM hrIH shru ti smr-i ti bi dza ye swA hA/ pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA ye/ sarba durga ti sho d+ha ya/ rA dzA ya swA hA/ 'di bzung bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa gzung bar 'gyur ro/ /ltas ngan pa sna tshogs kyang bzlog go/ /las kyi

sgrib pa dang / ngan song thams cad rnam par sbyong bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// @#/ /pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi snying po'i gzungs/ 'phags pa yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas la phyag

'tshal lo/ /chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /na mo d+harma kA ya/ saM b+ho ga kA ya/ nirmA Na kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ dA na pA ra mi tA/ shI la pA ra mi tA/ k+ShAn+ti pA ra mi tA/ bIr+ya pA ra mi tA/ d+h+yA na pA ra mi tA/ pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA/ sarba d+harma shU n+ya tA swA hA/ 'di bzung bas pha rol

tu phyin pa drug gzung bar 'gyur ro/ /stong pa nyid yid la byas par 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /mtshams med pa lnga byang bar 'gyur ro/ /ltas ngan pa thams cad kyang mi sdig go/ /pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi snying po'i gzungs

rdzogs so// @#/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sbyin pa'i snying po 'di lan cig thos pas sbyin pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /oM na ma stai b+ha ga ba ti dA nA d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/ tshul khrims kyi snying po 'di lan cig thos pas tshul khrims thob par 'gyur ro/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nAM/ ma hA ka nA da ma kA

nAM/ na mo b+ha ga ba t+yai/ shI la pa ri pUr+Na sha rI yai shI laM me/ sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/ kin tiSh+Tha saM bud+d+ho b+ha ga ban d+harma s+ya/ sa mA dz+nyA na pa ya ti swA hA/ bzod pa'i snying po 'di lan cig thos pas bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga tA ya/ a tsin+ta go tsar+ya/ na mo k+ShAn+ti ye ba hu b+hiH/ ta thA ga ta na b+hu ta ko Ti b+hi ba ri ba

ra ti ta yai rak+ShaM ku ru tu ru tu ru sa ma ya ma nu sma ra shAkya mu ni sarba ta thA ga tA naM a pa ri mi tA dz+nyA na go tsa ro dz+nyA nA pa ya ti swA hA/ brtson 'grus kyi snying po 'di lan cig thos pas brtson 'grus thob par 'gyur ro/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nAM/ ma tsin t+ya bi shA ya nAM/ na mo stu te b+ha ga ba te bI r+ya bA ra mi tA/ bIr+ya ku ru bIr+ye bIr+ye/ ma hA

bIr+ya ta tA ga ta/ sarba dz+nyA nA pa ya ti swA hA/ bsam gtan gyi snying po 'di lan cig thos pas bsam gtan thob par 'gyur ro/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nAM/ oM bi ma le/ nirma le/ d+h+yA ned+h+yA ne/ d+h+yA na pri ye hU~M phaT/ shes rab kyi snying po 'di lan cig thos pas shes rab thob par 'gyur ro/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga tA ya/ a pa ri

mi tA dz+nyA na go tsa rA ya/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ dz+nyA na pA ra mi tA yai/ dz+nyA nUM mi ku ru ku ru bi gA na ta thA ga ta s+ya/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ hi hi hi hi/ dz+nyA dz+nyA dz+nyA dz+nyA/ hU~M hU~M phaT/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug gzung bar 'gyur ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// @#/ /pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i snying po 'di lan cig thos pas pha

rol tu phyin pa bcu thob par 'gyur ro/ /na maHsarba tA nAM ta thA ga tA nAM/ da sha pA ra mi tA pa ri pU ra kA nAM hI/ pha rol tu phyin pa bcu thob par 'gyur ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// @#/ /'di lan cig brjod pas byams pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nAM/ tsu ru tsu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ kA ru Ne/ kA ru N+ya

tsit+ta muta pA da ya/ b+ha ga ba ti sarba b+ha yaM me nA sha ya swA hA/ 'di lan cig brjod pas snying rje thob par 'gyur ro/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nAM/ na mo b+ha ga ba ti sarba sa tra pri ye hU~M mu di ti swA hA/ 'di lan cig brjod pas dga' pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nAM/ a tsin t+ya be shA nI/ o~M tu ru tu ru

traM/ hu lu hu lu mu lu mu lu swA hA/ 'di lan cig brjod pas btang snyoms thob par 'gyur ro/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga tA hr-i da ya/ a nu ga te/ oM ku ruM gi ni swA hA/ tshad med pa bzhi thob par 'gyur ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// @#/ /bcom ldan 'das

ma 'phags ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ o~M mu ni d+harme/ saM gra ha d+harme/ a nu gra ha d+harme/ bi mug+ti d+harme/ sa dA A nu gra ha d+harme/ bai shra ba Na pa ri brti ta d+harme/ sarba kAr+ya pa ri pra ma Na d+harme/ sa ma tA pa ri brta na d+harme swA hA/ oM

pradz+nye shru ti smr-i ti bi dza ye/ d+hIHd+hA ra NI ye swA hA/ 'di bzung bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa gzung bar 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa gzung bar 'gyur ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// @#/ /dkon mchog gsum

la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM n+thAM na maHsarba bud d+hA nAM/ oM mAM/ b+h+rUM mUM/ tad+ya thA/ oM brUM/ 'di bzung bas 'phags pa phal po che gzung bar 'gyur ro/ /'dri ba dang / klog pa yang de dang 'dra'o/ /'phags pa phal po che gzung bar 'gyur ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //

dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /na maHsa man+tA bud d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ o~M ki Ni ki Ni ta tA ga ta ut+b+ha ba shAn+te ba ra de/ ut+ta ma ut+ta ma ta thA ga ta/ ut+b+ha ba hU~M phaT swA hA/ 'di bzung bas 'phags pa sdong po bkod pa'i mdo thams cad rdzogs par bklags

shing kha ton du byas par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das ba thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dang / dam tshig shes par 'gyur ro/ /phyag rgya rnams kyang shes par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa sdong po bkod pa'i snying po rdzogs so// @#/ /dkon mchog

gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ oM d+hu na d+hu na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ 'di bzung bas 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo gzung bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo gzung bar 'gyur

ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// @#/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas kun nas thogs med ston la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM pi shu ni swA hA/ 'di bzung na 'phags pa rma bya chen mo'i snying po gzung bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa rma bya chen mo'i snying po rdzogs so// @#/ /dkon mchog

gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ oM ma Ni d+ha ri badzri Ni ma hA pra ti sa re hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ 'di bzung bas 'phags ma rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ma chen mo gzung bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags ma so sor 'brang ma chen mo gzung bar 'gyur ba'i gzungs rdzogs

so// @#/ /'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /blo gros chen po sngags kyi tshig 'di dag bshad par bya'o/ /tad+ya thA/ oM pad+me pad+me de bai/ hi ne hi ne hi ne/ tsu lu tsu lu tsu lu/ hu le hu le hu le/ yu le yu le yu le/ /pa le pa le pa le/ muM ts+tshe da na de/ b+hin+de b+han dz+wa/ man de pra ma

de/ di na ka re swA hA/ blo gros chen po rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la sngags kyi tshig 'di dag 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed na/ lha'am/ lha mo'am/ klu'am/ klu mo'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ gnod sbyin mo'am/ lha ma yin nam/ lha ma yin mo'am/

nam mkha' lding ngam/ nam mkha' lding mo'am/ mi'am ci'am/ mi 'am ci mo'am/ lto 'phye chen po'am/ lto 'phye chen mo'am/ dri za'am/ dri za mo'am/ 'byung po'am/ 'byung mo'am/ grul bum mam/ grul bum mo'am/ sha za'am/ sha za mo'am/ gnon po'am/ gnon mo'am/

brjed byed dam/ brjed byed mo'am/ srin po'am/ srin mo'am/ phra men pho'am/ phra men mo'am/ mdangs 'phrog pho'am/ mdangs 'phrog mo'am/ lus srul po'am/ lus srul mo'am/ mi 'am mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad kyis glags mi rnyed do/ /gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag klog par byed pa des

lang kar gshegs pa'i mdo thams cad bklags par 'gyur ro/ /sngags kyi tshig 'di dag ni bcom ldan 'das kyis srin po la sogs pa rnams bzlog pa'i phyir gsungs so/ /'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa'i mdo thams cad bklags par 'gyur ba'i gzungs sngags rdzogs so// //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha si tA ta pa trA nA ma a pa rA dzi ta pra t+yaM gi ra ma hA bid+yA rA dz+nyI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar po can zhes bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir zlog pa'i rig

sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo'o/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i gnas chos lha'i 'dun sa

na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs nas/ gtsug tor rnam par gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin

la snyoms par zhugs so/ /snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug tor gyi dbus nas gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag byung ngo / /na mo b+ha ga ba te uSh+NI ShA ya shud+d+he bi ra dze bi ma le swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das gtsug tor thogs pa med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs

rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun po rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byams pa la sogs pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams

la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten na dgra bcom pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten na yang dag par song ba

rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha'i drang srong rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rig sngags 'chang grub pa'i drang srong rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rig sngags 'chang grub pa'i drang srong dmod pa'i mtshon cha can dmod pas phan

'dogs nus pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha tshangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das legs ldan drag po dka' thub zlog ma'i bdag po dang lhan cig pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chu lha la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das legs

ldan sred med kyi bu phyag rgya chen po lngas phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das legs ldan dga' byed dbang phyug nag po chen po grong khyer sum brtsegs 'jig par byed pa kha che zhing dur khrod chen po na gnas par mos pa ma mo'i tshogs kyis phyag byas pa dang lhan cig

pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das nor bu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan

'das rgyal po'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das las kyi gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das gzhon nu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das glang po'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom

ldan 'das gti mug gi gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das chags pa'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' brtan pa'i sde mtshon cha'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan

'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi bskyod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs

pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa rgya mtsho 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin

gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don yod grub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po me tog shin tu rgyas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma mchog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gtsug tor can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad skyob la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas log par dad sel la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser thub la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan

'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin

gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin

gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun du bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa

dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma rgyas pa dang ut+pa la'i dri'i tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de rnams la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar po can zhes bya ba gzhan gyis

mi thub ma phyir zlog pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di rab tu brjod par bya'o/ /'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ 'byung po dang gdon thams cad zlog par byed pa/ pha rol gyi rig sngags thams cad gcod par byed pa/ dus

ma yin par 'chi ba las yongs su skyob pa/ sems can bcings pa thams cad thar bar byed pa/ sdang ba dang rmi lam ngan pa thams cad 'joms par byed pa/ gnod sbyin dang srin po'i gdon thams cad rnam par rlag par byed pa/ gdon stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi po rnams

rnam par 'joms par byed pa/ rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad rab tu sgrub par byed pa/ dgra thams cad zlog par byed pa/ gza' chen po brgyad rnam par rlag par byed pa/ drag shul dang / sdang ba dang rmi lam ngan pa rnams rnam par 'joms par byed pa/ dug dang mtshon dang me dang chu

las skyob par byed pa/ ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa thams cad las sgrol ba/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba brgyad kyi bar du yongs su skyob par byed pa ste/ gzhan gyis mi thub drag shul che/ /stobs chen gzi brjid chen mo ste/ /gtum pa chen mo dkar mo che/ /gsal ba chen mo

stobs chen mo/ /'bar ba chen mo phreng ba che/ /gos dkar mo ni chen mo ste/ /'phags ma sgrol ma khro gnyer can/ /rgyal ba'i rdo rje phreng zhes grags/ /pad+ma'i snang ba rdo rje'i mtshan/ /gzhan gyis mi thub phreng ba can/ /rdo rje mchu can rnam sgag ma/ /zhi ba'i lha rnams kyis

mchod pa/ /zhi gzugs dkar mo chen mo ste/ /'bar ba dang ni gos dkar mo/ /'phags ma sgrol ma stobs chen mo/ /'chi med rdo rje lu gu rgyud/ /rdo rje gzhon nu rig 'dzin ma/ /lag na rdo rje'i rdo rje dang / /de bzhin rig sngags gser phreng can/ /le brgan rtsi

dang rin chen ma/ /rnam par snang mdzad rigs kyi 'od/ /de bzhin gshegs rigs gtsug tor ma/ /rnam par bsgyings ma'i phreng ba dang / /rdo rje gser 'od lta bu'i spyan/ /rdo rje sgros dang dkar mo dang / /pad+ma'i spyan dpal sangs rgyas spyan/ /de bzhin

rdo rje zla ba'i 'od/ /de bzhin rdo rje 'dzin ma dang / /rdo rje phreng ba sgyu 'phrul che'i/ /lha mo dang ni gser 'od can/ /spyan mdzes ma dang dkar mo dang / /pad+ma yi ni spyan can dang / /rnam dul zhi ba'i sems dang ni/ /zla 'od bdag gi yon tan shes/ /phyag rgya'i tshogs de dag

dang / /ma mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa thams cad kyis bdag 'khor dang bcas pa dang sems can thams cad la bsrung ba mdzad du gsol/ oM r-i Shi ga Na pra shA sta sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha si tA ta pa tre hU~M drUM hrIHSh+ToM/ dzam+b+ha ni hU~M drUM hrIHSh+ToM/ stam+b+ha ni hU~M drUM hrIHSh+ToM/ mo ha na ka rI hU~M drUM hrIHSh+ToM/ pa ri bid+yA

sam b+hak+Sha Na ka rI hU~M drUM hrIHSh+ToM/ sarba bid+yA ts+tshe da na ka rI hU~M drUM hrI Sh+ToM/ sarba duSh+TA nAM stam+b+ha na ka rI hU~M drUM hrIHSh+ToM/ sarba yak+Sha rAk+Sha sa gra hA NAM bid+h+waM sa na ka rI hU~M hrUM hrIHSh+ToM/ tsa tu rA shI tI nAM gra ha sa ha srA NAM bi d+h+wan+sa na ka rI hU~M drUM hrIHSh+ToM/ aSh+TA biM sha tI nAM na k+Sha tA NA spra sA d+ha na ka rI hU~M drUM hrIHSh+ToM/ aSh+TA nAM ma

hA gra hANAm+bi d+h+raM sa na ka rI hU~M drUM hrIHSh+ToM/ rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM sarba sa twAMSh+tsa/ bcom ldan 'das ma de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can rdo rje gtsug tor phyir zlog pa chen mo phyag stong mnga' ba chen mo/ dbu stong mnga' ba chen mo/ spyan

bye ba brgya phrag stong mnga' ba chen mo/ mi phyed 'bar ba'i mtshan rtags can/ rdo rje yangs pa chen pos/ sa gsum gyi dkyil 'khor du mnga' mdzad ma/ oM bdag dang sems can thams cad bde legs su mdzad du gsol/ rgyal po'i 'jigs pa dang / chom rkun gyi

'jigs pa dang / me'i 'jigs pa dang / chu'i 'jigs pa dang / dug gi 'jigs pa dang / mtshon gyi 'jigs pa dang / dgra'i 'jigs pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi 'jigs pa dang / mu ge'i 'jigs pa dang / dgra'i 'jigs pa dang / thog gi 'jigs pa dang /

dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa dang / sa g.yo ba'i 'jigs pa dang / skar mda' lhung ba'i 'jigs pa dang / rgyal po'i chad pa'i 'jigs pa dang / gcan gzan gtum po'i 'jigs pa dang / klu'i 'jigs pa dang / glog gi 'jigs pa dang / bye ma tsha mo'i 'jigs

pa dang / nam mkha' lding gi 'jigs pa dang / yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'go ba'i nad dang / 'khrug pa thams cad kyi 'jigs pa dang / gdon gyi 'jigs pa dang / lha'i gdon dang / klu'i gdon dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon dang / srin po'i gdon dang / dri

za'i gdon dang / lha ma yin gyi gdon dang / nam mkha' lding gi gdon dang / rlung lha'i gdon dang / mi 'am ci'i gdon dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gdon dang / mi'i gdon dang / mi ma yin pa'i gdon dang / 'byung po'i gdon dang / kyi gdon dang / sha za'i gdon

dang / grul bum gyi gdon dang / srul po'i gdon dang / lus srul po'i gdon dang / skem byed kyi gdon dang / smyo byed kyi gdon dang / grib gnon gyi gdon dang / brjed byed kyi gdon dang / gnon po'i gdon dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon dang / lus chags

ma'i gdon dang / nam gru'i gdon dang / tsher ma 'don pa'i gdon dang / re lde 'don pa'i gdon dang / bya'i gdon dang / ma mo dga' bar byed pa'i gdon dang / kun du phreng bar byed pa'i gdon dang / 'phyang ba'i gdon dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon dang / lus

mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon dang / ka Tang ka Ta'i tshogs can gyi gdon dang / gdon thams cad dang / mdangs 'phrog pa dang / mngal za ba dang / khrag 'thung ba dang / zhag za ba dang / sha za ba dang / tshil za ba dang / rkang za ba dang / btsas pa za ba dang / srog 'phrog

pa dang / gtor ma za ba dang / phreng ba za ba dang / dri za ba dang / me tog za ba dang / bdug pa za ba dang / 'bras bu za ba dang / lo tog za ba dang / bsreg bya za ba dang / rnag 'thung ba dang / bshang ba za ba dang / gcin 'thung ba dang / mchil ma za ba dang / snabs za

ba dang / ngar snabs za ba dang / skyugs pa za ba dang / nom bu za ba dang / mi gtsang ba za ba dang / stor khung nas 'bab pa 'thung ba dang / nor 'phrog pa dang / sems 'phrog pa rnams dang / de dag thams cad dang gdon thams cad kyis byas pa'i rig

sngags thams cad ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /kun du rgyus byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /mkha' 'gro dang mkha' 'gro mas byas pa'i rig sngags thams cad ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /tshangs

pas byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /brgya byin gyis byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /sred med kyi bus byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /phyugs bdag chen po dang

drag pos byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /nag po chen pos byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /ma mo'i tshogs kyis byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /mi'i thod pa

can gyis byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /ri khrod pas byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /g.yung pos byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /skar mda' gdong gis byas pa'i

rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /rdo rje gzhon nu mas byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /gshin rje gshed kyis byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /gshin rje'i pho nyas byas pa'i rig

sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /klu ma rungs pas byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /me'i las kyis byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /log 'dren gyis byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris

gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /gzhon nus byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /rgyal po chen po bzhis byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /sring mo bzhis byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo

rje phur bus gdab bo/ /nam mkha' lding yang dag pas byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /rgyal bar byed pa dang sbrang rtsir byed pa dang grub par byed pa dang don kun sgrub pas byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /b+h+r-ing gi

ri ti dang / dga' byed dbang phyug dang smin drug gi bu dang zla ba dang nyi ma dang tshogs kyi bdag po dang lhan cig pas byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /dge sbyong gcer bus byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /

dgra bcom pas byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /'dod chags dang bral bas byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /

rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab po/ /gang dang gang du byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /gang gis byed du bcug pa des byas pa'i

rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /dge sbyong mgo reg gis byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /pho nya dang pho nya mo dang bran pho dang bran mos byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /

drang srong gi mchog thams cad kyis byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /mi phan par 'dod pa thams cad kyis byas pa'i rig sngags

ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /oM bcom ldan 'das ma bdag 'khor dang bcas pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad dang / sdang ba dang rab tu sdang ba thams

cad dang / phyir rgol ba 'am/ mi mdza' ba 'am/ mi phan par 'dod pa thams cad las bsrung du gsol bsrung du gsol/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar po can sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa me

dang nyi ma ltar 'od gsal zhing dkar ba rgyas pa mnga' ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM dz+wa la dz+wa la/ d+ha ka d+ha ka /khA da khA da/ da ra da ra/ bi da ra bi da ra/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ sarba duSh+TAn hU~M drUM/ sarba durlaM g+hi te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba duts+tshA ye b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba durli

khi te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba dig b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba dur+b+huk+te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba du te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba a bang+hu te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba du Sh-i te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba duHbrek+Shi te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba dz+wa re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba a pa smA re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba oMstA ra ke b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba DA ki nI b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba re ba tI b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ka

Ta bA si nI b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba dzA ma kai b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba sakunI b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba mA tr-i nan+di ke b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ga re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba biShe b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba yo ge b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba A lam+ba ke b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba b+ha ye b+h+yaHphaT/ sarbo pa dra be b+h+yaHphaT/ sarbo pa sargo pA ya se b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba u trA se b+h+yaHphaT/

sarba byA d+hi b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba shra ma Ne b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba gra he b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba tIr+thi ke b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pra t+yar+thi ke b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pA ta ke b+h+yaHphaT/ sarbon+mA de b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ts+tsha ye b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba bid+ya d+ha re b+h+yaHphaT/ dza ya ka ra ma d+hu ka ra sid+d+hi ka ra sarba ar+tha sAd+ha ke b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba bid+yA tsAR+Ye b+h+yaHphaT/

sarba bid+yA rA dze b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba sAd+ha ke b+h+yo bid+yA tsAR+Ye b+h+yaHphaT/ tsa tud+b+h+yo b+ha gi nI b+h+yaHphaT/ badzra kau mA rI ye bid+yA rA dz+nyI ye phaT/ sarba bi g+h+naM bi nA ya kA nAM phaT/ ba ra dA ya phaT/ pa ra bi drA ba Na ke rA ya phaT/ sarba a su re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ga ru De b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ma ho ra ge b+h+yaHphaT/

sarba mA nu Sh+yA mA nu Sh+ye b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba mA ru te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pi sA tse b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba kum+b+hAN+De b+h+yaHphaT/ badzri shr-ing kha lA ya nA n+ta pra t+yad+gi rA b+h+yaHphaT/ sarbo pa sar+g+ge b+h+yaHphaT/ ma hA pra t+yad+hi re b+h+yaHphaT/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da phaT/ b+hin+da b+hin+da phaT/ hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ he he phaT/ ho ho phaT/ a

mo g+hA ya phaT/ a pra ti ha tA ya phaT/ ba ra pra dA ya phaT/ a su ra pi drA ba Na ka rA ya phaT/ sarba de be b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba nA ge b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ya k+She b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba rA k+Sha se b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba gan+d+harbeb+h+yaHphaT/ sarba kin+na re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pre te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba b+hU te b+h+yaHphaT/

sarba kum+b+haN+De b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pU ta ne b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ka Ta pU ta ne b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba skan+de b+h+yaHphaT/ sarbo n+mA da b+h+yaHphaT/ badzra shaM kalA ya ma hA pra t+yaM gi ra rA dzA ya phaT/ kAlA ya phaT/ ma hA kA lA ya phaT/ mA tr-i ga NA ya phaT/ ma hA mA tri ga Na nA maskr-i tA ya phaT/ baiSh+Na bI ye

phaT/ ma he shwa rI ye phaT/ brah+ma NI ye phaT/ ag+nI ye phaT/ ma hA kA lI ye phaT/ kA la da N+Di ye phaT/ in+d+rI ye phaT/ rau drI ye phaT/ tsA muN+DI ye phaT/ bA rA hI ye phaT/ ma hA bA rA hI ye phaT/ rA trI ye phaT/ kA la rA trI ye phaT/ ya ma daN+DI ye phaT/ ka pA lI

ye phaT/ ma hA ka pA lI ye phaT/ kau mA rI ye phaT/ yA mI ye phaT/ bA ya be phaT/ kau be rA ye phaT/ nai r-i tI ye phaT/ bA ru NI ye phaT/ mA ru tI ye phaT/ mA hA mA ru tI ye phaT/ sau myai phaT/ ai sA nI ye phaT/ pauk+ka sI ye phaT/ a tharba NI ye phaT/ sha ba rI ye phaT/

kr-iSh+Na sha ba rI ye phaT/ ya ma dU tI ye phaT/ ni sa di bA tsa re b+h+yaHphaT/ trisan d+h+yArtse b+h+yaHphaT/ d+ha ra NI ye phaT/ a d+hi muk+ti kasmI ra ma hA sma shA nI bA si nI ye phaT/ i ti b+h+yaH/ sarba b+ha ye b+h+yaH/ sarba da Shi b+h+yaHphaT/ o~M hU~M Sh+ToM b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha sarba duSh+TA na rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM sarba sa twAM sh+tsa swA hA/ gang su dag bdag

'khor dang bcas pa dang / sems can thams cad la sdang ba sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / drag shul drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / sdig pa sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / 'khrug pa 'khrug pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / mi

mdza' ba mi mdza' ba'i sems dang ldan pa de rnams las bdag 'khor dang bcas pa dang / sems can thams cad la bsrung ba mdzad du gsol/ lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig /ston brgya mthong bar shog shig /bdag 'khor dang bcas pa dang / sems

can thams cad la gdon dang gnod sbyin gang su dag gnod sbyin gyi gdon rnams dang / mdangs 'phrog pa rnams dang / mngal za ba rnams dang / khrag 'thung ba rnams dang / zhag za ba rnams dang / sha za ba rnams dang / tshil za ba rnams dang / rkang za ba rnams

dang / btsas pa za ba rnams dang / srog 'phrog pa rnams dang / gtor ma za ba rnams dang / phreng ba za ba rnams dang / dri za ba rnams dang / me tog za ba rnams dang / bdug pa za ba rnams dang / 'bras bu za ba rnams dang / lo tog za ba rnams dang /

bsreg bya za ba rnams dang / nor 'phrog pa rnams dang / sems 'phrog pa rnams dang / rnag za ba rnams dang / bshang ba za ba rnams dang / gcin 'thung ba rnams dang / mchil ma 'thung ba rnams dang / snabs za ba rnams dang / ngar snabs za ba rnams

dang / skyugs pa za ba rnams dang / nom bu za ba rnams dang / mi gtsang ba za ba rnams dang / stor khung nas 'bab pa 'thung ba rnams dang / sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / lha'i

gdon rnams dang / klu'i gdon rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon rnams dang / srin po'i gdon rnams dang / dri za'i gdon rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi gdon rnams dang / nam mkha' lding gi gdon rnams dang / mi 'am ci'i gdon rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gdon

rnams dang / mi'i gdon rnams dang / mi ma yin pa'i gdon rnams dang / rlung lha'i gdon rnams dang / kyi gdon rnams dang / sha za'i gdon rnams dang / 'byung po'i gdon rnams dang / grul bum gyi gdon rnams dang / srul po'i gdon rnams dang / lus

srul po'i gdon rnams dang / skem byed kyi gdon rnams dang / smyo byed kyi gdon rnams dang / grib gnon gyi gdon rnams dang / brjed byed kyi gdon rnams dang / gnon po'i gdon rnams dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon rnams dang / nam gru'i gdon rnams dang / kun

du 'breng ba'i gdon rnams dang / tsher ma 'don pa'i gdon rnams dang / bya'i gdon rnams dang / ma mo dga' bar byed pa'i gdon rnams dang / bum pa lta bu'i gdon rnams dang / 'phyang ba'i gdon rnams dang / lus mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon rnams dang / ka

Tang ka Ta'i tshogs can gyi gdon rnams dang / gdon thams cad bsal du gsol/ bdag 'khor dang bcas pa dang / sems can thams cad la rims nyin gcig pa rnams dang / nyin gnyis pa rnams dang / nyin gsum pa rnams dang / nyin bzhi pa rnams dang /

nyin bdun pa rnams dang / zla ba phyed pa rnams dang / zla ba gcig pa rnams dang / nyin mo pa rnams dang / nyi ma phyed pa rnams dang / yud tsam pa rnams dang / rtag pa'i rims rnams dang / rims mi bzad pa rnams dang / 'byung po'i rims rnams dang /

kyi rims rnams dang / sha za'i rims rnams dang / mi'i rims rnams dang / mi ma yin pa'i rims rnams dang / rgyun mi 'chad pa'i rims rnams dang / rlung las gyur pa rnams dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa rnams dang / bad kan las gyur pa

rnams dang / 'dus pa las gyur pa rnams dang / rims thams cad dang / klad pa na ba bdag dang sems can thams cad la bsal du gsol/ bdag 'khor dang bcas pa dang sems can thams cad kyi gzhogs phyed na ba dang / yi ga 'chus pa dang / mig nad dang /

sna nad dang / kha nad dang / mgul nad dang / snying nad dang / lkog ma'i lha gor na ba dang / rna ba na ba dang / so na ba dang / brang na ba dang / snying na ba dang / gnad na ba dang / rtsib logs na ba dang / rgyab na ba dang / lto na ba dang / rked pa na ba dang / mdoms na ba dang / gzhang

na ba dang / skye gnas na ba dang / rab tu skye gnas na ba dang / brla na ba dang / byin pa na ba dang / lag pa na ba dang / rkang pa na ba dang / yan lag na ba dang / nying lag na ba bsal du gsol/ bdag 'khor dang bcas pa dang / sems can thams

cad la 'byung po dang / dang / ro langs dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / rims dang / shu ba dang / mig ser dang / g.ya' ba dang / 'brum bu phra mo dang / mdze dang / phol mig dang / bas bldags dang / mchin nad dang / mtshan bar rdol ba

dang / g.yan ba dang / gzhang 'brum dang / me dpal dang / lhog pa dang / skems pa dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / skrag pa dang / lud pa dang / brgyal ba dang / dbyig dug dang / dug sbyar ma dang / dug dang / byad dang / me dang / chu dang / mi ngas dang / bdud

dang / 'thab mo dang / 'khon dang / gnod pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / sbrang bu trai ma bu ka dang / trai lA ta ka dang / sdig pa dang / sbrul dang / sre mo dang / seng ge dang / stag dang / dom dang / dred dang / g.yag rgod dang / chu srin dang / spyang ki dang /

chom po dang / de dag la sogs pa srog 'phrog par byed pa gzhan thams cad kyang bsal du gsol/ gdugs dkar po can rdo rje gtsug tor phyir zlog pa chen mo'i rig sngags kyi mthus dpag tshad bcu gnyis kyi nang tshun chad dam/ dpag tshad lnga brgya'i nang tshun chad du rig sngags

bcing bar bgyi'o/ /gzi brjid bcing bar bgyi'o/ /rig sngags thams cad bcing bar bgyi'o/ /gzhan gyi rig sngags thams cad bcing bar bgyi'o/ /mtshams gcad par bgyi'o/ /sa bcing bar bgyi'o/ /phyogs bcu bcing bar bgyi'o/ /nam mkha' bcing bar

bgyi'o/ /gzhan gyi sde rab tu rengs par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ oM a na le a na le/ a tsa le a tsa le/ kha kha me kha kha me/ bi Sha de bi Sha de/ bI re bI re/ bai ra bai ra/ sau sau // shAn+te shAn+te/ dAn+te dAn+te/ badzra d+ha ra ban+d+ha ban+d+ha ni badzra pA Ni phaT/ o~M hU~M drUM hrIHSh+ToM phaT phaT swA hA/

oM badzra pA NI ban+d+ha ban+d+ha badzra pA se na sarba duSh+Ta bi g+h+nAM bi nA ya kA na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ hU~M drUM ban+d+ha phaT/ rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM sarba sa twAMsh+tsa swA hA/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar po can zhes bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir zlog pa'i

rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo 'di gro ga'am/ ras sam/ shing shun la bris te/ lus sam/ mgul du thogs pa byas nas bcang bar bya/ bklag par bya ste/ de dag la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dug gis mi tshugs/ mtshon gyis mi tshugs/ rims kyis mi tshugs/

nad kyis mi tshugs/ chad pas mi tshugs/ mes mi tshugs/ chus mi tshugs/ bsgyur ba'i las thams cad kyis mi tshugs/ dbyig dug gis mi tshugs/ dug sbyar mas mi tshugs/ byad kyis mi tshugs/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /

gdon thams cad dang / bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad kyi yid du 'ong zhing dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa bye ba stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhir skye ba dang skye bar che rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje'i rigs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i rig sngags kyi lhas

kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mnyam par bzhag nas de la rtag par bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang / sbed par byed do/ /rdo rje pho nya mo mngag gzhug brgyad cu rtsa bzhis kyang rtag par yongs su skyong bar byed de de rnams kyi yid du 'ong ba dang dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /nam du yang gnod sbyin

nyid dang / srin po nyid dang / 'byung po nyid dang / nyid dang / sha za nyid dang / srul po nyid dang / lus srul po nyid dang / mi dbul po nyid du mi 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med dpag tu med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bsod

nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar po can zhes bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir zlog ba'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo 'di 'chang na/ tshangs par mi spyod pa yang tshangs par spyod par 'gyur

ro/ /thub par ma byas pa yang thub par byas par 'gyur ro/ /mi gtsang ba yang gtsang bar byas par 'gyur ro/ /bsnyen gnas ma byas pa yang bsnyen gnas byas par 'gyur ro/ /gang dag mtshams med pa lnga byas pa de yang sdig pa ma lus pa

'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa yang ma lus par zad par 'gyur ro/ /bud med gang la las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can zhes bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir zlog pa chen mo'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo

'di 'chang na bu 'dod pa des kyang bu rnyed de/ tshe dang bsod nams dang stobs kyang rab tu ldan no/ /'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye ste/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa thams cad dang bral bar

'gyur ro/ /gang la la zhig gis mi nad dang / ba lang gi nad dang / gnag nad dang / yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'go ba'i nad dang / 'khrug pa thams cad dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs 'ong ba la bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs

rgyas mi pham pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar po can zhes bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir zlog pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo 'di rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te rim gro cher mchod pa chen po byas nas/ grong khyer thams cad

kyi sgo 'am/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ ljongs sam/ grong rdal lam/ dur khrod dam/ ri 'am/ dgon pa'i gnas su gzugs so/ /gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir zlog ma chen mo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo 'di rim gro cher byas

te/ btsugs pa tsam gyis g.yul zhi bar byas par 'gyur ro/ /yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'go ba'i nad dang / 'khrug pa thams cad dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas dang / klu'i rgyal po dung skyong

dang / klu'i rgyal po nag po chen po dang / klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo dang / gzhan yang klu'i rgyal po thams cad kyis kyang dus dus su char 'bebs so/ /dus dus su glog 'byin to/ /dus dus su 'brug sgrogs so/ /nad dang gnod pa thams cad nye

bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /o~M hU~M Sh+ToM ban+b+ha ban+b+ha sarba duSh+TA na rak+Sha ma ma sa pa ri bA ra s+ya sarba satwAMsh+tsa swA hA/ o~M hU~M Sh+ToM ban+d+ha ban+d+ha sarba duSh+TAn rak+Sha rak+Sha ma ma sa pa ri bA ra s+ya sarba sa twAMsh+tsa badzra pA Ni hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M sarba ta thA ga toSh+Ni Sha a ba lo ki te mUr+d+ha ni te dzo rA shi/ o~M dz+wa la dz+wa la/ khA da

khA da/ d+ha ka d+ha ka /da ra da ra/ bi da ra bi da ra/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ hU~M hU~M phaT phaT ra k+Sha ra k+Sha ma ma sa pa ri bA ra s+ya sarba satwAMsh+tsa swA hA/ o~M sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha si tA ta pa tre hU~M phaT swA hA/ hU~M hU~M rak+Sha rak+Sha ma ma sa pa ri bA ra s+ya sarba sa twAMsh+tsa hU~M phaT swA hA/ tad+ya thA/ oM

a na le a na le/ a tsa le a tsa le/ kha sa me kha sa me/ bI re bI re/ bai ra bai ra/ sau sau // sarba bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+Thi te sarba ta thA ga to Sh+NI Sha si tA ta pa tre sarba duSh+Ta tsit+tAn hU~M phaT swA hA/ sangs rgyas kyi rnal 'byor gyis shig pa thams cad la lan gsum bzlas par bya'o/ /

bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das

kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar po can zhes bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir zlog pa rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rdzogs so// //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha si tA ta pa trA a pa rA dzi ta ma hA pra t+yaM gi ra par ma sid+d+ha nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub pa phyir zlog pa chen mo mchog

tu grub pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das gzhan gyis mi thub pa gtsug tor rgyal mo la phyag 'tshal

lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i gnas chos lha'i 'dun sa na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / thabs

cig tu bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs nas gtsug tor rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug tor gyi dbus nas gsang sngags

kyi tshig 'di dag byung ngo / /sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun rnams

la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten na dgra bcom pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams la phyag

'tshal lo/ /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten na yang dag par song ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha'i drang srong dmod pa 'dor ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rig sngags 'chang grub

pa'i drang srong phan 'dogs nus pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rig sngags 'chang grub pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /legs ldan drag po dka' thub zlog pa'i bdag po dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

legs ldan sred med kyi bu phyag rgya chen po lngas phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /legs ldan nag po chen po grong khyer sum brtsegs 'jig par byed pa dur khrod na gnas par mos pa ma mo'i tshogs kyis phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
