gshegs pa'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das pad+mo'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das nor bu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das glang po'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom

ldan 'das gzhon nu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das klu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' brtan pa'i sde mtshon cha'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan

'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi bskyod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das

de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po me tog kun du rgyas pa la

phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i tog gi

rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun du bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par

snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan rgyas pa ut+pala'i dri'i tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de rnams la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das

de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub pa phyir zlog pa chen mo 'dis 'byung po'i gdon thams cad tshar gcod par byed pa/ gzhan gyi rig sngags thams cad gcod par byed pa/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad zlog pa/

sems can gsod pa dang / bcings pa thams cad las grol bar byed pa/ sdang ba dang / rmi lam ngan pa ltas ngan pa thams cad zlog pa/ gnod sbyin dang srin po'i gdon thams cad 'jig par byed pa/ gdon stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi 'jig par byed pa/ rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad dga' bar byed pa/

gza' chen po brgyad 'jig par byed pa/ dgra thams cad zlog par byed pa/ ma rungs pa dang / sdang ba dang / rmi lam ngan pa thams cad 'jig par byed pa/ dug dang / mtshon thams cad dang / me dang chu las zlog par byed pa/ ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa thams

cad las sgrol ba ste/ gzhan gyis mi thub drag shul che/ /gtum pa chen mo stobs chen mo/ /'bar ba chen mo gzi brjid che/ /dkar chen 'bar phreng gos dkar mo/ /'phags ma sgrol ma khro gnyer can/ /rgyal ba'i rdo rje phreng zhes grags/ /pad+ma'i

mngon mtshan rdo rjes mtshan/ /gzhan gyis mi thub phreng ba can/ /rdo rje'i mchu can rnam sgeg mo/ /zhi ba'i lha rnams kyis mchod ma/ /zhi ba gser gyi phreng ba can/ /dkar chen 'bar ba gos dkar mo/ /'phags ma sgrol ma stobs chen mo/ /rdo rje lu gu rgyud

gzhan dang / /rdo rje gzhon nu rigs 'dzin ma/ /lag na rdo rje'i rigs gser phreng / /le brgan rtsi dang rin chen ma/ /snang mdzad rdo rje gtsug tor grags/ /phyag rgya dang sngags kyi tshogs de dag thams cad kyis bdag 'khor dang bcas pa dang / sems

can thams cad bsrung du gsol/ o~M sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha si tA ta pa tre hU~M drUM hrIHSh+ToM/ dzam+b+ha na ka rIhU~M drUM hIHSh+ToM/ stam+b+ha na ka rI hU~M drUM hrIHSh+ToM/ mo ha na ka rI hU~M drUM hrIHSh+ToM/ sam+b+hak+Sha Na ka rI hU~M drUM hrIHSh+ToM/ ban+d+ha na ka rI hU~M drUM hrIHSh+ToM/ pa ra biSha b+hak+Sha Na ka rI hU~M drUM hrIHSh+ToM/ sarba

duSh+TA pra duSh+TA NAM stam+b+ha na ka rI hU~M drUM hrIHSh+ToM/ sarba yak+Sha rAk+Sha sa gra hA NAM bid+h+waM sa na ka rI hU~M drUM hrIHSh+ToM/ sarba pa ra bibyA ts+tshe da na ka rI hU~M drUM hrA~MHSh+ToM/ tsa tu rA shi tI nAM gra ha sa ha srA nAM bi d+h+waM sa na ka rI hU~M drUM hrIHSh+ToM/ aSh+Ta biM sha tI nAM nak+Sha trA NAM pra sA d+ha na ka rI hU~M drUM hrIHSh+ToM/ aSh+TA nAM ma hA gra

hA NAM bid+h+waM sa na ka rI hU~M drUMhrIHSh+ToM/ rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM sarba satwAMsh+tsa/ bcom ldan 'das ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar po can rdo rje gtsug tor phyir zlog pa chen mo/ phyag stong mnga' ba chen mo/ dbu stong mnga' ba chen mo/ spyan bye

ba brgya stong mnga' ba/ mi phyed 'bar ba'i mtshan rtags can/ rdo rje yangs pa chen mos sa gsum gyi dkyil 'khor du bdag dang sems can thams cad bde legs su gyur cig /rnam par bsgyings ma'i rdo rje dang / /gser 'od lta bu'i spyan mnga' ma/ /rdo rje

sgros dang dkar mo dang / /pad+ma'i spyan dang zla 'od dang / /sangs rgyas dpal dang de bzhin spyan/ /rdo rje nyi ma'i 'od dang ni/ /de bzhin zla ba rdo rje 'dzin/ /rig pa dang phyag rgya dang gsang sngags kyi tshogs de dag thams cad kyis bdag dang sems can thams cad kun

nas bsrung bar mdzad du gsol/ oM r-i Shi ga Na pra shasta sarba ta thA ga toSh+Ni Sha si tA ta pa tre hU~M drUM/ dzam+b+ha na ka rI hU~M drUM/ stam+b+ha na ka rI hU~M drUM/ ma hA bid+yA sam+b+hak+Sha na ka rI hU~M drUM/ pa ra bi d+yA sam+b+hak+Sha na ra ka rI hU~M drUM/ sarba duSh+Ta NAM stam+b+ha na ka rI hU~M drUM/ sarba yak+Sha rAk+Sha sa

gra hA NAM bi d+h+waM sa na ka rI hU~M drUM/ tsa tu rA shi tI nAM gra ha sa ha srA NAM bid+h+waM sa na ka rI hU~M drUM/ aSh+TA biM sha tI nAM na k+Sha trA NAM pra sA d+ha na ka rI hU~M drU~M/ aSh+TA NAM ma hA gra ha NAM bi d+h+waM sa na ka rI hU~M drUM/ hU~M hU~M phaT phaT rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug

tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can rdo rje'i gtsug tor phyir zlog pa chen mo/ phyag stong mnga' ba chen mo/ dbu stong mnga' ba chen mo/ spyan bye ba brgya stong mnga' ba chen mo/ mi phyed 'bar ba'i mtshan rtags can/ rdo rje yangs pa chen mos sa gsum

gyi dkyil 'khor la mnga' mdzad ma kun bdag la bsrung du gsol/ bdag dang sems can thams cad rgyal po'i 'jigs pa dang / rkun po'i 'jigs pa dang / me'i 'jigs pa dang / chu'i 'jigs pa dang / dug gi 'jigs pa dang / mtshon gyi 'jigs pa

pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi 'jigs pa dang / mu ge'i 'jigs pa dang / dgra'i 'jigs pa dang / lce 'bab pa'i 'jigs pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa dang / sa g.yo ba'i 'jigs pa dang / skar mda' ltung ba'i

'jigs pa dang / rgyal po'i chad pa'i 'jigs pa dang / las kyi 'jigs pa dang / klu'i 'jigs pa dang / glog gi 'jigs pa dang / nam mkha' lding gi 'jigs pa dang / gcan gzan khro bo'i 'jigs pa dang / lha'i gdon dang / klu'i gdon dang /

lha ma yin gyi gdon dang / rlung lha'i gdon dang / nam mkha' lding gi gdon dang / dri za'i gdon dang / mi 'am ci'i gdon dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gdon dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon dang / srin po'i gdon dang / kyi gdon dang / sha za'i gdon dang /

'byung po'i gdon dang / grul bum gyi gdon dang / srul po'i gdon dang / lus srul po'i gdon dang / skem byed kyi gdon dang / brjed byed kyi gdon dang / smyo byed kyi gdon dang / grib gnon gyi gdon dang / gnon po'i gdon dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon

dang / nam gru'i gdon dang / gshin rje'i gdon dang / bya'i gdon dang / ma mo dga' bar byed pa'i gdon dang / kun du phreng ba'i gdon dang / tsher ma 'don pa'i gdon las bdag bde legs su gyur cig /zas su mdangs za ba dang / zas su mngal za ba dang /

zas su khrag 'thung ba dang / zas su zhag za ba dang / zas su sha za ba dang / zas su tshil za ba dang / zas su rkang za ba dang / zas su btsas pa za ba dang / srog 'phrog pa dang / zas su skyugs pa za ba dang / zas su phyi sa za ba dang / zas su gcin 'thung ba

dang / zas su stor khung nas 'bab pa 'thung ba dang / zas su lhag ma za ba dang / zas su mchil ma 'thung ba dang / zas su snabs za ba dang / zas su ngar snabs za ba dang / zas su mi gtsang ba za ba dang / zas su gtor ma za ba dang / zas su phreng ba za ba

dang / zas su dri za ba dang / zas su bdug pa za ba dang / sems 'phrog pa dang / zas su me tog za ba dang / zas su 'bras bu za ba dang / zas su lo tog za ba dang / zas su sbyin sreg za ba'i gdon las bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig /gdon de dag

thams cad kyi rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /kun du rgyus byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /mkha' 'gro dang mkha' 'gro mas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /tshangs pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad

do/ phur bus gdab bo/ /dbang phyug chen pos byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /sred med kyi bus byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /nam mkha' lding yang dag pa dang lhan cig pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus

gdab bo/ /nag po chen pos byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /ma mo'i tshogs rnams kyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /mi'i thod pa can gyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /rgyal bar byed pa dang / sbrang

rtsir byed pa dang / don kun grub pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /sring mo bzhis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /b+h+r-ing gi ri ti dang / dga' byed dbang phyug dang / tshogs kyi bdag po dang lhan cig pas byas pa'i rig

sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /dge sbyong gcer bus byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /dge sbyong mgo reg gis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /dgra bcom pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab

bo/ /'dod chags dang bral bas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /'jig rten dbang phyug 'khor dang bcas pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /lag na rdo rje 'khor dang bcas pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /

pho nya dang / pho nya mo dang / bran pho dang / bran mos byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /drang srong gi tshogs thams cad kyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur

bus gdab bo/ /mi 'phrod pa za ba'i tshogs kyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa la

phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag la bsrung du gsol bsrung du gsol/ oM a si tA na lA rka pra b+hA s+phu Ta bi kA si tA ta pa tre/ oM dz+wa la dz+wa la/ khA da khA da/ ha na ha na/ da ra da ra/ bi da ra bi da ra/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ snying po'o/ /he he

phaT/ ho ho phaT/ a mo g+hA ya phaT/ a pra ti ha tA ya phaT/ ba ra dA ya phaT/ ba ra pra dA ya phaT/ pra t+yaM gi ri tA ya phaT/ a su ra bi drA ba Na ka rA ya phaT/ ba ra bi drA ba Na ka rA ya phaT/ sarba de be b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba nA gi b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba yak+She b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba rAk+Sha se

b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba b+hU te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pre te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba bi shA tse b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba kum+b+ha' N+De b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pU ta ne b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ka Ta pU ta ne b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba skan+d+he b+h+yaHphaT/ sarbon+ma de b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ts+tsha ye b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba a pa smA re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarbo stA ra ke b+h+yaHphaT/

sarba DA ki nI b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba re pa tI b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba yA ma ye b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba sha ku ni b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba mA tr-i ga Ne b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba kam+bu kA mi nI b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba A la ma ba ke b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ka Ta Ta ne b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba kaN+Deb+h+yaHphaT/ sarba gan+d+harbe b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba a su

re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba kin+na re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ga ru De b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ma ho ra ge b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba durlaMg+hi te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba duHpre k+Shi tre b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba dz+wa re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba b+ha ye b+h+yaHphaT/ sarbo pa dra be b+h+yaHphaT/ sarbo pa sarge b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba kr-i t+ya karma Ne kA kho je b+h+yaHphaT/

ki ra Ne bai tA Di b+h+yaHphaT/ tsits+tshapreShaka sarba duSh+tsa ra di te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba dur+b+hak+te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba tIr+thi ke b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba shra ma Ne b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba tI r+thi ke b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba bA ta ke b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba bid+yA d+ha re b+h+yaHphaT/ dza ya ka ra/ ma d+hu ka ra/ sid+d+hi ka ra/ sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ke b+h+yo bid+yA

tsAr+yeb+h+yaHphaT/ tsatu ra b+h+yob+ha gi nI b+h+yaHphaT/ badzra kau mA rI ye badzra ku laM d+ha ri bid+yA tsar+yeb+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ma hA pra t+yaM gi re b+h+yaHphaT/ badzra shaM ka lA ya pra t+yaM gi ra rA dzA ya phaT/ ma hA kA lA ya mA tr-i ga Na na maskr-i tI ye phaT/ brah+mA NI ye phaT/ biSh+Nu bI ye phaT/ ma he shwa rI ye phaT/ rau

drI ye phaT/ ma hAkA lI ye phaT/ tsA mu N+Di ye phaT/ kau mA rI ya phaT/ bA rA hI ye phaT/ in drI ye phaT/ ag+ni ye phaT/ ya mA yai phaT/ nai ri tI ye phaT/ ba ru NA yai phaT/ mA ru tI ye phaT/ so mA yai phaT/ I shA nI ye phaT/ kA lA daN+DI ye phaT/ kA lA rA trI

yai phaT/ ya ma daN+Ni ye phaT/ ya ma rA trI ye phaT/ ka pA lI ye phaT/ a d+hi muk+ti sh+ma shA na bA si nI yai phaT/ oM Sh+ToM ban+d+ha ban+d+ha rak+Sha rak+Sha mI swA hA/ sems can gang su dag bdag la gdug pa dang gdug pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / drag shul dang drag shul gyi

sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / sdig pa dang sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / 'khrug pa dang 'khrug pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / sdang ba dang sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams byams pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur nas bdag dang sems can thams

cad bsrung du gsol/ lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig ston brgya mthong bar gyur cig /gnod sbyin dang gdon gang su dag zas su mdangs za ba rnams dang / gzi byin 'phrog pa rnams dang / zas su mngal za ba rnams dang / zas su khrag 'thung ba

rnams dang / zas su zhag za ba rnams dang / zas su sha za ba rnams dang / zas su tshil za ba rnams dang / zas su rkang za ba rnams dang / zas su btsas pa za ba rnams dang / srog 'phrog pa rnams dang / zas su lhag ma za ba rnams dang / zas

su gtor ma za ba rnams dang / zas su phreng ba za ba rnams dang / zas su dri za ba rnams dang / zas su bdug pa za ba rnams dang / zas su me tog za ba rnams dang / zas su 'bras bu za ba rnams dang / zas su lo tog za ba rnams dang / zas su sbyin sreg za ba

rnams dang / zas su rnag za ba rnams dang / zas su phyi sa za ba rnams dang / zas su gcin 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su mchil ma 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su skyugs pa za ba rnams dang / zas su snabs za ba rnams dang / zas su ngar snabs za ba rnams

dang / zas su mi gtsang ba za ba rnams dang / zas su stor khung nas 'bab pa 'thung ba rnams dang / sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / gdug pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / 'khrug pa'i sems

dang ldan pa rnams dang / sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / lha'i gdon rnams dang / klu'i gdon rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi gdon rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon rnams dang / srin po'i gdon rnams dang / 'byung po'i gdon rnams dang /

kyi gdon rnams dang / sha za'i gdon rnams dang / kum b+haN+Da'i gdon rnams dang / srul po'i gdon rnams dang / lus srul po'i gdon rnams dang / skem byed kyi gdon rnams dang / smyo byed kyi gdon rnams dang / grib gnon gyi gdon rnams dang /

brjed byed kyi gdon rnams dang / gnon po'i gdon rnams dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon rnams dang / nam gru'i gdon rnams dang / gshin rje'i gdon rnams dang / bya'i gdon rnams dang / ma mo dga' bar byed pa'i gdon rnams dang / kun du 'breng ba'i gdon

rnams dang / re lde 'don pa'i gdon rnams dang / tsher ma 'don pa'i gdon rnams las bdag bsrung bar mdzad du gsol/ lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig /ston brgya mthong bar gyur cig /rims nyin gcig pa rnams dang / nyin gnyis pa rnams dang /

nyin gsum pa rnams dang / nyin bzhi pa rnams dang / nyin bdun pa rnams dang / rtag pa'i rims rnams dang / rims mi bzad pa rnams dang / 'byung po'i rims rnams dang / rlung las gyur pa rnams dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa rnams dang / bad kan

las gyur pa rnams dang / 'dus pa las gyur pa rnams dang / rims nad thams cad dang / klad pa na ba bsal du gsol/ gzhogs phyed na ba dang / yi ga 'chus pa dang / mig nad dang / sna nad dang / kha nad dang / mgul nad dang / snying nad dang / lkog ma'i

lha gor na ba dang / rna ba na ba dang / so na ba dang / snying na ba dang / gnad na ba dang / rtsib logs na ba dang / rgyab na ba dang / lto ba na ba dang / rked pa na ba dang / chu so na ba dang / brlan ba dang / rje ngar na ba dang / lag pa na ba dang / rkang pa na ba dang / yan

lag na ba dang / nying lag na ba bsal du gsol/ gdugs dkar po can rdo rje gtsug tor phyir zlog pa chen mo 'dis dpag tshad bcu gnyis kyi nang tshun chad du 'byung po dang / ro langs dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / rims nad dang / shu ba

dang / g.yan pa dang / 'brum bu phra mo dang / mtshan bar rdol ba dang / mdze dang / phol mig dang / bas bldags dang / me dpal dang / g.yan pa dang / lhog pa dang / skems pa dang / skrag pa dang / lud pa lu ba dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / mi dran pa

dang / dbyig dug dang / dug sbyar ma dang / byad dang / me dang / chu dang / mi ngas dang / bdud dang / 'ching ba dang / dgra dang / dgon pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / sbrang bu t+r+ye bu ka dang / trai la tA ka dang / sdig pa dang / sbrul dang / sre mo dang /

seng ge dang / stag dang / dom dang / dred dang / g.yag rgod dang / chu srin la sogs pa'i srog chags rnams bsal du gsol/ de dag thams cad kyi rig sngags bcing bar bya'o/ /gzi brjid bcing bar bya'o/ /gzhan thams cad kyi rig sngags bcing bar

bgyi'o/ /mtshams bcing bar bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ oM a na le a na le/ kha sa me kha sa me/ bI ra bI ra/ sau sau // shAn+te shAn+te/ dAn+te dAn+te/ bi Sha de bi Sha de/ bai re bai re/ de bi badzra d+hA ri ban+d+ha ban+d+ha ni badzra pA Ni phaT/ o~M hU~M drUM hrIHSh+ToM phaT swA hA/ o~M badzra pA Ni ban+d+ha ban+d+ha badzra pA she na

ma ma sarba duSh+Ta big+hAM bi nA ya kAM hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ nye ba'i snying po'o/ /sus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub pa phyir zlog pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di gro ga 'am/ ras sam shing shun la bris te/

lus sam mgul du thogs sam klog par byed na de la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dug gis mi tshugs/ mtshon gyis mi tshugs/ me yis mi tshugs/ chus mi tshugs/ dbyig dug gis mi tshugs/ dug sbyar mas mi tshugs/ byad kyis mi tshugs/ dus ma yin par 'chi

ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /gdon thams cad dang / bgegs thams cad dang / log 'dren thams cad kyang dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje'i rigs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi rnams dang grub pa'i lha mo rnams kyis kyang de la rtag tu mthun par

srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed par byed do/ /de rnams kyi yid du 'ong ba dang dga' bar yang 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa chen po stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhir skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje'i pho nya mo drug cu rtsa bzhi yang rtag par phyi bzhin yongs su skyong bar 'gyur ro/ /nam

du yang gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dang / sha za dang / srul po dang / lus srul po nyid du mi 'gyur ro/ /mi dbul por mi 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med dpag tu med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bsod nams kyi phung po

dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sbed par mdzad cing / de dag gi thugs su byon pa dang dgyes par yang 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i phyir zlog pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di 'chang na tshangs par mi spyod pa yang tshangs par spyod par 'gyur ro/ /thub par ma byas pa yang thub par byas par 'gyur ro/ /mi gtsang

ba yang gtsang bar 'gyur ro/ /smyung ba ma byas pa yang smyung ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /mtshams med pa lnga byas pa yang 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa yang ma lus par zad par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo bu 'dod pa gang la las de bzhin

gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar mo can phyir zlog pa chen mo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di 'chang ngam klog na bu 'dod pa des bu rnyed de/ tshe dang bsod nams dang / stobs kyang rab tu rnyed do/ /'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba

can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /mi nad dang / phyugs nad dang / yams kyi nad dang / 'tshe ba dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs 'ong ba thams cad la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar

mo can zhes bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir zlog pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te/ rim gro cher byas te mchod pa chen po byas la grong khyer thams cad kyi sgo'am/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ dgon pa'i

gnas su gzugs so/ /'phags pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa phyir zlog ma chen mo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di rim gro cher byas te btsugs na btsugs ma thag tu g.yul zhi bar byas par 'gyur ro/ /yams kyi nad dang / 'tshe ba dang / gnod pa dang /

nad 'go ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /tad+ya thA/ oM Sh+ToM ban+d+ha ban+d+ha ma ma rak+Sha rak+Sha swA hA/ oM Sh+ToM ban+d+ha ban+d+ha badzra ma ma ra k+Sha rak+Sha badzra pA Ni hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM sarba ta thA ga toSh+Ti Sha a na le a ba lo ki te tsur+Na te dz+wa

rA shi /oM dz+wa la dz+wa la/ d+ha ka d+ha ka /d+ha ra d+ha ra/ bi da ra bi da ra/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ o~M sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha hU~M phaT swA hA/ tad+ya thA/ o~M a na le a na le/ kha sa me kha sa me/ bai re bai re/ sau me sau me/ sarba bud+hU a d+hiSh+ShA na a

d+hiSh+Thi te/ sarba ta thA ga toSh+Ni Sha si tA ta pa tre hU~M phaT/ hU~M ma ma hU~M ni hU~M swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas dang / klu'i rgyal po dung skyong dang / klu'i rgyal po nag po chen po rnams kyis dus dus su char 'bebs so/ /dus dus su sprin sdud do/ /dus dus su 'brug

gi sgra sgrogs par 'gyur ro/ /nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi rnal 'byor du byas la lan gsum bzlas par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig

rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub pa chen mo phyir zlog pa mchog tu grub pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs

so// //paN+Di ta pa ra hi ta b+ha dra dang / lo ts+tsha ba gzu dga' rdor gyis kha che'i bdud rtsi 'byung gnas kyi gtsug lag khang gi dpe rnying la gtugs nas gtan la phab pa// @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha

si tA ta pa tre a pa rA dzi ta nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'

thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig

rten na dgra bcom pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten na yang dag par song ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha'i drang srong dmod pa 'dor ba dang phan 'dogs nus pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rig sngags 'chang grub pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /legs

ldan drag po dka' thub zlog pa'i bdag po dang lhan cig pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /legs ldan sred med kyi bu phyag rgya chen po lngas phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /legs ldan nag po chen po grong khyer sum brtsegs 'jig par byed pa dur khrod na gnas par mos pa/

ma mo'i tshogs kyis phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /pad+mo'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nor bu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /glang po'i

gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzhon nu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /klu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' brtan pa'i sde mtshon cha'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom

ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po me tog

kun tu rgyas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che

tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas

rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan rgyas pa ut+pa la'i bsung gi tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de rnams la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das ma

de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i phyir zlog pa chen po 'dis 'byung po'i gdon thams cad tshar gcod pa/ gzhan gyi rig sngags thams cad gcod pa/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba las zlog

pa/ sems can bcings pa thams cad 'grol ba/ sdang ba dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa thams cad zlog pa/ gdon brgyad khri bzhi stong 'jig par byed pa/ rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad dga' bar byed pa/ gza' chen po brgyad 'jig par byed pa/

dgra thams cad zlog pa/ ma rungs pa dang / sdang ba dang / rmi lam ngan pa thams cad 'jig par byed pa/ dug dang mtshon dang me dang chu las sgrol ba ste/ gzhan gyis mi thub drag shul che/ /gtum po chen mo stobs chen mo/ /'bar ba chen mo gzi brjid che/ /

dkar mo chen mo stobs chen mo/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba gos dkar mo/ /'phags ma sgrol ma khro gnyer can/ /rgyal ba'i rdo rje phreng zhes grags/ /pad+ma'i mngon mtshan rdo rjes mtshan/ /gzhan gyis mi thub phreng ba can/ /rdo rje mkhar bsnams 'joms pa mo/ /zhi ba'i

lha rnams kyis mchod pa/ /gzugs zhi gzi brjid chen mo can/ /'phags ma sgrol ma stobs chen mo/ /rdo rje lu gu rgyud gzhan dang / /rdo rje gzhon nu rigs 'dzin ma/ /lag na rdo rje rigs gser phreng / /le brgan rtsi dang rin chen ma/ /snang mdzad rdo rje gtsug tor

grags/ /rnam par bsgyings ma'i rdo rje dang / /gser 'od lta bu'i spyan mnga' ba/ /rdo rje sgros dang dkar mo dang / /pad+ma'i spyan dang zla 'od dang / /phyag rgya'i tshogs de dag thams cad kyis bdag la bsrung du gsol/ bsrung ba mdzad du gsol/ oM r-i Shi ga Na pra sha sta

ya sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha si tA ta pa tre hU~M drU~M/ dzam+b+ha na ka rI hU~M drU~M/ stam+b+ha na ka rI hU~M drU~M/ ma hA bid+yA sam b+hak+Sha Na ka rI hU~M drU~M/ pa ra bid+yA sam+b+ha k+Sha Na ka rI hU~M drU~M/ sarba duSh+TA nA~M stam+b+ha na ka rI hU~M drU~M/ sarba yak+Sha rAk+Sha sa gra hA NA~M bi d+h+wa~M sa na ka rI hU~M drU~M/ tsa tu rA shi tI nA~M gra ha sa ha srA NA~M bi d+h+wa~M sa

na ka rI hU~M drU~M/ aSh+Ta biM sha tI nA~M nak+Sha trA nAM pra sA da na ka rI hU~M drU~M/ aSh+Ta nA~M ma hA gra hA NA~M bi d+h+wa~M sa na ka rI hU~M drU~M/ rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM/ bcom ldan 'das ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can rdo rje gtsug tor phyir zlog pa chen mo/ phyag stong mnga' ba chen

mo/ dbu stong mnga' ba chen mo/ spyan bye ba brgya phrag stong mnga' ba chen mo/ mi phyed 'bar ba'i mtshan rtags can/ rdo rje yangs pa chen mos sa gsum gyi dkyil 'khor la mnga' mdzad pas kun nas bdag la bsrung du gsol/ bsrung du gsol/ oM rgyal

po'i 'jigs pa dang / chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa dang / me'i 'jigs pa dang / chu'i 'jigs pa dang / dug gi 'jigs pa dang / mtshon gyi 'jigs pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi 'jigs pa dang / mu ge'i 'jigs pa dang / dgra'i 'jigs

pa dang / lce 'bab pa'i 'jigs pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa dang / sa g.yo ba'i 'jigs pa dang / skar mda' ltung ba'i 'jigs pa dang / rgyal po'i chad pa'i 'jigs pa dang / lha'i 'jigs pa dang / klu'i 'jigs pa dang / glog gi 'jigs pa

dang / nam mkha' lding gi 'jigs pa dang / gcan gzan khro bo'i 'jigs pa dang / lha'i gdon dang / klu'i gdon dang / lha ma yin gyi gdon dang / rlung lha'i gdon dang / nam mkha' lding gi gdon dang / dri za'i gdon dang / mi 'am ci'i gdon dang / lto 'phye chen

po'i gdon dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon dang / srin po'i gdon dang / kyi gdon dang / sha za'i gdon dang / 'byung po'i gdon dang / grul bum gyi gdon dang / srul po'i gdon dang / lus srul po'i gdon dang / skem byed kyi gdon dang / brjed byed kyi

gdon dang / smyo byed kyi gdon dang / grib gnon gyi gdon dang / gnon po'i gdon dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon dang / nam gru'i gdon dang / gdon de dag thams cad las bdag bde legs su gyur cig /mdangs 'phrog pa dang / zas su mngal za ba dang /

zas su khrag 'thung ba dang / zas su zhag za ba dang / zas su sha za ba dang / zas su tshil za ba dang / zas su rkang za ba dang / zas su btsas pa za ba dang / srog 'phrog pa dang / zas su skyugs pa za ba dang / zas su mi gtsang ba za ba dang / zas su gcin 'thung ba

dang / zas su stor khung nas 'bab pa 'thung ba dang / zas su lhag ma za ba dang / zas su mchil ma 'thung ba dang / zas su snabs za ba dang / zas su ngar snabs za ba dang / zas su rnag za ba dang / zas su gtor ma za ba dang / zas su phreng ba za ba dang / zas su

dri za ba dang / zas su bdug pa za ba dang / sems 'phrog pa dang / zas su me tog za ba dang / zas su 'bras bu za ba dang / zas su lo tog za ba dang / zas su sbyin sreg za ba de dag thams cad las bdag bde legs su gyur cig /de dag thams cad

dang gdon thams cad kyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /kun du rgyus byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ mkha' 'gro dang mkha' 'gro mas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /phyugs

bdag chen pos byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /sred med kyi bus byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /nam mkha' lding yang dag pa dang lhan cig pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /nag

po chen po dang ma mo'i tshogs kyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /mi'i thod pa can gyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /rgyal bar byed pa dang / sbrang rtsir byed pa dang / don kun sgrub pas byas pa'i rig sngags

gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /sring mo bzhis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /b+h+r-ing gi ri ti dang / dga' byed dbang phyug dang / tshogs kyi bdag po dang lhan cig pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /dge

sbyong gcer bus byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /dgra bcom pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /'dod chags dang bral bas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /gsang ba'i bdag po lag

na rdo rjes byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag la bsrung du gsol/ bsrung du gsol/ oM a si tA na lA rka pra b+hA

s+phu Ta bi kA si tA ta pa tre/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ khA da khA da/ da ra da ra/ bi da ra bi da ra/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ b+hin d+ha b+hin d+ha/ hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ he he phaT/ ho ho phaT/ a mo g+he phaT/ a pra ti ha tA phaT/ ba ra pra dA phaT/ pra t+yaM gi ri phaT/ a su ra bi drA

ba ka phaT/ sarba de be b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba nA ge b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba a su re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ma ru te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ga ru De b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba gan+d+harbe b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba kin+na re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ma ho ra ge b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba yak+She b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba rAk+Sha se b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba

pre te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pi shA tse b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba b+hU teb+h+yaHphaT/ sarba kuM b+hAN+De b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pU ta ne b+h+yuHphaT/ sarba ka Ta pU ta ne b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba skanan+d+ha d+he b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba un mA de b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ts+tsha ye b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba a pa smA re b+h+yaHphaT/

sarba o stA ra ge b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba durlad+g+hi te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba duShadre k+Shi te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba dz+wa re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba kr-i t+ya karma NA ka kho rde b+h+yaHphaT/ ki ra Na be tA De b+h+yaHphaT/ tsits+tsha pre Sha ka dush+tsatshardi te b+h+yaHphaT/ dur+b+huk+te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba r+thi tIr+thi ke b+h+yaH

phaT/ sarba shra ma Ni b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba bid+yA d+ha re b+h+yaHphaT/ dza ya ka ra/ ma d+hu ka ra/ sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ke b+h+yo bid+yA tsA re b+h+yaHphaT/ tsa tur b+h+yo b+ha gi nI b+h+yaHphaT/ badzra kau mA rI ye b+h+yaHphaT/ bad+yI rA dz+nyI ye b+h+yaHphaT/ ma hA pra t+ya~M gi re b+h+yaHphaT/ badzra

shr-iM kha lA ya pra t+ya~M gi ra rA dzA ya phaT/ ma hA kA lA ya ma tr-i ga Na na ma skr-i tA ya b+h+yaHphaT/ biSh+Na bI ye phaT/ brAh+ma NI ye phaT/ a g+ni ye phaT/ ma hA kA lI ye phaT/ kA lA da~M DI ye phaT/ in+dI ye phaT/ rau drI ye phaT/ kau ma rI ye phaT/ bA rA hI ye

phaT/ tsa muN+DI ye phaT/ rA trI ye phaT/ kA la rA trI ye phaT/ ya ma daN+DI ye phaT/ ka pA lI ye phaT/ a d+hi muk+ti sma sA na bA si nI ye phaT/ sems can gang su dag bdag la sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / drag shul gyi sems dang ldan

pa rnams dang / mdangs 'phrog pa rnams dang / zas su mngal za ba rnams dang / zas su khrag 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su zhag za ba rnams dang / zas su sha za ba rnams dang / zas su tshil za ba rnams dang / zas su rkang za ba rnams dang /

zas su btsas pa za ba rnams dang / srog 'phrog pa rnams dang / zas su skyugs pa za ba rnams dang / zas su mi gtsang ba za ba rnams dang / zas su gcin 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su stor khung nas 'bab pa 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su lhag ma

za ba rnams dang / zas su mchil ma 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su snabs za ba rnams dang / zas su ngar snabs za ba rnams dang / zas su rnag za ba rnams dang / zas su gtor ma za ba rnams dang / zas su phreng ba za ba rnams dang / zas su dri

za ba rnams dang / zas su bdug pa za ba rnams dang / sems 'phrog pa rnams dang / zas su me tog za ba rnams dang / zas su 'bras bu za ba rnams dang / zas su lo tog za ba rnams dang / zas su sbyin sreg za ba rnams dang / sdig pa'i

sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon rnams dang / srin po'i gdon rnams dang / kyi gdon rnams dang / sha za'i gdon rnams dang /

'byung po'i gdon rnams dang / grul bum gyi gdon rnams dang / srul po'i gdon rnams dang / lus srul po'i gdon rnams dang / skem byed kyi gdon rnams dang / smyo byed kyi gdon rnams dang / grib gnon gyi gdon rnams dang / brjed byed kyi

gdon rnams dang / gnon po'i gdon rnams dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon rnams dang / nam gru'i gdon rnams dang / gshin rje'i gdon rnams dang / bya'i gdon rnams dang / ma mo dga' bar byed pa'i gdon rnams dang / kun du 'breng ba'i

gdon rnams dang / tsher ma 'don pa'i gdon rnams dang / rims nyin gcig pa rnams dang / nyin gnyis pa rnams dang / nyin gsum pa rnams dang / nyin bzhi pa rnams dang / nyin bdun pa rnams dang / rtag pa'i rims rnams

dang / rims mi bzad pa rnams dang / rims ldang dub pa rnams dang / 'byung po'i rims rnams dang / rlung las gyur pa rnams dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa rnams dang / bad kan las gyur pa rnams dang / 'dus pa las gyur pa rnams dang /

rims nad thams cad dang klad pa na ba bsal du gsol/ gzhogs phyed na ba dang / yi ga 'chus pa dang / mig nad dang / sna nad dang / kha nad dang / mgul nad dang / snying nad dang / lkog ma'i lha gor na ba dang / rna ba na ba dang / so na ba

dang / snying na ba dang / klad pa na ba dang / ske na ba dang / rtsib logs na ba dang / rgyab na ba dang / lto na ba dang / rked pa na ba dang / chu so na ba dang / brla na ba dang / rje ngar na ba dang / lag pa na ba dang / rkang pa na ba dang / yan lag

na ba dang / nying lag na ba bsal du gsol/ gdugs dkar po can rdo rje gtsug tor phyir zlog pa chen mo 'dis dpag tshad bcu gnyis kyi nang tshun chad du 'byung po dang / ro langs dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / rims dang / shu ba dang / g.yan pa

dang / 'brum bu phra mo dang / mdze dang / pho la mig dang / bas bldags dang / me dpal dang / g.ya' ba dang / lhog pa dang / skem pa dang / skrag pa dang / dbyig dug dang / dug sbyar ma dang / byad stems dang / me dang /

chu dang / mi ngas dang / dgra dang / gnod pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / sbrang bu t+r+ye mkhu ka dang / trai la tA ka dang / sdig pa dang / sbrul dang / sre mo dang / seng ge dang / stag dang / dom dang / dred dang / chu srin dang / bung

ba lta bus gzhan gyi srog 'phrog pa de dag thams cad kyi rig sngags bcing bar bgyi'o/ /gzi brjid bcing bar bgyi'o/ /gzhan gyi rig sngags bcing bar bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ oM a na le a na le/ be Sha de bi Sha de/ bai ra bai ra/ badzra d+ha ri

baM d+ha baM d+ha ni/ badzra pA Ni phaT hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ hU~M drU~M ban+d+ha phaT ma ma rak+Sha rak+Sha swA hA/ sus de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub pa phyir zlog pa chen po 'di gro ga 'am/ ras sam/ shing shun

la bris te/ lus sam/ mgul du thogs na/ de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dug gis mi tshugs/ mtshon gyis mi tshugs/ me yis mi tshugs/ chus mi tshugs/ dbyig dug gis mi tshugs/ dug sbyar mas mi tshugs/ byad kyis mi tshugs/

dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /gdon thams cad dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad kyi yid du 'ong ba dang dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje'i rigs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis kyang de la bsrung ba dang / bskyab

pa dang / sbed par byed de/ de rnams kyi yid du 'ong bas dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /nam du yang gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dang / srul po dang / lus srul po nyid du mi

'gyur ro/ /mi dbul por mi 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med dpag tu med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can gzhan

gyis mi thub pa phyir zlog pa chen po 'di 'chang na tshangs par mi spyod pa yang tshangs par spyod par 'gyur ro/ /thub par ma byas pa yang thub par byas par 'gyur ro/ /mi gtsang ba yang gtsang bar 'gyur ro/ /bsnyen gnas ma byas pa yang bsnyen gnas byas par

'gyur ro/ /smyung ba ma byas pa yang smyung ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /mtshams med pa lnga byas pa yang sdig pa byang bar 'gyur ro/ /sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa yang ma lus par byang bar 'gyur ro/ /bud med bu 'dod pa gang la la de bzhin gshegs

pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub pa chen po 'di 'chang na bu 'dod pa des de rnyed de/ tshe dang bsod nams dang stobs rnams kyang rab tu rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar

'gyur ro/ /mi nad dang / phyugs nad dang / gnag nad dang / yams kyi nad dang / 'tshe ba dang / nad 'go ba dang / gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs 'ong ba thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung

pa'i gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub pa phyir zlog pa chen po 'di rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te/ rim gro cher byas te/ mchod pa chen po byas la/ grong khyer thams cad kyi sgo 'am/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs

sam/ dgon pa'i gnas su gzugs so/ /gzhan gyis mi thub pa phyir zlog pa chen po 'di rim gro cher byas te/ btsugs ma thag tu g.yul zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /yams kyi nad dang / 'tshe ba dang / nad 'go ba dang / gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa dang / pha

rol gyi dmag tshogs 'ong ba rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /tad+ya thA/ oM Sh+ToM ban+d+ha ban+d+ha ma ma rak+Sha rak+Sha swA hA/ oM hU~M Sh+TA+oM ban+d+ha ban+d+ha badzra ma ma rak+Sha rak+Sha badzra pA Ni hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha a nA ba lo ki ti mur+d+ha ni te dzo rA shi/ oM hU~M dz+wa la dz+wa la/ d+ha ka

d+ha ka /da ra da ra/ bi da ra bi da ra/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ oM sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha hU~M phaT swA hA/ tad+ya thA/ oM a na le a na le/ kha sa me kha se me/ bai re bai re/ sau me sau me/ sarba bud d+ha a d+hiSh+NA na ad+hiSh+Thi ta

sarba ta thA ga toSh+NISha si tA ta pa tre hU~M phaT/ hU~M ma ma hU~M ni swA hA/ sangs rgyas rnal 'byor du bya'o/ /klu'i rgyal po rnams kyis kyang dus dus su char 'bebs so/ /'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can
gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ta thA ga ta uSh+NI Sha si tA ta pa tra nA ma a pa rA dzi ta d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs

pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i gnas na/ chos

lha'i 'dun sa na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs te/ gtsug tor rnam par lta ba'i

ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug tor gyi dbus nas gsang sngags kyi cho ga 'di dag byung ngo / /sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten na dgra bcom pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams la

phyag 'tshal lo/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten na yang dag par song ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha'i drang srong dmod pa 'dor ba dang / phan 'dogs

nus pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rig sngags 'chang grub pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /legs ldan drag po dka' thub las zlog pa'i bdag po dang lhan cig pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /legs ldan

sred med kyi bu phyag rgya chen po lngas phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /legs ldan nag po chen po grong khyer sum brtsegs 'jig par byed pa/ dur khrod na gnas par mos pa ma mo'i tshogs kyis phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs

pa'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /pad+ma'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nor bu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /glang po'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzhon nu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /klu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom

ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' brtan pa'i sde mtshon cha'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med

la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi bla

bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra

bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs

pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das

de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan rgyas pa ut+pala'i bsung gi tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de rnams la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i

gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba phyir zlog pa chen mo 'dis 'byung po'i gdon thams cad tshar gcod pa/ gzhan gyi rig sngags gcod pa/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba las zlog pa/ sems can bcings pa thams cad 'grol ba/ sdang

ba dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa thams cad bzlog pa/ gdon brgyad khri bzhi stong 'jig par byed pa/ rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad dga' bar byed pa/ gza' chen po brgyad 'jig par byed pa/ dgra thams cad bzlog pa/ ma rungs pa dang /

sdang ba dang / rmi lam ngan pa thams cad 'jig par byed pa/ dug dang mtshon dang me dang chu las sgrol ba ste/ gzhan gyis mi thub drag shul che/ /gtum pa chen mo stobs chen mo/ /'bar ba chen mo gzi brjid che/ /dkar mo chen mo stobs chen mo/ /'bar ba'i

phreng ba gos dkar mo/ /'phags ma sgrol ma khro gnyer can/ /rgyal ba'i rdo rje phreng zhes grags/ /pad+ma'i mngon mtshan rdo rjes mtshan/ /gzhan gyis mi thub phreng ba can/ /rdo rje mkhar bsnams 'joms pa mo/ /zhi ba'i lha rnams kyis mchod ma/ /

gzugs zhi gzi brjid chen mo can/ /'phags ma sgrol ma stobs chen mo/ /rdo rje lu gu rgyud gzhan dang / /rdo rje gzhon nu rigs 'dzin ma/ /lag na rdo rje rigs gser phreng / /le brgan rtsi dang rin chen ma/ /snang mdzad rdo rje'i gtsug tor

grags/ /rnam par bsgyings ma'i rdo rje dang / /gser 'od lta bu'i spyan mnga' ba/ /rdo rje sgros dang dkar mo dang / /pad+ma'i spyan dang zla 'od dang / /phyag rgya'i tshogs de dag thams cad kyis bdag la bsrung du gsol/ bsrung du gsol/ oM

r-i Shi ga Na pra shA stA ya/ sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha si tA ta pa tre hU~M drU~M/ dzam+b+ha na ka rI hU~M drUM/ stam+b+ha na ka rI hU~M drUM/ ma hA bid+yA sam b+hA k+Sha Na ka rI hU~M drUM/ pa ra bid+yA sam b+ha k+Sha Na ka rI hU~M drUM/ sarba duSh+TA nAM stam+b+ha na ka rI hU~M drUM/ sarba yak+Sha rAk+Sha sa gra hA NAM pid+hAn+sa na ka rI hU~M drUM/ tsa tu rA shI trI

nAM/ gra ha sa ha srA NAM/ bid+h+wa na sa na ka rI hU~M drUM/ aSh+Ta biM sha tI nAM/ nak+Sha trA nAM pra sAd na ka rI hU~M drUM/ aSh+Ta nAM ma hA gra hA NAM bi d+h+wa na sa na ka rI hU~M drUM/ rak+Sha maM/ bsrung du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po

can rdo rje gtsug tor phyir zlog pa chen mo/ phyag stong mnga' ba chen mo/ dbu stong mnga' ba chen mo/ spyan bye ba brgya phrag stong mnga' ba chen mo/ mi phyed 'bar ba'i mtshan rtags can rdo rje yangs pa chen mos/ sa gsum gyi dkyil 'khor la mnga' mdzad pa chen mo/ kun nas

bdag la bsrung du gsol/ bsrung du gsol/ oM rgyal po'i 'jigs pa dang / chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa dang / me'i 'jigs pa dang / chu'i 'jigs pa dang / dug gi 'jigs pa dang / mtshon gyi 'jigs pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi 'jigs pa dang / mu ge'i 'jigs pa

dang / dgra'i 'jigs pa dang / nad kyi 'jigs pa dang / lce 'bab pa'i 'jigs pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa dang / sa g.yo ba'i 'jigs pa dang / skar mda' ltung ba'i 'jigs pa dang / rgyal po'i chad pa'i 'jigs pa dang / lha'i 'jigs pa dang / klu'i 'jigs pa

dang / glog gi 'jigs pa dang / nam mkha' lding gi 'jigs pa dang / gcan gzan khro bo'i 'jigs pa dang / lha'i gdon dang / klu'i gdon dang / lha ma yin gyi gdon dang / rlung lha'i gdon dang / nam mkha' lding gi gdon dang / dri za'i gdon dang / mi 'am ci'i gdon dang / lto 'phye chen

pa'i gdon dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon dang / srin po'i gdon dang / kyi gdon dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon dang / sha za'i gdon dang / 'byung po'i gdon dang / grul bum gyi gdon dang / srul po'i gdon dang / lus srul po'i gdon dang / skem byed kyi gdon dang /

brjed byed kyi gdon dang / smyo byed kyi gdon dang / grib gnon gyi gdon dang / gnon po'i gdon dang / de dag las kyang bdag bde legs su gyur cig /gzi brjid 'phrog pa dang / mdangs 'phrog pa dang / zas su khrag 'thung ba dang / zas su zhag za ba dang / zas su sha za

ba dang / zas su tshil za ba dang / zas su rkang za ba dang / zas su btsas pa za ba dang / srog 'phrog pa dang / zas su skyugs pa za ba dang / zas su mi gtsang ba za ba dang / zas su gcin 'thung ba dang / zas su stor khung nas 'bab pa 'thung ba dang / zas su lhag

ma za ba dang / zas su mchil ma za ba dang / zas su snabs za ba dang / zas su ngar snabs za ba dang / zas su rnag za ba dang / zas su gtor ma za ba dang / zas su phreng ba za ba dang / zas su dri za ba dang / zas su bdug pa za ba dang / sems 'phrog pa dang /

zas su me tog za ba dang / zas su 'bras bu za ba dang / zas su lo tog za ba dang / zas su sbyin sreg za ba las bdag bde legs su gyur cig /de dag thams cad dang / gdon thams cad kyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /

kun du rgyus byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /mkha' 'gro dang mkha' 'gro mas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /phyugs bdag chen pos byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /sred med kyi

bus byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /nam mkha' lding yang dag pa dang / lhan cig pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /nag po chen po dang / ma mo'i tshogs kyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /

phur bus gdab bo/ /mi'i thod pa can gyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /rgyal bar byed pa dang / sbrang rtsir byed pa dang / don kun grub pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /sring mo bzhis byas

pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /b+h+r-ing gi ri ti dang / dga' byed dbang phyug dang / tshogs kyi bdag po dang lhan cig pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /dge sbyong gcer bus byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /

phur bus gdab bo/ /dgra bcom pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /'dod chags dang bral bas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /

phur bus gdab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar po can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag la bsrung du gsol/ bsrung du gsol/ oM a si tA na lA rkA pra b+hA s+phu Ta/ bi ka si tA ta pa tre/ dz+wa

la dz+wa la/ khA da khA da/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ bid+ha ra bid+ha ra/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ bin+da bin+da/ hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ he he phaT/ ho ho phaT/ a mo g+he phaT/ a pra ti ha tA phaT/ ba ra pra dA phaT/ pra t+yaM gi re phaT/ a su ra bi drA ba ka phaT/ sarba de be b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba

nA ge b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba a su re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ma ru te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ga ru De b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba gaM d+harbe b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba kin na re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ma ho ra ge b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba yak+She b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba rA k+She se b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pre te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pi shA tsi b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba b+hU te b+h+yaHphaT/

sarba kum b+hAN+De b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pU ta ni b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ka Ta pU ta ni b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba skan+b+he b+h+yaHphaT/ sarbon+mA de b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ts+tshA ye b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba a pa smA re b+h+yuHphaT/ sarba oM stA ra ke b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba durlaM gi te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba duSh+pe k+Shi te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba dz+wa re b+h+yaHphaT/

sarba kr-i t+ya karma kA kho rde b+h+yaHphaT/ ki ra Na be tA De b+h+yaHphaT/ tsits+tsha pre Sha ka dush+ts+tsher di te b+h+yaHphaT/ dur b+huka te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba tir+thi ke b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba shra ma Na b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba bid+yA d+ha re b+h+yaHphaT/ dza ya ka ra/ ma d+hu ka re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ar+tha sAd+ha ke b+h+yo bid+ya tsa re b+h+yaHphaT/ tsa tu ra

b+h+yo b+ha gnI b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba kau mA rI ye b+h+yaHphaT/ bid+yA ra dz+nyI ye b+h+yaHphaT/ ma hA pra t+yaM gi re b+h+yaHphaT/ badzra shr-id+kha lA ya/ prat+yaM gi ra rA dzA ya phaT/ ma hA kA lA ya ma tr-i ga Na na ma skr-i ta ye phaT/ biSh+Na bi ye phaT/ brah+ma NI ye phaT/ ag+ni ye phaT/ ma hA kA lI ye phaT/ kA lA

daN+DI ye phaT/ in+d+rI ye phaT/ rau drI ye phaT/ kau mA rI ye phaT/ bA rA hI ye phaT/ tsA muN+DI ye phaT/ ra trI ye phaT/ kA la rA trI ye phaT/ ya ma daN+DI ye phaT/ ka pA lI ye phaT/ a d+hi mu ka ti sma shA na bA si nI ye phaT/ sems can gang su dag bdag la

sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / gzi byin 'phrog pa rnams dang / zas su mdangs za ba rnams dang / zas su mngal za ba rnams dang / zas su khrag 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su zhag za ba

rnams dang / zas su sha za ba rnams dang / zas su tshil za ba rnams dang / zas su rkang za ba rnams dang / zas su btsas pa za ba rnams dang / srog 'phrog pa rnams dang / zas su skyugs pa za ba rnams dang / zas su mi gtsang ba za ba

rnams dang / zas su gcin 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su stor khung nas 'bab pa 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su lhag ma za ba rnams dang / zas su mchil ma 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su snabs za ba rnams dang / zas su ngar snabs za ba

rnams dang / zas su rnag za ba rnams dang / zas su gtor ma za ba rnams dang / zas su phreng ba za ba rnams dang / zas su dri za ba rnams dang / zas su bdug pa za ba rnams dang / sems 'phrog pa rnams dang / zas su me tog za ba rnams

dang / zas su 'bras bu za ba rnams dang / zas su lo tog za ba rnams dang / zas su sbyin sreg za ba rnams dang / sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / lha'i gdon rnams dang / klu'i

gdon rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi gdon rnams dang / rlung lha'i gdon rnams dang / nam mkha' lding gi gdon rnams dang / dri za'i gdon rnams dang / mi 'am ci'i gdon rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gdon rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon rnams dang / srin po'i gdon rnams

dang / kyi gdon rnams dang / sha za'i gdon rnams dang / 'byung po'i gdon rnams dang / grul bum gyi gdon rnams dang / srul po'i gdon rnams dang / lus srul po'i gdon rnams dang / skem byed kyi gdon rnams dang / smyo byed kyi gdon rnams dang / grib gnon gyi

gdon rnams dang / brjed byed kyi gdon rnams dang / gnon po'i gdon rnams dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon rnams dang / nam gru'i gdon rnams dang / gshin rje'i gdon rnams dang / bya'i gdon rnams dang / ma mo dga' bar byed pa'i gdon rnams

dang / kun du 'breng ba'i gdon rnams dang / tsher ma 'don pa'i gdon rnams dang / rims nyin gcig pa rnams dang / nyin gnyis pa rnams dang / nyin gsum pa rnams dang / nyin bzhi pa rnams dang / nyin bdun pa rnams dang / rtag

pa'i rims rnams dang / rims mi bzad pa rnams dang / rims ldang dub pa rnams dang / 'byung po'i gdon rnams dang / rlung las gyur pa rnams dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa rnams dang / bad kan las gyur pa rnams dang / 'dus

pa las gyur pa rnams dang / rims nad thams cad dang / klad pa na ba bsal du gsol/ gzhogs phyed na ba dang / yi ga 'chus pa dang / mig nad dang / sna nad dang / kha nad dang / mgul nad dang / snying nad dang / lkog ma'i

lha gor na ba dang / rna ba na ba dang / so na ba dang / snying na ba dang / klad pa na ba dang / rtsib logs na ba dang / rgyab na ba dang / lto na ba dang / rked pa na ba dang / chu so na ba dang / brla na ba dang / rje ngar na ba dang / lag pa na ba dang /

rkang pa na ba dang / yan lag na ba dang / nying lag na ba dag bsal du gsol/ bsrung du gsol/ gdugs dkar po can rdo rje gtsug tor nas byung ba phyir zlog pa chen mo 'dis/ dpag tshad bcu gnyis kyi nang tshun chad du 'byung po dang / ro

langs dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / rims dang / shu ba dang / g.ya' ba dang / 'brum bu phra mo dang / mdze dang / phol mig dang / bas bldags dang / me dpal dang / g.yan pa dang / lhog pa dang / skems pa dang / skrag pa

dang / dbyig dug dang / dug sbyar ma dang / byad dang / me dang / chu dang / mi ngas dang / dgra dang / gnod pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / sbrang bu t+r+ye ma bu ka dang / trai la tA ka dang / sdig pa dang / sbrul dang / sre mo dang /

seng ge dang / stag dang / dom dang / dred dang / spyang ki dang / chu srin dang / bung ba lta bus gzhan gyi srog 'phrog pa de dag thams cad kyi rig sngags bcing bar bya'o/ /gzi brjid bcing bar bgyi'o/ /gzhan gyi rig sngags bcing bar

bya'o/ /gdon thams cad bcing bar bya'o/ /tad+ya thA/ oM a na le/ a na le/ bi sha de bi sha de/ bai ra bai ra/ badzra d+ha ri/ ban d+ha ban d+ha ni/ badzra pA Ni hU~M phaT/ hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ ban d+ha phaT phaT swA hA/ sus de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs

dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir zlog ma chen mo 'di gro ga'am/ ras sam/ shing shun la bris te/ lus sam/ mgul du btags na/ de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dug gis mi tshugs/ mtshon gyis mi tshugs/ mes mi tshugs/ chus mi tshugs/ dbyig

dug gis mi tshugs/ dug sbyar mas mi tshugs/ byad kyis mi tshugs so/ /dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /gdon thams cad dang / bgegs dang / rnam par log 'dren thams cad kyi yid du 'ong ba dang

dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje'i rigs bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis kyang de la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sbed par byed de/ de rnams kyi yid du 'ong ba dang dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong du skye ba dran par

'gyur ro/ /nam du yang gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dang / srul po dang / lus srul po nyid du mi 'gyur ro/ /mi dbul por mi 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med dpag tu med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma

snyed kyi bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir zlog pa chen mo 'di 'chang na tshangs par mi spyod pa yang tshangs par spyod par 'gyur ro/ /thub par ma

byas pa yang thub par byas par 'gyur ro/ /mi gtsang ba yang gtsang bar 'gyur ro/ /bsnyen gnas ma byas pa yang bsnyen gnas byas par 'gyur ro/ /smyung ba ma byas pa yang smyung ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /mtshams med pa lnga byas pa'i sdig pa

yang ma lus par 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa yang ma lus par zad par 'gyur ro/ /bud med bu 'dod pa gang la la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir zlog ma chen mo

'di 'chang na/ bu 'dod pa des bu rnyed de tshe dang bsod nams dang stobs kyang rab tu rnyed do/ /'di nas shi 'phos na yang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /mi nad dang / phyugs nad dang / gnag nad dang /

yams kyi nad dang / 'tshe ba dang / nad 'go ba dang / gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa thams cad dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs 'ong ba thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir zlog pa chen mo

'di rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te/ rim gro cher mchod pa chen po byas la grong khyer chen po'i sgor zhugs la/ grong khyer ram/ grong ngam/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ dgon pa'i gnas su gzugs so/ /gzhan gyis mi thub pa phyir zlog pa chen mo 'di rim

gro cher byas te/ btsugs ma thag tu g.yul zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /yams kyi nad dang / 'tshe ba dang / gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /tad+ya thA/ oM Sh+ToM ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ bdag la srungs shig srungs shig

swA hA/ rak+ShA rak+Sha mA~M oM hU~M Sh+ToM ban+d+ha ban+d+ha badzra/ bdag la srungs shig srungs shig /rak+Sha rak+Sha mA~M/ badzra pA Ni ye hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha a ba lo ki te mUr d+ha te dzo rA shi/ oM dz+wa la dz+wa la/ d+ha ka d+ha ka/ da ra da ra/ bi da ra bi da ra/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/

b+hin+da b+hin+da/ hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ oM sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ tad+ya thA/ oM a na le a na le/ kha sa me kha sa me/ bai ra bai ra/ sau me sau me/ sarba bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+ShA na a d+hi Sh+Thi te/ oM sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha si tA ta pa tre hU~M phaT swA hA/ hU~M ma ma hU~M ni swA hA/ sangs

rgyas rnal 'byor du bya'o/ /klu'i rgyal po rnams kyang dus dus su char 'bebs so/ /sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon

bar bstod do/ /'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //gtsug tor lha yul ma chung ba kha che'i paN+Di ta ma hA dz+nyA nas rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o// //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ sarba ta thA ga ta uSh+NI Sha bi dza ya nA ma d+hA ra NI kal paM sa hi ta/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rtog pa dang bcas pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'

thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag tu med pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde ba can gyi chos yang dag par sdud pa'i phug khang mchog na nye bar

bzhugs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu sdug bsngal ba nad kyis gzir ba'i sems can tshe thung ba yod de/ de rnams kyi phyir 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la nye bar gzigs te/

kun du gzigs pa'i dpal gyi mtshan de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di bcang ba dang / bklag pa dang / gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par ston pa ni tshe ring ba sgrub par byed pa'i ched du'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te thal mo sbyar bar gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bstan du gsol/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes

bya ba'i gzungs bde bar gshegs pas bstan du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs te/ kun du gzigs pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di bka' stsal pa/ oM na mo b+ha ga wa te sarba trai lo kya pra ti bi ShiSh+TA ya bud d+hA ya te na maH/ tad+ya thA/ oM b+h+rU~M b+h+rU~M b+h+rU~M sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/ bi sho d+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya/ a sa ma sa man+ta a ba b+hA sa s+pha ra Na ga ti/ ga

ga na swa b+hA pa bi shud d+he/ a b+hi Shiny+tsan+tu mAM/ sarba ta thA ga tAHsu ga ta ba ra ba tsa na/ a mr-i ta a b+hi She kai ra/ ma hA mu drA man+t+ra pa deH/ A ha ra A ha ra/ ma ma A yuHsan d+hA ra Ni/ sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/ bi sho d+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya// ga ga na swa b+hA ba bi shud d+he/ uSh+NI Sha bi dza ya pa ri

shud d+he/ sa ha sra ra smi saM tso di te/ sarba ta thA ga ta a wa lo ki ni/ ShaT pA ra mi tA pa ri pU ra Ni/ sarba ta thA ga ta mA te/ da sha b+hU mi pra tiSh+Thi te/ sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya a d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+Thi te/ mu dre mu dre ma hA mu dre/ badzra kA ya saM ha ta na/ pa ri shud d+he/ sarba karma A wa ra Na bi shud

d+he/ pra ti ni bar ta ya/ ma ma A yur bi shud d+he/ sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma ya a d+hiSh+ThA na/ id+hiSh+Thi te/ oM mu ni mu ni/ ma hA mu ni/ bi mu ni bi mu ni/ ma hA bi mu ni/ ma ti ma ti/ ma hA ma ti/ ma ma ti/ su ma ti/ ta thA tA/ p+hU ta ko Ti/ pa ri shud d+he/ bi s+phu Ta/ bud d+hi shud d+he/ he

he/ dza ya dza ya/ bi dza ya bi dza ya/ sma ra sma ra/ s+pha ra s+pha ra/ s+phA ra ya s+phA ra ya/ sarba bud d+ha a d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+Thi te/ shud d+he shud d+he/ bud d+he bud d+he/ badzre badzre/ ma hA badzre/ su badzre/ badzra gar+b+he dza ya gar+b+he/ bi dza ya gar+b+he/ badzra dz+wA lA gar+b+he/ badzra ud b+ha be/ badzra saM b+ha be/ badzre

badzrI Ni/ badzram+b+ha ban+tu/ ma ma sha rI raM sarba sa twA nAny+tsa kA ya pa ri shud d+hir b+ha ban+tu/ sa dA me sarba ga ti pa ri shud d+hish+tsa/ sarba ta thA ga tAsh+tsa mAM sa mA shwA sa yan+tu/ bud d+h+ya bud d+h+ya/ sid d+h+ya sid d+h+ya/ bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ bi bo d+ha ya bi bo d+ha ya/ mo tsa ya mo tsa ya/ bi mo tsa ya bi

mo tsa ya/ sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/ bi sho d+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya/ sa man+ta mo tsa ya mo tsa ya/ sa man+ta rasmi pa ri shud d+he/ sarba tu thA ga tA hr-i da ya a d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+Thi te/ mu dre mu dre/ ma hA mu dre ma hA mu drA man+t+ra pa daiHswA hA/ lha'i dbang po gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i

gzungs 'di ni ngan 'gro thams cad yongs su sbyong ba/ sdig pa'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba/ bde 'gro'i lam du 'gro ba/ ngan 'gro thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa 'di ni sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung 'bum phrag bye ba brgyad cu rtsa brgyad kyi bye ma snyed

kyis gsungs pa/ byin gyis brlabs pa/ rjes su yi rang bar mdzad pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgyas btab pa ste/ sems can thams cad bde 'gror 'gro bar bya ba dang / ngan 'gror lhung ba rnams bzlog pa dang / sems

can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi gnas thams cad du sdug bsngal zhing nyam nga bar gyur pa rnams dang / sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtshor ltung ba'i sems can rnams rnam par grol bar bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa'o/ /

de bzhin du sems can tshe thung zhing skal ba chung ba smad pa dang / rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i skye bar ltung ba rnams dang / bsam pa nyams pa dang / sems can lam las nyams pa rnams kyi don du gzungs 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du sems can rnams la gzungs 'di dang / phyag

rgya dang / sngags yongs su gtad pa yin no/ /de'i phyir lha'i dbang po khyod kyis yang dag par gzung bar bya'o/ /lha'i dbang po gzungs 'di lan cig thos ma thag tu bskal pa brgya stong du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/ /skye bar skye ba sna

tshogs pa sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / kyi yul dang / lha ma yin gyi ris dang / 'di lta ste/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / srul po dang / lus srul po dang / brjed

byed dang / khyi dang / rus sbal dang / sbrul dang / gcan gzan khro bo dang / bya dang / sbrang bu dang / sbrang ma dang / sdig sbrul dang / grog sbur la sogs pa srog chags kyi rigs rnams su phyis mi skye bar rig par bya'o/ /gzhan du de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad pa dang / byang

chub sems dpa'i rigs su skye ba dang / rigs chen por skye ba ste/ de la rigs chen po ni 'di lta ste/ bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'am/ rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'am/ khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'am/ tshong dpon gyi

rigs shing sA la chen po lta bur skye'o zhes nga smra'o/ /lha'i dbang po de ltar na gzungs 'di'i mthus byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du skye ba yongs su dag pa chen po 'thob ste/ lha'i dbang po gzungs 'di ni de ltar mthu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ mthu stobs che ba/

dge ba shis pa yin te/ lha'i dbang po sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs ngan 'gro thams cad yongs su sbyong ba 'di bzhag go/ /'di lta ste/ dper na nor bu rin po che nyi ma'i snying po shin tu dri ma med pa nam mkha' ltar yongs

su dag pa 'od gsal ba ni 'od zer gyi snang bas 'bar zhing 'dug go/ /lha'i dbang po de bzhin du sems can de yang gos pa med par shes par bya'o/ /'di lta ste/ dper na 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser shin tu dri ma med pa/ yongs su dag pa/ shin tu mnyen pa/ shin tu

sdug pa'o/ /lha'i dbang po de bzhin du sems can chen po de yang shin tu yongs su dag par rig phar bya ste/ tshe rabs gzhan du yang de bzhin du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /lha'i dbang po gang na gzungs 'di rab tu ston pa dang / bye brag tu na yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang /

'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / kha ton du byed pa dang / mchod pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / nyan pa dang / 'dzin par 'gyur ba de 'gro ba thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal ba thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur

ro/ /lha'i dbang po gzungs 'di yi ger bris te rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mor gzhag par bya/ ri mthon po'am/ khang pa mthon po'am/ mchod rten gyi nang du gzhag par bya'o/ /lha'i dbang po dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen

ma'am/ de las gzhan pa rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mor gzhag pa mthong ngam/ de dang nye bar gnas par gyur na/ tha na de'i grib mas phog gam/ de'i rdul rlung gis btab pa phog na yang lha'i dbang po sems can de

la sdig pa thams cad dang / ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad mi 'byung ngo / /sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / dang / lha ma yin gyi ris thams cad du mi skye bar rig

par bya'o/ /lha'i dbang po sems can de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par rig par bya na/ lha'i dbang po shing bzo byed pa la yang phan yon chen por 'gyur na/ mchod pa dang /

rim gror byed cing / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / spos dang / rgyan rnams kyis brgyan par byed pa dang / lam gyi bzhi mdor mchod rten byas la gzungs 'di gzhag la/

thal mo sbyar ba'am/ phyag 'tshal ba'am/ skor ba byed pa lta ci smos te/ lha'i dbang po sems can 'di ni sems can chen po yin par rig par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras su rig par bya'o/ /chos kyi gnas su rig par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs

pa'i mchod rten du rig par bya'o/ /de nas chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje de'i nub mo de nam langs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog dang / gos dang / rgyan la sogs pas mchod pa dang / bsti stang du byas nas des bcom ldan

'das la lan bdun bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gzungs 'di ni mthu che zhing sman yon che ba lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sems can de'i

slad bzhin 'brang zhing / dus kun du bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du gnas par bgyi'o/ /sems can dmyal ba thams cad las de bzlog par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni byas pa gzo bar bgyid kyi byas pa mi gzo bar mi bgyid do/ /de nas

rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gzungs 'di'i cho ga zhib mo dang / bgyi ba'i cho ga'i tshul rgyas par bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal

po chen po bzhi po dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nyon cig dang gzungs 'di'i bya ba'i cho ga'i tshul bshad par bya'o/ /sems can tshe thung ba'i don gyi phyir rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mos tshes lnga'i zla ba la khrus byas te/ gos gtsang ma gyon nas smyung

ba byas te/ lan stong bzlas brjod byas na de sems can tshe zad pa de yang phyir nur ro/ /nad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa ngan 'gro thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/ /

tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i srog chags bya'i rna lam du yang gzungs 'di'i sgra bsgrags par bya ste/ des ni de'i ngan 'gro 'di nyid tha ma yin par rig par bya'o/ /gang zhig nad chen pos btab ste sman pa rnams kyis bye brag phye ste bor ba yang de ltar na nad de las

yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/ /de ni ngan 'gror skye ba thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro/ /shi 'phos nas kyang bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de nyid de'i mngal gyi gnas tha ma yin par shes par bya'o/ /de gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der pad+ma'i

snying po kho na las brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe rabs thams cad du yang tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /sems can sdig pa byed pa gang dag 'chi ba'i dus byas pa/ de dag gi don du gzungs 'di yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su brjod de/ de dag gi rus gong

rnams kyi steng du gtor na de dag sems can dmyal ba'am/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten nam/ sam/ de las gzhan pa'i ngan 'gro rnams su skyes par gyur kyang rung ste/ de dag gzungs 'di'i mthus ngan 'gro de dag las thar

bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag las thar nas kyang lhar skye bar 'gyur ro/ /su zhig 'di nyin gcig bzhin du lan nyi shu rtsa gcig rtsa gcig yongs su brjod pa de 'jig rten pa chen po rnams kyis mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur ro/ /tshe ring bar 'gyur ro/ /nad med

par 'gyur ro/ /bde ba myong bar 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu spro ba dang ldan pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa chen po thob par 'gyur ro/ /shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs pa tha dad du 'gro bar

'gyur ro/ /der yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang phrad par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang dbugs 'byin par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang lung ston par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du yang

'jig rten la snang ba byed par 'gyur ro/ /phyag rgya bcing ba ni sor mo bcu'i thal mo la sdigs mdzub gnyis bkug ste mthe bong gnyis dang sbyar la/ de nas gzungs 'di dran par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas te me tog sna tshogs bkram la sna tshogs

pa'i bdug pas bdug cing / pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ting nge 'dzin gyis dmigs la phyag bya zhing / de nas gzungs brgyad brgya bklag par bya'o/ /de ltar lan cig bklags pa tsam gyis bye ba khrag

khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa brgyad kyi gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod cing bsnyen bkur dang ri mor byas pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa chen po'i sprin gyis mchod par 'gyur ro/ /de kun

gyis kyang legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod par 'gyur ro/ /sems can de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid las skyes pa'i sras su rig par bya'o/ /sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes dang ldan zhing byang chub chen po'i sems kyi rgyan dang mnyam pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /

de la gzungs bsgrub pa'i cho ga'i thabs 'dis ni lha'i dbang po 'gro ba thams cad kyang sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i ngan 'gro las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag gi 'gro ba thams cad kyang yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /tshe ring bar 'gyur ro/ /lha'i dbang po song

la lha'i bu blo gros shin tu brtan pa la gzungs 'di rjes su ston la sgrogs shig /lha'i dbang po des na zhag bdun na lha'i bu shin tu brtan pa'i 'gro ba thams cad yongs su dag cing tshe ring bar 'gyur ro/ /stobs che bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis de bzhin

gshegs pa las rjes su bstan pa 'di blangs te/ de'i gnas su phyin nas lha'i bu shin tu brtan pa la gzungs 'di byin no/ /de nas lha'i bu des nyi ma bdun pa'i bar du nyin drug mtshan drug tu gzungs 'di la brtson par byas nas/ de'i bsam pa thams cad phun sum tshogs

te/ 'di lta ste/ ngan 'gro las ni yongs su thar/ bde ba'i lam la yang gnas/ tshe ring bar yang gyur nas/ a la la sangs rgyas/ a la la chos/ a la la gzungs 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ste/ des bdag 'jigs pa chen po las yongs su thar to/ /zhes

ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / lha'i bu shin tu brtan pa 'khor che ba rnams kyis me tog dang / dri dang / bdug pa dang / phreng ba dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gos kyi rgyan bzang po'i bla re dang / lha'i

tshogs kyi mthus bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du phyin te thad du phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa chen po lha rdzas kyi gos kyi rgyan la sogs pa nye bar mkho ba'i mchod pa brgya stong phul te bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du 'dug ste/ de bzhin du ched du

brjod pa byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du 'dug ste chos nyan to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag gser gyi mdog can brkyang ste lha'i bu shin tu brtan pa dbugs phyung nas chos ston par byed cing sangs rgyas kyi bar du lung ston to/ /rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba'i gzungs 'di ni 'chi ba chen po'i dbyug pa 'dzin pa ste/ dag byed sdig pa 'joms par byed pa 'di gro ga'am/ gzhan zhig la bris te/ mchod rten gyi nang du bzhag la rab tu rgya che ba'i mchod pa ji ltar 'byor pas

mchod de bskor ba stong phrag brgya byas na mchog gi tshe dang blo rno ba sbyin par byed par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar byas pas zhag bdun pa'i tshe ni lo bdun thub bo/ /lo bdun pa'i tshe ni lo bdun cu thub bo/ /de ltar mchog gi tshe thob cing dran pa dang ldan pa dang / nad med pa dang / skye ba

dran par 'gyur ro/ /mchod rten la bzhugs su gsol te/ mgo la bcings na nad chen po las grol bar 'gyur ro/ /gos sam shing shun la gi wang gis rang gi ming dang bcas par gzungs bris te/ tsan+dan gyi rang bzhin gyi mchod rten la bzhugs su gsol nas/

rang gi khyim du bzhag la rgya che ba'i stong gis mchod pas mchod de/ zla ba re re zhing brgya phrag brgyad kyis bzlas pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga byas na nad las grol zhing lo brgya thub par 'gyur ro/ /med na 'dam pa'i rang bzhin la yang bya'o/ /yang gos gtsang ma la sna tshogs rdo

rje la gnas pa'i mchod rten bris la/ rdo rje phreng bas bskor bas brgyan pa de'i nang du rang gi ming dang gzungs kyi tshig 'di gi wang gis bris la/ kham por kha sbyar gyi nang du bzhugs su gsol te rang gi khyim du bzhag la mchod pa rgya chen pos mchod pa byas na rtag tu bsrung

bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang cho ga ni sa la ma lhung ba'i lci bas maN+Dal gru bzhir byas la me tog dkar po bkram ste/ mtshams bzhir zhun mar gyi mar me bzhi bzhag la/ a ga ru dang du ru ska'i bdug ba byas la/ de bzhin du dri'i chus gang ba'i snod me tog dkar

pos brgyan te/ gzungs kyi snying po can gyi mchod rten nam sku gzugs dbus su bzhugs su gsol la/ de la g.yon pa'i lag pas reg ste g.yas pa'i lag pa phreng ba 'dzin pas nyi ma re re zhing lan nyi shu rtsa gcig rtsa gcig dus gsum du bzlas pa byas la/ de'i

chu khyor ba gsum 'thungs na nad med pa dang / tshe ring ba dang / dgra yongs su nyams pa dang / 'dzin blo rno ba dang / ngag btsun par 'gyur ro/ /skye ba nas skye bar skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /de'i chus khang pa dang / phyugs kyi rab 'am/ rta'i rab 'am/ rgyal po'i khab

tu gtor na/ rkun ma dang / sbrul dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung zhing nad kyis yongs su gdungs par mi 'gyur ro/ /mgo la gtor na de nad de las grol bar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar tshe dpag tu med pa'i phan yon che ba'i gzungs 'ang gang dang

gang du rab tu sbyar na/ de dang de ru zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro/ /so shing la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas te/ 'chos na nad med pa dang / blo rno ba dang / tshe ring bar 'gyur ro/ /chu khyor ba gsum la dus gsum du lan nyi shu rtsa gcig rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas te 'thungs

na nad thams cad las yongs su grol zhing yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag tu med pa la bskor ba byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan

'das rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mos mchod rten gyi las ji ltar bya/ sku gzugs la sogs pa bsgrub pa ji ltar bya/ 'dir sbyin sreg kyang ji ltar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dri ba legs par smras pa ni/ /dpa' bo chen po legs so

legs/ /sems can kun la phan brtse'i phyir/ /'dir ni rtse gcig yid kyis nyon/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kun du 'od dpag tu med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshe dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba'i

gzungs 'di gsungs pa ni 'di lta ste/ o~M a mi te/ a mi tod+b+ha be a mi ta saM b+ha we/ a mi ta bi krAn te/ a mi ta gA dre/ a mi ta gA mi ni/ a mi ta A yurda de/ ga ga na kIrti ka re/ sarba kle sha k+Sha yaM ka ri ye swA hA/ zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'dis mchod rten byed pa'i 'jim pa

blang ba dang / byug pa la sogs pa dang / gdugs gdags pa'i bar ji snyed rdzogs par bya'o/ /'di'i cho ga ni/ mchod rten cho ga mchog gyur pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /gser dang / in+d+ra nI la dang / dngul dang / pad+ma rA ga la sogs

pa'i rang bzhin mang po'i rin po ches spras pa'i sor bcu gnyis kyi tshad pad+ma'i steng na bzhugs pa/ de'i logs bzhir 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi lag na rgyal mtshan bsnams pa'o/ /me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri la ga na bzung ba'i gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu rnams dang / lha

rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin lag na gdugs bsnams pa dang / g.yas dang g.yon gyi logs gnyis na spyan ras gzigs dang / rdo rje 'chang gnyis rnga yab dkar po phyag na bsnams pa gnyis bya'o/ /de lta bu'i cho gas mchod rten la g.yas bskor gyi sbyor bas pad+ma'i 'dab

ma la bri bar bya'o/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs bris la de'i ring bsrel gyi snying po can du byas te/ dri zhim po dang bsres pa'i chus gtor zhing dri zhim po'i me tog gis mchod la/ stong phrag gcig gis mchod

pa byas te/ dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes brgyad kyi nyin zhag la smyung bar gnas shing / sems can thams cad la phan pa'i blos tshe dang blo ster ba'i yon byin te stong phrag gcig bzlas par bya'o/ /zla ba re re zhing byas na zla ba drug gis tshe lo stong thub par 'gyur ro/ /

rtag tu lo gcig tu byas na tshe lo 'bum thub par 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu byas na tshe lo mi zad pa thub cing stobs dang ldan pa dang / gang gis kyang mi thub cing lha dang lha ma yin dang mi mnyam pa'i mkha' spyod kyi gtsug tor mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /de nas gzhan yang cho ga ni rab
